show_list.name: Gotham
show_list.summary:
The good. The evil. The beginning.

Everyone knows the name Commissioner Gordon. He is one of the crime world's greatest foes, a man whose reputation is synonymous with law and order. But what is known of Gordon's story and his rise from rookie detective to Police Commissioner? What did it take to navigate the multiple layers of corruption that secretly ruled Gotham City, the spawning ground of the world's most iconic villains? And what circumstances created them – the larger-than-life personas who would become Catwoman, The Penguin, The Riddler, Two-Face and The Joker?

Gotham is an origin story of the great DC Comics Super-Villains and vigilantes, revealing an entirely new chapter that has never been told. It follows one cop's rise through a dangerously corrupt city teetering between good and evil, and chronicles the birth of one of the most popular super heroes of our time.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: GOTHAM traces the rise of the great DC Comics Super-Villains and vigilantes, revealing an entirely new chapter that has never been told. GOTHAM follows one cop, destined for greatness, as he navigates a dangerously corrupt city teetering between good and evil, and chronicles the birth of one of the most popular super heroes of our time.

previous_episode.name: Heroes Rise: Heavydirtysoul
previous_episode.summary: Bruce kills Alfred and Ra's promises that they will meet again. Meanwhile, Jim and Harvey make a desperate trade with Edward to get what they need for the antidote, and Butch and Tabitha turn against Barbara.

tvmaze11_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze11_0001_0001_0001.summary: GOTHAM traces the rise of the great DC Comics Super-Villains and vigilantes, revealing an entirely new chapter that has never been told. GOTHAM follows one cop, destined for greatness, as he navigates a dangerously corrupt city teetering between good and evil, and chronicles the birth of one of the most popular super heroes of our time.

tvmaze11_0002_0001_0002.name: Selina Kyle
tvmaze11_0002_0001_0002.summary: Detectives Gordon and Bullock investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gotham's street kids, including Selina Kyle. Meanwhile, Penguin resurfaces in the countryside and begins to make his way back to GOTHAM, leaving victims in his wake.

tvmaze11_0003_0001_0003.name: The Balloonman
tvmaze11_0003_0001_0003.summary: Detectives Gordon and Bullock track down a vigilante who is killing corrupt Gotham citizens by attaching them to weather balloons. Meanwhile, Oswald Cobblepot returns to Gotham and gets a new job close to an influential figure in the underworld.

tvmaze11_0004_0001_0004.name: Arkham
tvmaze11_0004_0001_0004.summary: As a contentious city council vote on the future of the Arkham district approaches, politicians from both sides are in danger. Gordon and Bullock must race to protect the council and an old friend visits Gordon.

tvmaze11_0005_0001_0005.name: Viper
tvmaze11_0005_0001_0005.summary: Gordon and Bullock search for the source of a new street drug that causes euphoria then death. Meanwhile, Oswald Cobblepot works his way deeper into Maroni's inner circle and Fish Mooney continues to plot against Falcone.

tvmaze11_0006_0001_0006.name: Spirit of the Goat
tvmaze11_0006_0001_0006.summary: When a killer begins targeting the first born of Gotham's elite, Bullock is forced to confront traumatic memories from a nearly identical case he worked in the past. Later, Gordon is confronted by past decisions.

tvmaze11_0007_0001_0007.name: Penguin's Umbrella
tvmaze11_0007_0001_0007.summary: As violence between Maroni and Falcone continues to escalate, Penguin reveals a new component of his manipulative strategy, forcing Gordon to deal with the consequences of his decision to spare Penguin's life.

tvmaze11_0008_0001_0008.name: The Mask
tvmaze11_0008_0001_0008.summary: Gordon and Bullock investigate a Gothamite who runs a deadly fight club for candidates applying for a job at his financial firm. Meanwhile, Bruce returns to school and gets a visit from a new friend.

tvmaze11_0009_0001_0009.name: Harvey Dent
tvmaze11_0009_0001_0009.summary: Harvey Dent encourages Gordon to team up with Mayor James in an attempt to close the Wayne murder case. Meanwhile, Penguin makes contact with Mooney's secret weapon.

tvmaze11_0010_0001_0010.name: LoveCraft
tvmaze11_0010_0001_0010.summary: Selina leads a new friend on a perilous journey through Gotham to evade the assassins who are on her trail. Following a misstep, Gordon is reassigned to duty at Arkham Asylum.

tvmaze11_0011_0001_0011.name: Rogues' Gallery
tvmaze11_0011_0001_0011.summary: Det. Gordon's assignment at Arkham Asylum gets off to a rocky start when the murder of a guard ignites an investigation, leading him to meet Dr. Leslie Thompkins. Meanwhile, Cobblepot continues to build his army.

tvmaze11_0012_0001_0012.name: What the Little Bird Told Him
tvmaze11_0012_0001_0012.summary: In an attempt to get his job back, Gordon seeks to capture Jack Gruber, a deranged electrical genius who escapes Arkham Asylum. Meanwhile, Falcone struggles to hold onto his empire after Fish Mooney makes her next move.

tvmaze11_0013_0001_0013.name: Welcome Back, Jim Gordon
tvmaze11_0013_0001_0013.summary: When the key witness in a homicide ends up dead while being held for questioning by the police, Gordon suspects that it's an inside job and looks to an old friend for information. Meanwhile, Oswald Cobblepot takes control of one of Fish Mooney's prized possessions, as she gets a gets a small taste of her own medicine.

tvmaze11_0014_0001_0014.name: The Fearsome Dr. Crane
tvmaze11_0014_0001_0014.summary: Fish Mooney reveals a secret of Oswald Cobblepot's, prompting Maroni to take him on a trip to test his loyalty. Meanwhile, Gordon and Bullock hunt down a killer who targets victims with severe phobias and Bruce Wayne confronts Gordon for failing to make progress on his parents' murder case.

tvmaze11_0015_0001_0015.name: The Scarecrow
tvmaze11_0015_0001_0015.summary: Gordon and Bullock set out to stop Gerald Crane, a biology teacher who has been harvesting the glands of his murder victims. Meanwhile, after finding herself in an unusual setting, Mooney continues plotting to gain power, and Falcone attempts to change Maroni's plan for the Penguin. Then, Bruce takes a treacherous hike .

tvmaze11_0016_0001_0016.name: The Blind Fortune Teller
tvmaze11_0016_0001_0016.summary: Gordon takes Dr. Leslie Thompkins to the circus, but the day turns quickly when the circus comes under attack. Then, Falcone enlists Butch Gilzean to help Penguin with the night club, while Fish Mooney is otherwise occupied. Also, Bruce Wayne schedules a meeting with the Wayne Enterprises board.

tvmaze11_0017_0001_0017.name: Red Hood
tvmaze11_0017_0001_0017.summary: Following several bank robberies, Gordon and Bullock investigate the Red Hood gang. Selina Kyle continues to bond with Barbara, and Fish Mooney tries to reclaim her position in the underworld.

tvmaze11_0018_0001_0018.name: Everyone Has a Cobblepot
tvmaze11_0018_0001_0018.summary: While Gordon seeks information about the recent controversy with Commissioner Loeb, Fish's allegiance with the prisoners is questioned when she appears to join forces with Dr. Dulmacher. Meanwhile, after an attack close to home, Bruce deals with the aftermath.

tvmaze11_0019_0001_0019.name: Beasts of Prey
tvmaze11_0019_0001_0019.summary: Gordon and Bullock investigate a cold case involving the Ogre, a serial killer who targets young women in Gotham City. Meanwhile, Fish plots her escape from the Dollmaker, and Bruce and Selina confront Reggie.

tvmaze11_0020_0001_0020.name: Under the Knife
tvmaze11_0020_0001_0020.summary: Gordon and Bullock continue to investigate the Ogre, who begins to make his move on someone close to Gordon. Meanwhile, Bruce and Selina team up to expose a corrupt Wayne Enterprises employee and Nygma comes to Kristin Kringle's defense.

tvmaze11_0021_0001_0021.name: The Anvil or the Hammer
tvmaze11_0021_0001_0021.summary: The Ogre breaks down Barbara's emotions, while Gordon and Bullock go to great lengths to track him down. Meanwhile, Penguin leads a massacre, beginning an epic war, while Bruce learns the truth about Wayne Enterprises and Nygma deals with his recent actions.

tvmaze11_0022_0001_0022.name: All Happy Families Are Alike
tvmaze11_0022_0001_0022.summary: The mob war that Oswald has engineered between Falcone and Maroni comes to a startling conclusion when Fish returns from the dead. Meanwhile, Bruce finds his father's secret, and Barbara and Leslie have a heart-to-heart chat.

tvmaze11_0023_0002_0001.name: Rise of the Villains: Damned If You Do
tvmaze11_0023_0002_0001.summary: While Bruce continues to try and penetrate his father's vault, Loeb fires Jim from the force... and Jim takes extreme measures to get reinstated. Meanwhile, Barbara settles in to life at Arkham Asylum and makes several new friends.

tvmaze11_0024_0002_0002.name: Rise of the Villains: Knock Knock
tvmaze11_0024_0002_0002.summary: Theo sends his team of Maniax out on a new assignment, but it's only the prelude to something much larger and bloodier. Meanwhile, Alfred tries to protect Bruce, and turns to Lucius Fox for help.

tvmaze11_0025_0002_0003.name: Rise of the Villains: The Last Laugh
tvmaze11_0025_0002_0003.summary: Jim is reluctant to turn to Oswald for help, so Harvey pays the new crime boss a visit. Meanwhile, Jerome poses as a magician to infiltrate a children's hospital benefit, but discovers that Theo has other plans in store for him.

tvmaze11_0026_0002_0004.name: Rise of the Villains: Strike Force
tvmaze11_0026_0002_0004.summary: The GCPD gets a new captain and he immediately cleans house and brings on Jim as his second-in-command... unaware of Jim's background with the Penguin. Meanwhile, Theo asks the Penguin for a favor, and Bruce and Theo have lunch.

tvmaze11_0027_0002_0005.name: Rise of the Villains: Scarification
tvmaze11_0027_0002_0005.summary: Theo forces Oswald to hire the Pike Brothers to torch select buildings in Gotham, and the Pikes use their sister Bridgit. Meanwhile, Theo asks Jim for his endorsement, Oswald orders Butch to lend a hand, and Leslie invites Edward and Kristen over for fondue.

tvmaze11_0028_0002_0006.name: Rise of the Villains: By Fire
tvmaze11_0028_0002_0006.summary: Jim promises Selina to keep the new Firefly safe, but discovers that the girl doesn't want to turn herself in. Meanwhile, Theo and Silver invite Bruce to dinner, Edward tells Kirsten the truth, and Butch finds out where Gertrude is imprisoned.

tvmaze11_0029_0002_0007.name: Rise of the Villains: Mommy's Little Monster
tvmaze11_0029_0002_0007.summary: Jim begins to realize that Theo has orchestrated everything to become mayor. Meanwhile, Oswald swears revenge on the man who killed his mother, and Edward tries to cover up Kristen's death but faces an opponent that knows his every move.

tvmaze11_0030_0002_0008.name: Rise of the Villains: Tonight's the Night
tvmaze11_0030_0002_0008.summary: While Theo tries to convince Bruce to sign over Wayne Enterprises to him, he sends Barbara as a distraction to keep Jim occupied. Meanwhile, Edward has one last picnic lunch with Kirsten before disposing of her body, and ends up meeting a familiar figure.

tvmaze11_0031_0002_0009.name: Rise of the Villains: A Bitter Pill to Swallow
tvmaze11_0031_0002_0009.summary: While Jim and Barnes takes on hit men sent to kill Jim, Edward convinces Oswald that he has something to live for in Gotham. Meanwhile, Alfred forbids Bruce from seeing Silver again, even though she may hold the key to finding out whose his parents' killer was.

tvmaze11_0032_0002_0010.name: Rise of the Villains: The Son of Gotham
tvmaze11_0032_0002_0010.summary: While Jim and Harvey try to track down the elusive monks performing blood sacrifices, Bruce proposes a new deal with Silver to find out the name of his parents' killers. Meanwhile, Edward gets used to having a roommate.

tvmaze11_0033_0002_0011.name: Rise of the Villains: Worse Than a Crime
tvmaze11_0033_0002_0011.summary: Jim discovers that the Order of Dumas is prepared to sacrifice Bruce at midnight, and turns to Oswald for help. Meanwhile, Leslie gives Jim startling news, Tabitha comes to a decision about her brother, and a new vigilante stalks the streets of Gotham.

tvmaze11_0034_0002_0012.name: Wrath of the Villains: Mr. Freeze
tvmaze11_0034_0002_0012.summary: A new killer stalks the streets of Gotham, freezing victims with liquid helium for his experiments in cyrogenic reanimation. Meanwhile, Jim goes before the board for his actions in taking down Theo, and a captured Oswald is sentenced to Arkham.

tvmaze11_0035_0002_0013.name: Wrath of the Villains: A Dead Man Feels No Cold
tvmaze11_0035_0002_0013.summary: The GCPD take Nora to Arkham when her condition worsens, and Victor breaks into the asylum in his new guise as Mr. Freeze. Meanwhile, Oswald undergoes extreme treatment at Hugo's hands, and Alfred finds the mysterious M. Malone that killed Bruce's parents.

tvmaze11_0036_0002_0014.name: Wrath of the Villains: This Ball of Mud and Meanness
tvmaze11_0036_0002_0014.summary: While Hugo continues Oswald's treatment at Arkham, Bruce goes on a hunt for his parents' killer.

tvmaze11_0037_0002_0015.name: Wrath of the Villains: Mad Grey Dawn
tvmaze11_0037_0002_0015.summary: Jim and Harvey try to track down a bomber who leaves riddles to his crimes. Meanwhile, Oswald pays old friends a visit and is reunited with the father and family that he never knew.

tvmaze11_0038_0002_0016.name: Wrath of the Villains: Prisoners
tvmaze11_0038_0002_0016.summary: While Jim adjusts to life in prison, Harvey makes plans to break his friend out. Meanwhile, Oswald adjusts to family life but discovers that his new relatives have other plans.

tvmaze11_0039_0002_0017.name: Wrath of the Villains: Into the Woods
tvmaze11_0039_0002_0017.summary: Jim discovers who framed him, but it may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Alfred gives Bruce an ultimatum, and Hugo releases Barbara from Arkham.

tvmaze11_0040_0002_0018.name: Wrath of the Villains: Pinewood
tvmaze11_0040_0002_0018.summary: Bruce decrypts some of his father's computer files and learns of the mysterious Pinewood Project. While he and Alfred investigate, Barbara offers to help Jim find the mysterious Philosopher.

tvmaze11_0041_0002_0019.name: Wrath of the Villains: Azrael
tvmaze11_0041_0002_0019.summary: Hugo figures out the key to controlling the resurrected Theo and sends him forth as... Azrael. Meanwhile, Jim tries to convince Barnes that Hugo is responsible for creating monsters, and Bruce begins to learn that the law is insufficient to deal with the threats to Gotham.

tvmaze11_0042_0002_0020.name: Wrath of the Villains: Unleashed
tvmaze11_0042_0002_0020.summary: Bruce convinces Selina to break into Arkham and rescue her friend Bridgit, and along the way Selina encounters an escaping Edward. Meanwhile, the manhunt for Azrael continues and Tabitha agrees to help Jim and Harvey track her brother down.

tvmaze11_0043_0002_0021.name: Wrath of the Villains: A Legion of Horribles
tvmaze11_0043_0002_0021.summary: Bruce, Jim, and Lucius sneak into Arkham to try and find Selena, but Hugo realizes what they're up to and captures them. Meanwhile, Selena offers herself as a servant to Firefly, and Alfred turns to Harvey for help.

tvmaze11_0044_0002_0022.name: Wrath of the Villains: Transference
tvmaze11_0044_0002_0022.summary: Hugo is ordered to destroy Arkham to cover the council's tracks, but Fish's efforts to escape complicate things. Meanwhile, Basil distracts Harvey from investigating Arkham, and Bruce and Lucius fail Edward's quiz.

tvmaze11_0045_0003_0001.name: Mad City: Better to Reign in Hell...
tvmaze11_0045_0003_0001.summary: Six months after the Indian Hill escape, Jim is working as a bounty hunter in Gotham. He teams up with reporter Valerie Vale to track down Fish and her new gang of escapees... all of whom have superpowers. Meanwhile, Bruce and Alfred return from Switzerland to confront the Wayne Enterprises board, and Selina falls in with the wrong crowd.

tvmaze11_0046_0003_0002.name: Mad City: Burn the Witch
tvmaze11_0046_0003_0002.summary: Fish takes control of Harvey and tracks down Hugo, demanding a cure to her condition. Meanwhile, Oswald rallies the citizens against the "monsters" in their midst, and Jim and Barnes are forced to ally to save Harvey.

tvmaze11_0047_0003_0003.name: Mad City: Look Into My Eyes
tvmaze11_0047_0003_0003.summary: Hypnotist Jervis Tetch comes to Gotham looking for his sister Alice, and hires Jim to find her. However, Jervis has some secrets of his own that he doesn't want anyone to find out. Meanwhile, Oswald announces his candidacy for mayor while Jim meets Lee's fiance.

tvmaze11_0048_0003_0004.name: Mad City: New Day Rising
tvmaze11_0048_0003_0004.summary: Bruce and Alfred look for the missing Five, and the trail leads to Selina. Meanwhile, Jervis goes to extreme lengths to recover his sister Alice, and Edward takes extreme steps to convince Oswald how popular he is.

tvmaze11_0049_0003_0005.name: Mad City: Anything for You
tvmaze11_0049_0003_0005.summary: Bruce asks Jim to help find Ivy, while Oswald finds his mayorship threatened when the Red Hood Gang launch a new series of attacks.

tvmaze11_0050_0003_0006.name: Mad City: Follow the White Rabbit
tvmaze11_0050_0003_0006.summary: Jervis forces Jim to choose between the two women that he loves, leading Jim through a maze of tests to determine if he can pick who will live and who will die.

tvmaze11_0051_0003_0007.name: Mad City: Red Queen
tvmaze11_0051_0003_0007.summary: Jervis doses Jim with a powerful hallucinogenic that will burn out his brain, and forces Jim to face some hard truths. Meanwhile, Oswald tries to break up Edward and Isabella, and Bruce has Selina over for dinner.

tvmaze11_0052_0003_0008.name: Mad City: Blood Rush
tvmaze11_0052_0003_0008.summary: The virus begins to consume Barnes, bringing out his inner rage at the guilty. Meanwhile, Jim's first case after he rejoins the GCPD involves him trying to find a killer... unaware that his captain is responsible. And Isabella puts Edward's sanity to the test, unaware that Oswald has his own plans.

tvmaze11_0053_0003_0009.name: Mad City: The Executioner
tvmaze11_0053_0003_0009.summary: Barnes attempts to recruit Jim to his new crusade. Meanwhile, Edward realizes that someone murdered Isabella and confronts Oswald with what he's learned. On the streets, Ivy turns to Selina and Bruce for help after she steals a necklace.

tvmaze11_0054_0003_0010.name: Mad City: Time Bomb
tvmaze11_0054_0003_0010.summary: Someone tries to kill Carmine, but Jim suspects that there's more going on. Meanwhile, Edward goes after the man he believes killed Isabella, and Bruce makes a deal with a faction opposed to the Court of Owls.

tvmaze11_0055_0003_0011.name: Mad City: Beware the Green-Eyed Monster
tvmaze11_0055_0003_0011.summary: Barbara forges a fragile alliance to gain control of the Gotham underworld.. Meanwhile, Jim suspects that Mario is infected with the Tetch virus and tries to stop his marriage to Lee before it's too late.And Bruce, Selina, and Alfred break into the Court of Owls' building to acquire the weapon they need to destroy the organization.

tvmaze11_0056_0003_0012.name: Mad City: Ghosts
tvmaze11_0056_0003_0012.summary: Carmine orders a hit on Jim after Jim is forced to kill Mario. Meanwhile, a follower plans the resurrection of one of Gotham's greatest criminals, and Oswald's facade starts to slip after he sees his father's ghost.

tvmaze11_0057_0003_0013.name: Mad City: Smile Like You Mean It
tvmaze11_0057_0003_0013.summary: When he's unable to resurrect Jerome, Dwight cuts off his face and tries to lead the cult. Meanwhile, Lee reveals a darker side, while Barbara and Tabitha continue to undermine Oswald while following Edward's plan.

tvmaze11_0058_0003_0014.name: Mad City: The Gentle Art of Making Enemies
tvmaze11_0058_0003_0014.summary: Jerome and his acolytes run wild across a darkened Gotham, and Jerome abducts Bruce. Meanwhile, Oswald confronts Edward and the Court begins its move to take control of the city.

tvmaze11_0059_0003_0015.name: Heroes Rise: How the Riddler Got His Name
tvmaze11_0059_0003_0015.summary: Edward goes on a killing spree to discover who he is without Oswald. Meanwhile, Frank tells Jim about the Court of Owls, and Bruce tries to reconnect with Selina.

tvmaze11_0060_0003_0016.name: Heroes Rise: These Delicate and Dark Obsessions
tvmaze11_0060_0003_0016.summary: Jim discovers who ordered his father killed. Meanwhile, Oswald learns the loyalty of his minions, and a Shaman tries to help Bruce overcome the pain of his parents' deaths.

tvmaze11_0061_0003_0017.name: Heroes Rise: The Primal Riddle
tvmaze11_0061_0003_0017.summary: Oswald gathers the first two members of his army of freaks. meanwhile, Edward sets out to solve the riddle of the Court, and Bruce-2 warns Selina about the city's coming demise.

tvmaze11_0062_0003_0018.name: Heroes Rise: Light the Wick
tvmaze11_0062_0003_0018.summary: The Court puts Hugo to work weaponizing the Tetch virus. Meanwhile, Jim tries to learn what the Court plans for Gotham, and the Shaman offers Bruce a release from his emotional pain.

tvmaze11_0063_0003_0019.name: Heroes Rise: All Will Be Judged
tvmaze11_0063_0003_0019.summary: Jim and Harvey discover that Kathryn isn't the Court's leader. Meanwhile, Alfred learns that Bruce isn't who he believed him to be, and Lee realizes who is truly responsible for Mario's death.

tvmaze11_0064_0003_0020.name: Heroes Rise: Pretty Hate Machine
tvmaze11_0064_0003_0020.summary: Edward puts pressure on Selina to find out where Oswald is hiding. Meanwhile, Jim confronts the infected Lee, who sets him up so that he must make a terrible choice if he wants to save the citizens of Gotham from the Tetch virus.

tvmaze11_0065_0003_0021.name: Heroes Rise: Destiny Calling
tvmaze11_0065_0003_0021.summary: Gotham descends into chaos after the spread of the virus. Jim fights for control as he and Harvey try to locate Lee. Meanwhile, Barbara convinces Edward to help her take control of Gotham by obtaining the antidote, only to find Fish and Oswald opposing her.

tvmaze11_0066_0003_0022.name: Heroes Rise: Heavydirtysoul
tvmaze11_0066_0003_0022.summary: Bruce kills Alfred and Ra's promises that they will meet again. Meanwhile, Jim and Harvey make a desperate trade with Edward to get what they need for the antidote, and Butch and Tabitha turn against Barbara.

show_list.name: SIX
show_list.summary: Written by Oscar-nominated screenwriter and Vietnam veteran William Broyles and his son David Broyles, a military special operations veteran, SIX follows a Navy SEAL Team Six, whose 2014 mission to eliminate a Taliban leader in Afghanistan goes awry when they uncover a U.S. citizen working with the terrorists. Stemming from an idea by Harvey Weinstein, the drama is inspired by real missions, capturing SEALs' complex personal lives and the life-and-death decisions they make, with each season set in a different location, starting with Africa.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: U.S. Navy SEAL Team Six troop leader Rip Taggart makes a questionable decision while on a mission in Afghanistan; two years later, Rip is captured by Boko Haram, and it's up to his former SEAL Team Six brothers to locate and rescue him.

last_episode.name: End Game
last_episode.summary: Our Team finally comes face-to-face with Michael and his jihadist soldiers.

tvmaze11311_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze11311_0001_0001_0001.summary: U.S. Navy SEAL Team Six troop leader Rip Taggart makes a questionable decision while on a mission in Afghanistan; two years later, Rip is captured by Boko Haram, and it's up to his former SEAL Team Six brothers to locate and rescue him.

tvmaze11311_0002_0001_0002.name: Her Name is Esther
tvmaze11311_0002_0001_0002.summary: During a tense raid on an oil tanker in Lagos, the SEAL Team attempts to detain a courier for Boko Haram who could be the key to finding Rip's whereabouts.

tvmaze11311_0003_0001_0003.name: Tour of Duty
tvmaze11311_0003_0001_0003.summary: The truth about Rip's departure from SEAL Team Six is revealed, while in Nigeria, Rip makes a move to escape.

tvmaze11311_0004_0001_0004.name: Man Down
tvmaze11311_0004_0001_0004.summary: The race is on to see who can get to Rip first: SEAL Team or Michael?

tvmaze11311_0005_0001_0005.name: Collateral
tvmaze11311_0005_0001_0005.summary: The Team struggles with loss while Rip comes face-to-face with his new captor.

tvmaze11311_0006_0001_0006.name: Confession
tvmaze11311_0006_0001_0006.summary: SEAL Team Six makes a bold decision that could lead to Rip's rescue but could also have grave consequences.

tvmaze11311_0007_0001_0007.name: Blood Brothers
tvmaze11311_0007_0001_0007.summary: The Command has eyes on Rip and our Team plans a rescue. The team decides to risk their own careers to save Rip.

tvmaze11311_0008_0001_0008.name: End Game
tvmaze11311_0008_0001_0008.summary: Our Team finally comes face-to-face with Michael and his jihadist soldiers.

show_list.name: Man with a Plan
show_list.summary: Man with a Plan is a new family comedy about a contractor who learns that parenting his three young children may be the most difficult job he's ever had. Adam feels fully equipped to take on more parenting responsibilities while his self-assured wife, Andi, returns to the workforce after being a stay-at-home mom for 13 years. However, Adam is blindsided by how tough it is to wrangle three messy kids who can't live without Wi-Fi. Their preteen daughter, Kate, is a master manipulator and initially thrilled that "Daddy Fun Times" is taking over, middle child Teddy can't seem to keep his hands out of his pants despite constant reminders, and their precious youngest, Emme, is nervous about starting kindergarten under the stern supervision of Mrs. Rodriguez. In the midst of it all, Adam's older brother and business partner, Don, enjoys giving him terrible advice about how to run his family. But, with Andi's encouragement and advice from a couple of equally stressed parents, Marie and Lowell, Adam takes charge of his brood, lays down the law and discovers he's going to "nail" this job.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: A contractor who starts spending more time with his three kids when his wife, Andi, goes back to work and discovers the truth all parents eventually realize - their little angels are maniacs.

last_episode.name: Buzzer Beater
last_episode.summary: Adam and Andi toy with having another baby when Don and Marcy's newborn grandson comes for a visit.

tvmaze12888_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze12888_0001_0001_0001.summary: A contractor who starts spending more time with his three kids when his wife, Andi, goes back to work and discovers the truth all parents eventually realize - their little angels are maniacs.

tvmaze12888_0002_0001_0002.name: Two Tickets to Paradise
tvmaze12888_0002_0001_0002.summary: Adam gets tickets to a Steelers game and debates who he should take: his wife or his brother.

tvmaze12888_0003_0001_0003.name: The Puppet Theater
tvmaze12888_0003_0001_0003.summary: When Adam gets fed up with endless demands from his daughter's kindergarten teacher, Mrs. Rodriguez, he makes a hasty decision that lands him in hot water with his wife Andi.

tvmaze12888_0004_0001_0004.name: Un-Dressed
tvmaze12888_0004_0001_0004.summary: When Don encourages Adam to clean out his cluttered garage and turn it into a man cave, Adam panics when he thinks he donated one of Andi's treasured keepsakes.

tvmaze12888_0005_0001_0005.name: Thanksgiving
tvmaze12888_0005_0001_0005.summary: Andi has a hard time not taking over when Adam tackles organizing the school's big Thanksgiving feast with Don and Lowell.

tvmaze12888_0006_0001_0006.name: Holey War
tvmaze12888_0006_0001_0006.summary: When the kids won't admit who put a hole in the wall, Adam and Andi team up to get the culprit to confess.

tvmaze12888_0007_0001_0007.name: Winter Has Come
tvmaze12888_0007_0001_0007.summary: When a blizzard prevents the Burns family from visiting the grandparents' house for Christmas, Adam and Andi scramble to avoid an epic holiday disaster.

tvmaze12888_0008_0001_0008.name: Adam Steps Up
tvmaze12888_0008_0001_0008.summary: When Adam's oldest daughter experiences a momentous occasion while Andi is unavailable, he tries to keep his cool and gingerly guide her through it. Also, Andi takes Emme and Teddy to the zoo, but instead gets stuck in traffic along with Emme's annoying talking toy.

tvmaze12888_0009_0001_0009.name: What About Bob?
tvmaze12888_0009_0001_0009.summary: Adam tries to pretend he isn't jealous when he discovers Andi has a close male friend at work.

tvmaze12888_0010_0001_0010.name: A Dinner Gone Wrong
tvmaze12888_0010_0001_0010.summary: When Andi and Marcy realize they were rivals in high school, Adam and Don are dragged into the feud and forced to take sides.

tvmaze12888_0011_0001_0011.name: The Talk
tvmaze12888_0011_0001_0011.summary: When Adam and Andi have the dreaded "talk" with Teddy and Kate, their awkward approach makes the kids horribly uncomfortable.

tvmaze12888_0012_0001_0012.name: The Three Amigos
tvmaze12888_0012_0001_0012.summary: When Andi forces Adam to hang out with Lowell, Don feels left out and Andi has to make peace between them. Also, Mrs. Rodriguez reveals to Andi that she had a sexy dream about Adam.

tvmaze12888_0013_0001_0013.name: Valentine's Day
tvmaze12888_0013_0001_0013.summary: When Adam and Andi's babysitter cancels on Valentine's Day, they try to survive leaving Kate in charge at home for the first time. Also, Don forgets to make romantic plans for Marcy and tries to steal Adam's.

tvmaze12888_0014_0001_0014.name: Kate's First Date
tvmaze12888_0014_0001_0014.summary: When Kate is asked out on her first date, Adam can't curb his overprotective ways. Also, Don enlists Lowell's help to buy the perfect anniversary gift for Marcy.

tvmaze12888_0015_0001_0015.name: Assisted Living
tvmaze12888_0015_0001_0015.summary: When Adam's parents visit unannounced, they reveal surprising plans for their future living arrangements.

tvmaze12888_0016_0001_0016.name: The A Team
tvmaze12888_0016_0001_0016.summary: Adam and Andi are shocked when they finally meet Lowell's wife.

tvmaze12888_0017_0001_0017.name: Doctor No
tvmaze12888_0017_0001_0017.summary: When Adam convinces his stubborn father to finally go to the doctor, he learns a few things his dad didn't want him to know.

tvmaze12888_0018_0001_0018.name: The Blame Game
tvmaze12888_0018_0001_0018.summary: Adam and Don discover a sneaky way of getting out of trouble with their wives.

tvmaze12888_0019_0001_0019.name: Spring Fling
tvmaze12888_0019_0001_0019.summary: When a client doesn't want Don to attend a big meeting, Adam goes to great lengths to protect his brother's feelings. Also, Andi kisses up to Mrs. Rodriguez to ensure Emme gets the best teacher for first grade.

tvmaze12888_0020_0001_0020.name: Dirty Money
tvmaze12888_0020_0001_0020.summary: When Adam and Andi borrow money from Joe to help with a cash flow problem, they soon regret it.

tvmaze12888_0021_0001_0021.name: Operation False Freedom
tvmaze12888_0021_0001_0021.summary: When Adam and Andi discover Kate is lying to them about her whereabouts, they hatch a plan to catch her.

tvmaze12888_0022_0001_0022.name: Buzzer Beater
tvmaze12888_0022_0001_0022.summary: Adam and Andi toy with having another baby when Don and Marcy's newborn grandson comes for a visit.

show_list.name: The Flash
show_list.summary: After a particle accelerator causes a freak storm, CSI Investigator Barry Allen is struck by lightning and falls into a coma. Months later he awakens with the power of super speed, granting him the ability to move through Central City like an unseen guardian angel. Though initially excited by his newfound powers, Barry is shocked to discover he is not the only "meta-human" who was created in the wake of the accelerator explosion -- and not everyone is using their new powers for good. Barry partners with S.T.A.R. Labs and dedicates his life to protect the innocent. For now, only a few close friends and associates know that Barry is literally the fastest man alive, but it won't be long before the world learns what Barry Allen has become...The Flash!

first_episode.name: City of Heroes
first_episode.summary: Barry discovers his powers and puts them to the test, only when he finds its no longer a test but the real thing when he encounters a certain someone.

previous_episode.name: Finish Line
previous_episode.summary: Savitar kills one of the team, and then comes up with a new plan to become a god… and Barry must come up with a way to stop him.

tvmaze13_0001_0001_0001.name: City of Heroes
tvmaze13_0001_0001_0001.summary: Barry discovers his powers and puts them to the test, only when he finds its no longer a test but the real thing when he encounters a certain someone.

tvmaze13_0002_0001_0002.name: Fastest Man Alive
tvmaze13_0002_0001_0002.summary: Barry escorts Iris to a university gathering honoring scientist Simon Stagg. When six gunmen storm the event, Barry changes into The Flash and tries to stop them. While he does save a man’s life, he passes out before he can capture the robbers, which frustrates him. As Dr. Wells, Caitlin and Cisco scramble to find out what’s wrong with Barry, Joe comes down hard on Barry for taking the law into his own hands and risking his life. Barry realizes that it wasn’t six gunmen but a metahuman named Danton Black, who can make multiples of himself. Meanwhile, Iris becomes even more intrigued by the “red streak.”

tvmaze13_0003_0001_0003.name: Things You Can't Outrun
tvmaze13_0003_0001_0003.summary: As Barry and the team at S.T.A.R. Labs work to capture Kyle Nimbus, a.k.a. The Mist, a dangerous new meta-human with toxic gas powers, they revisit the painful night the particle accelerator exploded and killed Caitlin’s fiancé, Ronnie. Meanwhile, Joe decides to finally visit Henry in jail after all these years, but things take a dangerous turn when Kyle shows up looking to punish Joe for arresting him years ago. Meanwhile, Iris and Eddie continue to hide their relationship from Joe.

tvmaze13_0004_0001_0004.name: Going Rogue
tvmaze13_0004_0001_0004.summary: The Flash stops a robbery but the culprits get away after shooting a guard, and The Flash chooses to save the man instead of following the criminals. Joe shows Barry a book of suspects and Barry identifies Leonard Snart as the leader of the group. While investigating the case, Barry gets a surprise visit from an old friend - Felicity Smoak, who heard about his new abilities and came to check them out for herself. She joins him at S.T.A.R. Labs to help stop Snart after it's revealed that Snart his gotten his hands on a stolen "cold gun," which could kill The Flash. Dr. Wells is furious when he finds out that Cisco built the cold gun without telling anyone and now it's missing. Meanwhile, Iris is getting the silent treatment from Joe because of her relationship with Eddie. Finally, The Flash and Captain Cold have an epic confrontation.

tvmaze13_0005_0001_0005.name: Plastique
tvmaze13_0005_0001_0005.summary: After a bomb goes off downtown, the army, led by General Eiling, rolls in and takes over the case, much to Joe's surprise. Suspicious, Joe tells Barry that he and his friends at S.T.A.R. Labs should look into the army's involvement. Wells informs the team that Eiling was experimenting on his men to turn them into super soldiers. Cisco confirms one of Eiling's soldiers, Bette Sans Souci, was at the bomb site. The Flash tracks her down and realizes that she's not setting off the bombs, she is a meta-human who can blow things up just by touching them. Meanwhile, when Joe learns Iris is writing about "the streak," he tells Barry to make her stop. Barry realizes Iris won't listen to him so he decides to have The Flash pay her a visit.

tvmaze13_0006_0001_0006.name: The Flash is Born
tvmaze13_0006_0001_0006.summary: The Flash faces a new meta-human named Tony, who can turn himself into girded steel at will. While Dr. Wells and Caitlin are concerned about Barry's safety, Cisco comes up with a plan to take Tony down. Meanwhile, Iris's blog on The Flash gets her into trouble, and Eddie witnesses Tony's abilities firsthand and begins to ask questions that Joe doesn't want answered. Joe asks Dr. Wells to help him solve Nora Allen's murder.

tvmaze13_0007_0001_0007.name: Power Outage
tvmaze13_0007_0001_0007.summary: The Flash goes up against Farooq aka Blackout, a metahuman who can harness electricity. During their battle, Farooq zaps The Flash and siphons all his electricity, leaving The Flash without his speed. Dr. Wells, Caitlin and Cisco work to reverse the effects on Barry, but their efforts are disrupted when Farooq comes banging on S.T.A.R. Labs doors in search of Wells, who he blames for his accident. Without Barry's powers to protect them, the group must figure out a way to save themselves from the metahuman. Meanwhile, Tockman manages a coup inside the Central City police department and takes several people hostage, including Joe and Iris. While Iris is sure The Flash will save them, Eddie has a trick up his sleeve.

tvmaze13_0008_0001_0008.name: Flash vs. Arrow
tvmaze13_0008_0001_0008.summary: Barry is thrilled when Oliver, Felicity and Diggle come to Central City to investigate a case involving a deadly boomerang. Excited about teaming up with his friend, Barry asks Oliver if he'd like to help him stop Ray Bivolo, the meta-human Barry is currently tracking. Bivolo causes people to lose control of their emotions and has been using that skill to rob banks. Unfortunately, the superhero partnership doesn't go as smoothly as Barry expected. When Oliver tells Barry he still has a lot to learn, Barry sets out to prove him wrong by attempting to stop Bivolo alone. However, when Bivolo infects Barry and sets him on a rage rampage, everyone is in danger, and the only one who can stop him is the Arrow. Meanwhile, Iris is furious when Eddie tries to get a task force to stop The Flash, Joe and Dr. Wells agree the Arrow is a bad influence on Barry, and Caitlin and Cisco deal with a new team in S.T.A.R. Labs.

tvmaze13_0009_0001_0009.name: The Man in the Yellow Suit
tvmaze13_0009_0001_0009.summary: Barry finds himself face-to-face with his nemesis, the man in the yellow suit, a.k.a. Reverse Flash, who killed his mother. Barry is frustrated when the Reverse Flash escapes, but Dr. Wells and Cisco come up with a plan to trap him. All they need is bait, so they turn to Dr. Tina McGee from Mercury Labs to help. Meanwhile, it's Christmas at The West household and Iris is in full holiday cheer. Eddie gives her a surprising gift but also leaves her with a question that could change her life. Joe joins the search for the man in yellow and ends up in the crossfire.

tvmaze13_0010_0001_0010.name: Revenge of the Rogues
tvmaze13_0010_0001_0010.summary: Leonard Snart AKA Captain Cold returns to Central City with a new hotheaded partner in tow - Mick Rory AKA Heat Wave. The duo plan to steal a multi-million dollar painting, but Cold has another agenda while in town - to set a trap for The Flash. Snart and Mick kidnap someone close to The Flash and threaten to kill them unless The Flash shows up for a battle of fire and ice. Barry tells Joe he isn't sure he should take on Snart again after the casualties that happened the last time they fought. Meanwhile, Barry asks Dr. Wells, Caitlin and Cisco to help him double his training efforts so he's ready for the Reverse Flash when he returns to Central City. Iris deals with the aftermath of Barry's confession, and Cisco makes the CCPD a new shield.

tvmaze13_0011_0001_0011.name: The Sound and the Fury
tvmaze13_0011_0001_0011.summary: Dr. Wells' former protégée, Hartley Rathaway, returns to seek revenge on his mentor after being affected by the particle accelerator explosion. Now able to manipulate sound waves, the brilliant Rathaway is a dangerous threat to both Wells and The Flash. Meanwhile, Iris is thrilled when she's hired by the Central City Picture News as their newest cub reporter. Unfortunately, her editor pairs her with a veteran reporter, Mason Bridge, who wants nothing to do with her. Cisco recalls his first day on the job at S.T.A.R. Labs when he met Hartley and Caitlin. Joe asks Eddie for a favor but asks him to keep it a secret from Barry.

tvmaze13_0012_0001_0012.name: Crazy for You
tvmaze13_0012_0001_0012.summary: Caitlin decides that she and Barry need to move on from Ronnie and Iris and find new loves so she takes him for a night out at the local karaoke bar. Caitlin doesn't have any luck making a love connection but Barry meets Linda Park, a sports reporter for the Central City Picture News, and asks her out on a date. When Barry tells Iris he has a date, Iris is surprised by her reaction. Meanwhile, Cisco considers Hartley's dangerous offer and the team searches for Shawna, a meta-human with teleportation powers, who just busted her boyfriend Clay out of Iron Heights. When Henry snoops around in an attempt to help Joe and Barry solve the crime, he ends up in the infirmary after getting roughed up by inmates.

tvmaze13_0013_0001_0013.name: The Nuclear Man
tvmaze13_0013_0001_0013.summary: After Ronnie attacks a physicist, Barry and the team realize they need to go after Caitlin's fiancé who is now a dangerous meta-human. They deduce the best way to track Ronnie is to find Dr. Martin Stein who was working on a project called F.I.R.E.S.T.O.R.M. Barry struggles to balance his duties as The Flash and his relationship with Linda Park, and Joe enlists Cisco's help to reinvestigate the murder of Nora Allen. General Eiling returns to Central City. Glen Winter directed the episode written by Andrew Kreisberg & Katherine Walczak. Original airdate 2/10/2015.

tvmaze13_0014_0001_0014.name: Fallout
tvmaze13_0014_0001_0014.summary: After the nuclear explosion separates Ronnie and Dr. Stein, Barry and the team believe both men are safe. Caitlin is thrilled to have her fiancé back and prepares to resume their life together while Dr. Stein returns to his wife. However, when General Eiling targets Firestorm, Ronnie and Dr. Stein must decide if they are safer together or apart. Meanwhile, Mason Bridge tells Iris that there is something secretive going on at S.T.A.R. Labs and Dr. Stein gives Barry some important information about time travel.

tvmaze13_0015_0001_0015.name: Out of Time
tvmaze13_0015_0001_0015.summary: Mark Mardon aka The Weather Wizard appears in Central City intent on avenging his brother Clyde's death, and sets his sights on Joe, who shot Clyde. When Mardon attacks Joe and Barry, Barry is able to super-speed them to safety but Mardon gets away. Barry warns Joe not to go after a meta-human alone but Joe doesn't listen and ends up in grave danger. Meanwhile, Cisco looks into the night the team captured the Reverse Flash and realizes something doesn't add up and begins to wonder whether Joe was right about Dr. Wells. Barry and Linda end up on an awkward double date with Eddie and Iris.

tvmaze13_0016_0001_0016.name: Rogue Time
tvmaze13_0016_0001_0016.summary: The Flash learns that Captain Cold and Heat Wave have returned to Central City. This time Snart has brought along his baby sister Lisa to help wreak havoc on the city.

tvmaze13_0017_0001_0017.name: Tricksters
tvmaze13_0017_0001_0017.summary: Copycat killer who goes by the name "The Trickster" starts setting off bombs in Central City. In order to stop the villain, Barry and Joe meet with the original Trickster, a criminal mastermind named James Jesse, who has been imprisoned for 20 years. Things quickly go from bad to worse when the Tricksters unite and take Henry prisoner. Meanwhile, Iris asks Eddie for help with a case, and flashbacks show how Harrison Wells came up with the idea for the particle accelerator.

tvmaze13_0018_0001_0018.name: All Star Team Up
tvmaze13_0018_0001_0018.summary: Barry is surprised when Felicity Smoak arrives from Starling City along with her boyfriend, Ray Palmer, who flies in as the Atom. They've come to visit S.T.A.R. Labs as Ray needs help with his suit. Their timing turns out to be fortuitous because it's all hands on deck after a meta human named Brie Larvin unleashes hundreds of robotic bees to attack and kill her former co-workers, including Dr. Tina McGee. A group dinner with Barry, Felicity, Ray, Iris and Eddie turns into a disaster.

tvmaze13_0019_0001_0019.name: Who is Harrison Wells?
tvmaze13_0019_0001_0019.summary: Joe and Cisco head to Starling City to continue their investigation of Dr. Wells. While in town, the duo enlists the help of Captain Lance, and Cisco meets the Black Canary, who asks him for a favor. Meanwhile, back in Central City, Barry races to catch a meta-human named Hannibal Bates who can transform himself into every person he touches - which includes Eddie, Iris, Caitlin and even The Flash.

tvmaze13_0020_0001_0020.name: The Trap
tvmaze13_0020_0001_0020.summary: Barry, Caitlin, Cisco and Joe set a trap for Wells. Cisco uses himself as prey which puts him in grave danger. Meanwhile, Eddie makes a decision regarding Iris, which leaves Joe a bit unsettled.

tvmaze13_0021_0001_0021.name: Grodd Lives
tvmaze13_0021_0001_0021.summary: Barry must deal with the Reverse Flash's latest threat to a member of the group. To make matter worse, Dr. Wells unleashes Grodd on the city in order to distract Barry and the team. Joe, Barry and Cisco head down into the sewers to catch Grodd but the gorilla quickly gets the upper hand after he kidnaps Joe. Iris and Barry have a heart to heart talk.

tvmaze13_0022_0001_0022.name: Rogue Air
tvmaze13_0022_0001_0022.summary: As Wells once again gets the upper hand on the S.T.A.R. Labs team, Barry realizes he needs to make a big move and reaches out to an old foe, Captain Cold, for help. Joe and Caitlin warn Barry that Cold can't be trusted. True to form, Cold has his own agenda that involves the meta-humans trapped in the containment cells. As things seem to be going from bad to worse, The Flash gets reinforcements - Arrow and Firestorm.

tvmaze13_0023_0001_0023.name: Fast Enough
tvmaze13_0023_0001_0023.summary: Harrison presents Barry with an impossible choice: save Nora and create an alternate timeline, while letting Harrison escape. or let his mother die as she did in the original timeline.

tvmaze13_0024_0002_0001.name: The Man Who Saved Central City
tvmaze13_0024_0002_0001.summary: Six months after the Flash and his friends stop the Singularity, Central City holds a rally in the speedster's honor. However, Barry doesn't want to go given the sacrifice that was made by the true hero. Meanwhile, a new metahuman, Atom Smasher, sets out to kill the Flash.

tvmaze13_0025_0002_0002.name: Flash of Two Worlds
tvmaze13_0025_0002_0002.summary: The team's visitor, Jay Garrick, explains that he comes from a parallel world and was a speedster there, but lost his powers transitioning over. Now he insists that Barry needs his help fighting a new metahuman, Sand Demon, who came from Jay's world. Meanwhile, Officer Patty Spivot tries to join Joe's Metahuman Taskforce.

tvmaze13_0026_0002_0003.name: Family of Rogues
tvmaze13_0026_0002_0003.summary: Lisa Snart, aka Golden Glider, comes to the team for help when her brother Captain Cold is kidnapped. However, the Flash soon discovers that the villain is working for his father Lewis, who has some mysterious hold over him. Meanwhile, Caitlin and Jay work together to build a speed cannon so that Jay can return to Earth-2, and Joe tells Iris the truth about her mother.

tvmaze13_0027_0002_0004.name: The Fury of Firestorm
tvmaze13_0027_0002_0004.summary: Martin begins to destabilize without Ronnie to merge with him, and the team desperately seek out another metahuman with similar abilities. They find two men: Henry Hewitt and Jefferson "Jax" Jackson. Meanwhile, Iris does some digging into Francine's past, and Barry is hesitant to become involved with Patty after what happened between him and Iris.

tvmaze13_0028_0002_0005.name: The Darkness and the Light
tvmaze13_0028_0002_0005.summary: Barry battles another breacher, Doctor Light... and discovers that she's Linda's evil counterpart. Meanwhile, the team deals with a new Harrison Wells in their midst, and Barry asks Patty out on a date.

tvmaze13_0029_0002_0006.name: Enter Zoom
tvmaze13_0029_0002_0006.summary: After Dr. Light escapes from her pipeline cell, Barry asks Linda to help them lure Zoom to their world. Meanwhile, the team questions Harrison's motives and Cisco tries to use his powers on the Earth-2 visitor.

tvmaze13_0030_0002_0007.name: Gorilla Warfare
tvmaze13_0030_0002_0007.summary: While Harrison tells the team that he's heading back to Earth 2 now that they've failed to stop Zoom, Grodd launches a new series of attacks in an attempt to gain the chemicals that he needs to augment his intelligence. Meanwhile, Barry deals with his loss of self-confidence after Zoom cripples him, and Iris calls in a familiar face to help.

tvmaze13_0031_0002_0008.name: Legends of Today. Part 1
tvmaze13_0031_0002_0008.summary: Barry and Cisco take Kendra to Oliver and his team, looking for protection when a mysterious immortal comes seeking Kendra. However, a figure from her past arrives to tell her the truth. Meanwhile, Jay refuses to help Harrison test his new speed-enhancement serum, Velocity-6.

tvmaze13_0032_0002_0009.name: Running to Stand Still
tvmaze13_0032_0002_0009.summary: Weather Wizard frees Captain Cold and Trickster from prison to help him get revenge on the Flash, but Cold has second thoughts. Meanwhile, iris tells Joe about the son he never knew he had, and Patty confronts the man who killed her father.

tvmaze13_0033_0002_0010.name: Potential Energy
tvmaze13_0033_0002_0010.summary: The Flash and his friends go up against a new meta-human, the Turtle. Meanwhile, Caitlin discovers the source of Jay's problems, and Patty questions whether she and Barry can have a relationship.

tvmaze13_0034_0002_0011.name: The Reverse-Flash Returns
tvmaze13_0034_0002_0011.summary: Eobard Thawne--Reverse-Flash--kidnaps Dr. McGee and forces her to find a way to send him back to his own time. Flash and his friends discover that Reverse-Flash is from a timeline before he killed Barry's mother, and realize that they may have no choice but to send him back. Meanwhile, Harry and Cisco work to stabilize Cisco's vibe power, and Caitlin desperately tries to find a cure for Jay's illness.

tvmaze13_0035_0002_0012.name: Fast Lane
tvmaze13_0035_0002_0012.summary: While Flash takes on a new meta, dubbed Tar Pit, Barry offers to help Harry come up with a way to seal the breaches. He's unaware that Harry has secretly siphoned off some of Barry's speed... and plans to remove the rest.

tvmaze13_0036_0002_0013.name: Welcome to Earth-2
tvmaze13_0036_0002_0013.summary: Barry and Cisco travel to Earth-2 with Harry to rescue his daughter, and discover a strange world where friends are enemies and enemies are even worse. Meanwhile, Caitlin help Jay regain his speed so that he can deal with a new metahuman menace, Geomancer.

tvmaze13_0037_0002_0014.name: Escape from Earth-2
tvmaze13_0037_0002_0014.summary: While Cisco and Harry go looking for a captive Barry, Barry makes contact with the masked prisoner and learns that he is connected with Jay. Meanwhile, On Earth-1, Caitlin perfects Velocity-9 so that Jay can go up against Geomancer before he brings Central City down.

tvmaze13_0038_0002_0015.name: King Shark
tvmaze13_0038_0002_0015.summary: King Shark escapes from ARGUS captivity and makes his way to Central City to kill the Flash. However, the hero and his friends are preoccupied with the recent death of one of their own. Meanwhile, Wally resents Barry's presence in his family.

tvmaze13_0039_0002_0016.name: Trajectory
tvmaze13_0039_0002_0016.summary: A new speedster arrives in Central City and spreads chaos wherever she goes. Flash takes the blame, and Iris' editor plans to write an expose on the hero. Meanwhile, Jesse discovers how far her father will go to protect her.

tvmaze13_0040_0002_0017.name: Flash Back
tvmaze13_0040_0002_0017.summary: When Barry reaches a dead end in going faster, he decides to travel into the past and trick Eobard Thawne--posing as Harrison Wells--into showing him how to go faster. However, something, in the timestream follows Barry back... and it's not friendly.

tvmaze13_0041_0002_0018.name: Versus Zoom
tvmaze13_0041_0002_0018.summary: With Harry's help, Barry becomes fast enough to stop Zoom. Using Vibe's powers, the team contacts Zoom on the other Earth and use his past to trap him. But Zoom manages to escape their trap and takes one of them hostage to force Barry to give up his speed.

tvmaze13_0042_0002_0019.name: Back to Normal
tvmaze13_0042_0002_0019.summary: Barry tries to cope with a life without superspeed, but finds himself forced to don the Flash suit when a metahuman abducts Harry believing that he's Harrison Wells. Meanwhile, Wally asks Joe to arrange a meeting for him with Flash, and Caitlin tries to escape her captivity.

tvmaze13_0043_0002_0020.name: Rupture
tvmaze13_0043_0002_0020.summary: Zoom begins his reign of terror, unleashing the Earth Two version of Cisco's brother Dante on the populace. Meanwhile, Barry debates whether to undergo the dangerous process Harry has created to give him back his speed.

tvmaze13_0044_0002_0021.name: The Runaway Dinosaur
tvmaze13_0044_0002_0021.summary: While Barry is trapped in the Speed Force, his friends desperately try to bring him home... only to discover that he may not want to leave. Meanwhile, the particle experiment reanimates one of the team's old foes, who is obsessed with finding Iris.

tvmaze13_0045_0002_0022.name: Invincible
tvmaze13_0045_0002_0022.summary: The Earth Two metahumans attack Central City en masse, and Barry is oddly confident that the team can handle them. Meanwhile, Cisco has vibes of an ominous future, and meets the Earth Two counterpart of a woman he loved.

tvmaze13_0046_0002_0023.name: The Race of His Life
tvmaze13_0046_0002_0023.summary: The team discovers what Zoom is up to, and why he wants Barry to race him. When they realize that Barry is out of control after the death of someone close to him, they lock Barry up for his own safety rather than let him participate in a race he can't win.

tvmaze13_0047_0003_0001.name: Flashpoint
tvmaze13_0047_0003_0001.summary: After preventing his mother's death and altering history, Barry has a perfect life in the resulting timeline. But memory losses suggest that the danger isn't yet over.

tvmaze13_0048_0003_0002.name: Paradox
tvmaze13_0048_0003_0002.summary: Barry discovers that he didn't restore the timeline as it originally was, and tries to reconcile the difference. Meanwhile, the Edward Clariss of the new timeline teams up with a new villain to bring Flash down.

tvmaze13_0049_0003_0003.name: Magenta
tvmaze13_0049_0003_0003.summary: A new metahuman, Magenta, unleashes a magnetic wave of terror on the city. Meanwhile, Harry and Jesse come over from Earth-2 and reveal that Jesse now has superspeed... and Wally wonders if he gained the same power.

tvmaze13_0050_0003_0004.name: The New Rogues
tvmaze13_0050_0003_0004.summary: Taking the name of Jesse Quick and donning a mask, Jesse offers to help Barry against two metas, Mirror Master and Top. However, her inexperience puts her in danger and gets Flash trapped in a mirror. Meanwhile, Harry, Cisco, and Caitlin search the other Earths for a replacement for a Harry.

tvmaze13_0051_0003_0005.name: Monster
tvmaze13_0051_0003_0005.summary: A monster appears in downtown Central City and Julian vows to find the person responsible. While Flash tries to deal with the creature, Cisco tries to deal with his new teammate H.R. and realizes that he's hiding something.

tvmaze13_0052_0003_0006.name: Shade
tvmaze13_0052_0003_0006.summary: While Barry tries to deal with a new metahuman, Shade, Alchemy tries to convince Wally to join him and gain the powers that he had in Flashpoint.

tvmaze13_0053_0003_0007.name: Killer Frost
tvmaze13_0053_0003_0007.summary: Flash discovers that he's powerless against Savitar's superior speed, but other matters take precedence when Caitlin turns into Killer Frost and goes on a rampage trying to find Alchemy.

tvmaze13_0054_0003_0008.name: Invasion!
tvmaze13_0054_0003_0008.summary: The alien Dominators land on Earth, and Barry realizes that he can't fight them alone. He summons Green Arrow and his teammates, and then the Legends, and then Supergirl from her Earth. However, the discovery of future-Barry's message forces Barry to reveal that he may have altered all of their lives when he changed the timeline, sowing the seeds of mistrust.

tvmaze13_0055_0003_0009.name: The Present
tvmaze13_0055_0003_0009.summary: As Christmas arrives, the team discovers Alchemy's identity. Jay travels from Earth 3 to lend the team a hand against Savitar, while Joe forbids Wally from helping.

tvmaze13_0056_0003_0010.name: Borrowing Problems from the Future
tvmaze13_0056_0003_0010.summary: Barry finally tells Iris and the others--except Joe--what he saw in the future. Together they st out to stop that future from coming to pass. Meanwhile, Caitlin invites Julian to join Team Flash, and H.R. prepares to open the museum.

tvmaze13_0057_0003_0011.name: Dead or Alive
tvmaze13_0057_0003_0011.summary: A "collector" from Earth-19 arrives to take H.R. to pay with his life for traveling between dimensions. While Cisco challenges her to a trial by combat, Iris sets out to make her mark on the world before the future that Barry saw comes to pass.

tvmaze13_0058_0003_0012.name: Untouchable
tvmaze13_0058_0003_0012.summary: A new metahuman, Clive York, goes after the alternates of the people that wronged him in Flashpoint. Meanwhile, Iris and Barry finally tell Joe about what Barry saw in the future.

tvmaze13_0059_0003_0013.name: Attack on Gorilla City
tvmaze13_0059_0003_0013.summary: Barry, Cisco, Caitlin, and Julian travel to Gorilla City on Earth 2 to rescue Harrison. However, they are soon captured and Barry is forced to fight a battle to the death against the gorillas' ruler, Solovar.

tvmaze13_0060_0003_0014.name: Attack on Central City
tvmaze13_0060_0003_0014.summary: Barry considers killing Grodd to stop him, but Harry convinces him that there's always another way. Meanwhile, Jesse tells her father that she's staying on Earth-1 and is surprised at his reaction.

tvmaze13_0061_0003_0015.name: The Wrath of Savitar
tvmaze13_0061_0003_0015.summary: The team is forced to use Julian as a conduit to Savitar to question the God of Speed. Meanwhile, Wally is haunted by visions of Savitar that slowly become more real.

tvmaze13_0062_0003_0016.name: Into the Speed Force
tvmaze13_0062_0003_0016.summary: Barry enters the Speed Force to rescue Wally, and meets some familiar faces. Meanwhile, Jesse ignores H.R.'s advice and sets out to find and defeat Savitar on her own.

tvmaze13_0063_0003_0017.name: Duet
tvmaze13_0063_0003_0017.summary: When Mon-El and Hank bring Kara to Earth-1 to ask Team Flash for help, Music Meister puts Barry under his spell as well and traps him and Kara in a musical where they have to finish the story to escape... and if they die in the musical then they die in real life as well. This story line started at the end of Supergirl: "Star-Crossed", Season 2, Episode 16.

tvmaze13_0064_0003_0018.name: Abra Kadabra
tvmaze13_0064_0003_0018.summary: A new villain, Abra Kadabra, seeking out high-tech items. When Flash captures him, Abra offers the speedster Savitar's name if Flash lets him go. Meanwhile, Julian is forced to operate on a badly injured Caitlin.

tvmaze13_0065_0003_0019.name: The Once and Future Flash
tvmaze13_0065_0003_0019.summary: Barry travels to 2024 to discover who Savitar is and use the information to save Iris. However, he soon discovers that Team Flash was destroyed when Iris was killed... and Barry is responsible. Meanwhile, Killer Frost finds someone who can give her what she wants.

tvmaze13_0066_0003_0020.name: I Know Who You Are
tvmaze13_0066_0003_0020.summary: The team finds Tracy Brand, the woman that Future-Barry said would be able to imprison Savitar four years in the future. However, Savitar intends to kill Tracy and is using Killer Frost to do so. Meanwhile, Cecile tells Joe that she loves him and he freezes up.

tvmaze13_0067_0003_0021.name: Cause and Effect
tvmaze13_0067_0003_0021.summary: Cisco comes up with a plan to stop Savitar involving preventing Barry from forming short-term memories. However, the plan doesn't go as intended. Meanwhile, Killer Frost returns to S.T.A.R. Labs to help the team.

tvmaze13_0068_0003_0022.name: Infantino Street
tvmaze13_0068_0003_0022.summary: With 24 hours left to save Iris, Barry recruits Len Snart from the past to steal a Dominator power cell from ARGUS. Meanwhile, Joe and Kid Flash take Iris somewhere that Savitar can't find her, and Killer Frost calls Vibe out to kill him... and the last vestiges of her old self.

tvmaze13_0069_0003_0023.name: Finish Line
tvmaze13_0069_0003_0023.summary: Savitar kills one of the team, and then comes up with a new plan to become a god… and Barry must come up with a way to stop him.

show_list.name: 60 Days In
show_list.summary: A&E Network presents 60 Days In, an unprecedented new, original docu-series following seven innocent participants who enter the dangerous world of incarceration at the Clark County Jail in Jeffersonville, Indiana, in an effort to expose internal issues and what really happens behind bars. As a result of the facility's recent corrupt history, Sheriff Jamey Noel has devised a program where seven participants will live among the facility's general population for 60 days without officers, fellow inmates, or staff knowing their secret. Around-the-clock cameras captured this unparalleled access in an effort to bring problems to light and give viewers a first-hand look as the participants adapt to unfamiliar and terrifying surroundings. 60 Days In is a warts-and-all view of what life is like behind bars, through the eyes of people who have never been charged with a crime or done time.

first_episode.name: Unusual Suspects
first_episode.summary: Sheriff Jamey Noel has devised an unprecedented program to root out crime and corruption in the Clark County Jail. His plan is to send seven civilian volunteers into jail as undercover inmates. The participants all have unique motivations for joining the program, and have been given cover stories, training on the rules of inmate culture, and instructions on how to stay safe. Now they just have to convince the inmates and the officers that they are real inmates.

last_episode.name: The Aftermath
last_episode.summary: The eight participants from Season 3 come together with Col. Mark Adger to discuss how they assimilated, survived and navigated the challenges of being an inmate at the Fulton County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0001_0001_0001.name: Unusual Suspects
tvmaze13105_0001_0001_0001.summary: Sheriff Jamey Noel has devised an unprecedented program to root out crime and corruption in the Clark County Jail. His plan is to send seven civilian volunteers into jail as undercover inmates. The participants all have unique motivations for joining the program, and have been given cover stories, training on the rules of inmate culture, and instructions on how to stay safe. Now they just have to convince the inmates and the officers that they are real inmates.

tvmaze13105_0002_0001_0002.name: First Timers
tvmaze13105_0002_0001_0002.summary: Sheriff Jamey Noel's program is underway. Zac, a Marine, Tami, a police officer, Robert, a teacher, and Barbra, a stay-at-home mom, are the first participants in. Will they make it through the first 24 hours inside?

tvmaze13105_0003_0001_0003.name: Cell Shock
tvmaze13105_0003_0001_0003.summary: Maryum, the eldest daughter of boxer Muhammad Ali, joins the program and fits into F-pod effortlessly; the inmates grow suspicious of Robert; a mistake places Zac in peril; Barbra questions her commitment to the experiment.

tvmaze13105_0004_0001_0004.name: Fight Face
tvmaze13105_0004_0001_0004.summary: Isaiah and Robert worry that their covers may be blown; Capt. Maples follows through with consequences after Robert makes a risky move; Zac hunts for illegal drug use in C-pod; Tami clashes with another inmate.

tvmaze13105_0005_0001_0005.name: Friends Without Benefits
tvmaze13105_0005_0001_0005.summary: An unexpected call to court tests Zac's strength as an inmate; Barbra abandons a friendship with Tami in order to survive; a series of catastrophic mistakes endangers Jeff.

tvmaze13105_0006_0001_0006.name: Full Inmate
tvmaze13105_0006_0001_0006.summary: As the participants approach the midway point, tension and anger grow among the women in F-Pod, while one of the men finds himself in imminent danger from the inmates in C-Pod.

tvmaze13105_0007_0001_0007.name: Pod Drama
tvmaze13105_0007_0001_0007.summary: Inmate Ricky attacks Jeff, jeopardizing the program; Zac and Isaiah move from the familiar confines of C-Pod to the more violent D-Pod; Barbra feels betrayed by her F-Pod bunkmates; Robert learns that he will return to general population.

tvmaze13105_0008_0001_0008.name: Shakedown
tvmaze13105_0008_0001_0008.summary: The participants cross the halfway point of the experiment; the sheriff orders a raid due to increased tensions and drug activity in D-pod; the residents of F-pod worry about a contagious rash.

tvmaze13105_0009_0001_0009.name: Alone for the Holidays
tvmaze13105_0009_0001_0009.summary: Thanksgiving presents new opportunities and challenges for the six remaining participants, and one of them is pushed to a breaking point.

tvmaze13105_0010_0001_0010.name: Institutionalized
tvmaze13105_0010_0001_0010.summary: As the participants near the end of their time in jail, tension in F-Pod pushes one woman over the edge and compromises the program, while both men in D-Pod struggle to avoid criminal activity that may have serious consequences

tvmaze13105_0011_0001_0011.name: 11th Hour
tvmaze13105_0011_0001_0011.summary: As pressure builds in each of the jail's pods, the five remaining participants in the program try to finish up their final few days inside.

tvmaze13105_0012_0001_0012.name: Exodus
tvmaze13105_0012_0001_0012.summary: Three participants remain in Clark County Jail. One of the women in F-Pod is released, leaving Tami on the verge of a meltdown. Meanwhile in D-Pod, with one pod boss removed and another claiming power, there is a constant threat of violence.

tvmaze13105_0013_0001_0013S04.name: The Full Story - Robert, Tami and Barbra
tvmaze13105_0013_0001_0013S04.summary: Three members of the group offer insight about their time behind bars.

tvmaze13105_0013_0001_0013S05.name: The Full Story - Zac, Isaiah, Jeff and Maryum
tvmaze13105_0013_0001_0013S05.summary: Three members of the group offer insight about their time behind bars.

tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S06.name: Season 2 Cast Revealed 1
tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S06.summary: Sneak peek #1 at the upcoming second season of this series.

tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S07.name: Season 2 Cast Revealed 2
tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S07.summary: Sneak peek #2 at the upcoming second season of this series.

tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S08.name: Where Are They Now?
tvmaze13105_0013_0002_0013S08.summary: Six months after spending time under cover in Indiana's Clark County Jail, the seven participants in the unprecedented program find their lives permanently changed.

tvmaze13105_0014_0002_0001.name: Meet the Participants
tvmaze13105_0014_0002_0001.summary: A former corrections officer, a bounty hunter and a young lawyer join others in the new group of innocent civilians selected to secretly live among the general population of Indiana's Clark County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0015_0002_0002.name: Re-entry
tvmaze13105_0015_0002_0002.summary: A former corrections officer, a bounty hunter and a young lawyer join others in the new group of innocent civilians selected to secretly live among the general population of Indiana's Clark County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0016_0002_0003.name: Friend or Foe
tvmaze13105_0016_0002_0003.summary: As three new participants enter the program, the others fight for acceptance in the pods. One participant is forced into a confrontation that quickly turns physical.

tvmaze13105_0017_0002_0004.name: All Pain, No Gain
tvmaze13105_0017_0002_0004.summary: Jail life takes a physical toll on Monalisa; Sheri watches out for Mackenzie; Ashleigh faces the aftermath of a difficult first night; Ryan's cellmate has a violent confrontation with another inmate; Quintin attempts to call his daughter.

tvmaze13105_0018_0002_0005.name: Hazed and Confused
tvmaze13105_0018_0002_0005.summary: Hazing, drug use and violence envelop Clark County Jail; two participants consider dropping out of the program.

tvmaze13105_0019_0002_0006.name: Pod Wars
tvmaze13105_0019_0002_0006.summary: Chaos ensues in the Clark County Jail when two pod bosses threaten the safety of three of the participants.

tvmaze13105_0020_0002_0007.name: Criminal Justice
tvmaze13105_0020_0002_0007.summary: The jailed civilians deal with harassment, violence and the stress of incarceration as they continue to grind out their time; two of the participants approach a tipping point.

tvmaze13105_0021_0002_0008.name: Dangerous Loyalty
tvmaze13105_0021_0002_0008.summary: The remaining six participants face turning points; Ashleigh has a life-altering realization; Quintin and Sheri feel conflicted as they go deep under cover; Monalisa and Dion realize that they cannot escape their pasts.

tvmaze13105_0022_0002_0009.name: Institutional Knowledge
tvmaze13105_0022_0002_0009.summary: New challenges arise after the men switch pods; the women suspect a snitch in their midst.

tvmaze13105_0023_0002_0010.name: Sewer Gate
tvmaze13105_0023_0002_0010.summary: Ryan, Quintin and the other inmates of C-Pod wake up to raw sewage spewing out of their floor drain; as the odious situation threatens to invade F-Pod, the jail's water supply is shut off.

tvmaze13105_0024_0002_0011.name: Trouble in Store
tvmaze13105_0024_0002_0011.summary: Following the repair of the sewer line, the participants return to their pods only to encounter new challenges and threats.

tvmaze13105_0025_0002_0012.name: Blood, Debt and Tears
tvmaze13105_0025_0002_0012.summary: Tension is running high in the pods as the six remaining participants enter their final days in the Clark County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0026_0002_0013.name: Bed and Baggage
tvmaze13105_0026_0002_0013.summary: The three remaining participants gather evidence; conflict is narrowly avoided before names are called.

tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014.name: The Aftermath
tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014.summary: Following the end of the program, the eight participants meet with Sheriff Noel and Capt. Maples to discuss their journey as inmates and what they discovered while in the Clark County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S09.name: Best of Clark County
tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S09.summary: A collection of memorable moments from the first two seasons of the series.

tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S10.name: The Full Story - Ashleigh, Sheri, Chris, Ryan
tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S10.summary: Civilians who went under cover in Indiana's Clark County Jail describe the experience of living behind bars.

tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S11.name: The Full Story - Dion, Brian, Monalisa, Quintin
tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S11.summary: Civilians who went under cover in Indiana's Clark County Jail describe the experience of living behind bars.

tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S12.name: Where Are They Now?
tvmaze13105_0027_0002_0014S12.summary: Seven months after spending time under cover in Indiana's Clark County Jail, the eight participants in Phase Two of the program share their perspectives; the reunited friends throw an engagement party for Dion and his fiancee.

tvmaze13105_0028_0003_0001.name: Fulton County Jail: Welcome to the A-T-L
tvmaze13105_0028_0003_0001.summary: Innocent civilians selected to infiltrate Atlanta's Fulton County Jail include a special-education teacher who works with at-risk youth and a former corrections officer who wants to see what it is like when the roles are reversed.

tvmaze13105_0029_0003_0002.name: Truth or Dare
tvmaze13105_0029_0003_0002.summary: The first five participants enter the Fulton County Jail and are immediately met with drug use, sexual behavior and what it feels like to be locked in a cell for 12 hours.

tvmaze13105_0030_0003_0003.name: Trust Issues
tvmaze13105_0030_0003_0003.summary: As participants settle into Fulton County Jail and new ones enter, inmate suspicions and power-plays keep everyone on edge.

tvmaze13105_0031_0003_0004.name: Cellies
tvmaze13105_0031_0003_0004.summary: Lockdowns result following a violent fight in the women's pod and an abuse of power in pod 600, proving that the luck of the draw with cellmates directly influences the jail experience.

tvmaze13105_0032_0003_0005.name: Dangerous Liaisons
tvmaze13105_0032_0003_0005.summary: The participants make uneasy alliances that could put them at risk, and face difficult obstacles in order to survive life on the inside.

tvmaze13105_0033_0003_0006.name: Vulnerable Positions
tvmaze13105_0033_0003_0006.summary: A flood in the South Annex, escalating problems with cellmates, and respect issues push our participants to the brink of despair in the Fulton County Jail.

tvmaze13105_0034_0003_0007.name: Tapping Out
tvmaze13105_0034_0003_0007.summary: The male participants in 500 suspect each other of being in the program, while the women struggle to continue, and one may even drop out.

tvmaze13105_0035_0003_0008.name: Bloods Rising
tvmaze13105_0035_0003_0008.summary: The participants at the Fulton County Jail find that small mistakes can have big consequences, as the Bloods in 500 continue to rise to power.

tvmaze13105_0036_0003_0009.name: Code Red
tvmaze13105_0036_0003_0009.summary: Inmates escape their restraints during a chaotic mass evacuation drill in 500; Mauri and Michelle are placed in a vulnerable position after a rumor spreads about the program in the women's pod.

tvmaze13105_0037_0003_0010.name: The Marine Test
tvmaze13105_0037_0003_0010.summary: An uproar results when an inmate claims to be a Marine; Jon gets taken advantage of by a new inmate with the same name; Michelle gets caught in the middle of a drug deal gone wrong.

tvmaze13105_0038_0003_0011.name: High Times
tvmaze13105_0038_0003_0011.summary: Participants Matt and Michelle face tough choices regarding drug use that put their safety, and time in the program, at risk.

tvmaze13105_0039_0003_0012.name: In or Out?
tvmaze13105_0039_0003_0012.summary: The participants endure their final days at the Fulton County Jail; one of them has to make the tough decision to stay another 60 days.

tvmaze13105_0040_0003_0013.name: The Aftermath
tvmaze13105_0040_0003_0013.summary: The eight participants from Season 3 come together with Col. Mark Adger to discuss how they assimilated, survived and navigated the challenges of being an inmate at the Fulton County Jail.

show_list.name: Marvel's Daredevil
show_list.summary: Matt Murdock, a Marvel Comics hero who's a lawyer by day but fights the bad guys at night to avenge the murder of his father, a boxer. But what sets Matt apart from most superheroes isn't his back story it's his handicap. Matt is blind, the result of a childhood accident that may have removed his ability to see but gifted him with heightened senses of touch, taste, hearing and smell.

first_episode.name: Into the Ring
first_episode.summary: Matt Murdock, a Marvel Comics hero who's a lawyer by day but fights the bad guys at night to avenge the murder of his father, a boxer. But what sets Matt apart from most superheroes isn't his back story it's his handicap. Matt is blind, the result of a childhood accident that may have removed his ability to see but gifted him with heightened senses of touch, taste, hearing and smell.

last_episode.name: A Cold Day in Hell's Kitchen
last_episode.summary: Daredevil battles the Hand--with Elektra at his side--and discovers that the price of victory may prove too high to accept.

tvmaze1369_0001_0001_0001.name: Into the Ring
tvmaze1369_0001_0001_0001.summary: Matt Murdock, a Marvel Comics hero who's a lawyer by day but fights the bad guys at night to avenge the murder of his father, a boxer. But what sets Matt apart from most superheroes isn't his back story it's his handicap. Matt is blind, the result of a childhood accident that may have removed his ability to see but gifted him with heightened senses of touch, taste, hearing and smell.

tvmaze1369_0002_0001_0002.name: Cut Man
tvmaze1369_0002_0001_0002.summary: As Claire nurses Matt back to health, she discovers that her patient is much more than an ordinary man. Meanwhile, Matt recalls the events that led to him becoming Daredevil.

tvmaze1369_0003_0001_0003.name: Rabbit in a Snowstorm
tvmaze1369_0003_0001_0003.summary: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.

tvmaze1369_0004_0001_0004.name: In the Blood
tvmaze1369_0004_0001_0004.summary: Daredevil goes after the Russians who have abducted Claire. Meanwhile, Wilson goes on a dinner date with Vanessa.

tvmaze1369_0005_0001_0005.name: World on Fire
tvmaze1369_0005_0001_0005.summary: Fisk moves forward with plans that threaten to rip Hell's Kitchen apart. Murdock and Foggy take on a case helping tenants victimized by a slumlord.

tvmaze1369_0006_0001_0006.name: Condemned
tvmaze1369_0006_0001_0006.summary: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.

tvmaze1369_0007_0001_0007.name: Stick
tvmaze1369_0007_0001_0007.summary: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.

tvmaze1369_0008_0001_0008.name: Shadows in the Glass
tvmaze1369_0008_0001_0008.summary: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.

tvmaze1369_0009_0001_0009.name: Speak of the Devil
tvmaze1369_0009_0001_0009.summary: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.

tvmaze1369_0010_0001_0010.name: Nelson v. Murdock
tvmaze1369_0010_0001_0010.summary: Murdock and Foggy's relationship is put to the ultimate test while a new enemy against Fisk emerges.

tvmaze1369_0011_0001_0011.name: The Path of the Righteous
tvmaze1369_0011_0001_0011.summary: Fisk and Murdock wrestle with the consequences of their chosen paths, while Ben and Karen get closer to Fisk's true past.

tvmaze1369_0012_0001_0012.name: The Ones We Leave Behind
tvmaze1369_0012_0001_0012.summary: Fisk seeks revenge while Karen is haunted by recent events. Daredevil makes a startling discovery about Fisk's financing.

tvmaze1369_0013_0001_0013.name: Daredevil
tvmaze1369_0013_0001_0013.summary: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy and Karen are forced to play their end games.

tvmaze1369_0014_0002_0001.name: Bang
tvmaze1369_0014_0002_0001.summary: The New York City underworld is up for grabs after Wilson goes to jail. A new party arrives in town to kill all of the mobsters, and Daredevil goes after them.

tvmaze1369_0015_0002_0002.name: Dogs to a Gunfight
