tvmaze1369_0015_0002_0002.summary: Matt recovers from the Punisher's head shot, while Foggy and Karen arrange a deal with DA Samantha Reyes to get their client Grotto into WITSEC. However, Reyes needs Grotto to do one thing before she agrees.

tvmaze1369_0016_0002_0003.name: New York's Finest
tvmaze1369_0016_0002_0003.summary: Punisher has a discussion with a captive Daredevil about what they do and why. Meanwhile, Reyes threatens to shut down Nelson & Murdoch, and Karen sets out to get something on the DA. At the hospital ER, Foggy turns to Claire for help locating a missing Matt.

tvmaze1369_0017_0002_0004.name: Penny and Dime
tvmaze1369_0017_0002_0004.summary: An Irish mobster seeking revenge for Punisher killing his son--and the $1.2 million that Punisher stole--arrives in Hell's Kitchen. Meanwhile, Karen gets a lead on Frank Castle and investigates his connection to the homicidal vigilante prowling the city.

tvmaze1369_0018_0002_0005.name: Kinbaku
tvmaze1369_0018_0002_0005.summary: While Matt deals with Elektra in the present, he remembers what happened between them ten years ago. Meanwhile, Blake pressures Foggy for information on the Grote case, and Karen digs into Frank's background when she suspects coverup.

tvmaze1369_0019_0002_0006.name: Regrets Only
tvmaze1369_0019_0002_0006.summary: Elektra convinces Matt to let her help eliminate the Yakuza from New York City. Meanwhile, Nelson & Murdoch agree to enter a plea for Frank, and Karen learns more about their new client.

tvmaze1369_0020_0002_0007.name: Semper Fidelis
tvmaze1369_0020_0002_0007.summary: Foggy tries to defend Frank in court, despite Matt's continuing absence as Daredevil teams up with Elektra to find out what the Japanese are up to.

tvmaze1369_0021_0002_0008.name: Guilty as Sin
tvmaze1369_0021_0002_0008.summary: Foggy tries to mount Frank's legal defense despite Matt's ongoing absence. Meanwhile, Matt is reunited with an old friend and discovers his connection to Elektra... and the secret of the Hand.

tvmaze1369_0022_0002_0009.name: Seven Minutes in Heaven
tvmaze1369_0022_0002_0009.summary: Wilson arranges for Frank to meet him in prison. Meanwhile, Foggy tries to keep the law firm afloat but discovers that Matt isn't interested.

tvmaze1369_0023_0002_0010.name: The Man in the Box
tvmaze1369_0023_0002_0010.summary: People connected to the Central Park massacre are brutally gunned down, but Karen suspects that someone is setting Punisher up for a fall. Meanwhile, Matt convinces Claire to look after the Hand prisoners, but it turns out that they may not be as helpless as they appear.

tvmaze1369_0024_0002_0011.summary: Karen escapes her protective custody and meets with Frank, who is on the trail of Blacksmith. Meanwhile, Daredevil's own search for the elusive drug lord takes him to Madame Gao, who warns that his quest won't end well.

tvmaze1369_0025_0002_0012.name: The Dark at the End of the Tunnel
tvmaze1369_0025_0002_0012.summary: After the Hand abduct Stick, Daredevil traces them to their lair beneath the city. Meanwhile, Karen continues her investigation into Frank's background after his death.

tvmaze1369_0026_0002_0013.name: A Cold Day in Hell's Kitchen
tvmaze1369_0026_0002_0013.summary: Daredevil battles the Hand--with Elektra at his side--and discovers that the price of victory may prove too high to accept.

show_list.name: Marvel's Jessica Jones
show_list.summary: Haunted by a traumatic past, Jessica Jones uses her gifts as a private eye to find her tormentor before he can harm anyone else in Hell's Kitchen.

first_episode.name: AKA Ladies Night
first_episode.summary: A couple from Omaha ask hard-drinking PI Jessica Jones to find their missing daughter. However, Jessica soon discovers that the man responsible tormented her years ago... and is back for more.

last_episode.name: AKA Smile
last_episode.summary: Jessica and Trish prepare for the final showdown against Kilgrave, but things don't go as planned. Meanwhile, nurse Claire Temple helps Luke when the doctors are unable to treat him due to his impenetrable skin.

tvmaze1370_0001_0001_0001.name: AKA Ladies Night
tvmaze1370_0001_0001_0001.summary: A couple from Omaha ask hard-drinking PI Jessica Jones to find their missing daughter. However, Jessica soon discovers that the man responsible tormented her years ago... and is back for more.

tvmaze1370_0002_0001_0002.name: AKA Crush Syndrome
tvmaze1370_0002_0001_0002.summary: Jessica tracks down Kilgrave to provide Jeri with enough evidence to convince her that a mind-controller exists so that the lawyer will represent Hope. Meanwhile, Jessica and Luke draw closer after a barfight after they both realize the other is more than they seem.

tvmaze1370_0003_0001_0003.name: AKA It's Called Whiskey
tvmaze1370_0003_0001_0003.summary: While Jessica tries to get the anesthesia she needs to negate Kilgrave's mind control powers, Trish interviews Hope on her radio show and makes herself Kilgrave's next target.

tvmaze1370_0004_0001_0004.name: AKA 99 Friends
tvmaze1370_0004_0001_0004.summary: A woman, Audrey Freeman, hires Jessica to get photos of her cheating husband. Jessica suspects that it's another of Kilgrave's traps and follows Audrey to confirm that she's legit. Meanwhile, Trish's radio show brings in a number of Kilgrave's victims, and Jessica finds a clue to Kilgrave's spy.

tvmaze1370_0005_0001_0005.name: AKA The Sandwich Saved Me
tvmaze1370_0005_0001_0005.summary: While Jessica, Trish, and Will try to get close enough to Kilgrave to drug him, Jessica remembers her burgeoning career as a superhero and how she fell under Kilgrave's control.

tvmaze1370_0006_0001_0006.name: AKA You're a Winner!
tvmaze1370_0006_0001_0006.summary: Luke hires Jessica to track down a teenager whose sister holds evidence showing who killed Luke's wife Reva. Meanwhile, Kilgrave decides to buy a house without using his powers on the owner, while Jessica finds out who hired Sissy to beat Hope.

tvmaze1370_0007_0001_0007.name: AKA Top Shelf Perverts
tvmaze1370_0007_0001_0007.summary: After Kilgrave strikes at someone close to Jessica, she vows to get herself imprisoned in the hopes that they can capture Kilgrave. However, Kilgrave has other plans. Meanwhile, Will ignores Trish's orders and hunts down Kilgrave on his own.

tvmaze1370_0008_0001_0008.name: AKA WWJD?
tvmaze1370_0008_0001_0008.summary: Jessica has no choice but to meet Kilgrave on his own turf... her childhood home. Meanwhile, Will tries to murder Kilgrave and lies to Trish about what he's planning.

tvmaze1370_0009_0001_0009.name: AKA Sin Bin
tvmaze1370_0009_0001_0009.summary: Jessica tries to force Kilgrave to reveal his powers on video so she can get Hope free. Meanwhile, Wendy increases her demands in the divorce settlement, and Jeri begins considering alternatives.

tvmaze1370_0010_0001_0010.name: AKA 1,000 Cuts
tvmaze1370_0010_0001_0010.summary: While Albert struggles to make a vaccine to counter his son's mind control power, Jessica makes a deal with Kilgrave to free Hope. Meanwhile, Wendy takes out her frustrations on Jeri, and Robyn discovers what happened to her brother.

tvmaze1370_0011_0001_0011.name: AKA I've Got the Blues
tvmaze1370_0011_0001_0011.summary: Jessica tries to track down Kilgrave by finding Albert's corpse at the city morgues. Meanwhile, Will asks Trish for a second chance but he has an ulterior motive. In the past, the Walkers take Jessica in and the girl soon discovers what Dorothy is really like.

tvmaze1370_0012_0001_0012.name: AKA Take a Bloody Number
tvmaze1370_0012_0001_0012.summary: Dorothy tries to buy her way back into Trish's life with information about the people backing Kozlov. Meanwhile, Jessica and Luke try to track down Kilgrave and grow closer.

tvmaze1370_0013_0001_0013.name: AKA Smile
tvmaze1370_0013_0001_0013.summary: Jessica and Trish prepare for the final showdown against Kilgrave, but things don't go as planned. Meanwhile, nurse Claire Temple helps Luke when the doctors are unable to treat him due to his impenetrable skin.

show_list.name: Episodes
show_list.summary: Matt LeBlanc stars as Matt LeBlanc in Episodes, the hilarious comedy series about remaking a comedy series. When husband and wife writing team Sean and Beverly set out to reproduce their British TV hit for an American network, all of their worst fears come true as Hollywood lives up to its reputation for absurdity. Not only does the network cast Matt LeBlanc in the starring role, but Matt takes the lead in deviously twisting their beloved series into a terrible cliché, while testing the couple's marriage with diversions and temptations.

first_episode.name: Episode 101
first_episode.summary: A comedy about married British-TV producers who sell their hit series to American television. In the series opener, they arrive in Hollywood to discover the network honcho wants to replace their choice of leading man, a classically trained English actor, with a "huge star, hysterically funny" and an American audience favorite.

previous_episode.name: Episode 409
previous_episode.summary: Season 4 ends with Beverly and Carol struggling to hide their friendship from Helen. Meanwhile, it's show time for "The Box."

tvmaze146_0001_0001_0001.name: Episode 101
tvmaze146_0001_0001_0001.summary: A comedy about married British-TV producers who sell their hit series to American television. In the series opener, they arrive in Hollywood to discover the network honcho wants to replace their choice of leading man, a classically trained English actor, with a "huge star, hysterically funny" and an American audience favorite.

tvmaze146_0002_0001_0002.name: Episode 102
tvmaze146_0002_0001_0002.summary: Sean and Beverly are guests at an elegant dinner party at Merc's house, where Sean is flattered by a silver-tongued Matt. Meanwhile, Matt flirts with Beverly, who realizes that being on the star's good side is far better than being his enemy.

tvmaze146_0003_0001_0003.name: Episode 103
tvmaze146_0003_0001_0003.summary: Beverly feels left out of the budding "bromance" between Sean and Matt, especially after the guys bond over a day trip to Las Vegas.

tvmaze146_0004_0001_0004.name: Episode 104
tvmaze146_0004_0001_0004.summary: Beverly and Sean steal away a drunken Matt from a dive bar outside of L.A., where they hope to shield him from the paparazzi. They wind up bonding during an overnight road trip that takes them to Matt's ex-wife's house, where a number of revelations comes to the fore.

tvmaze146_0005_0001_0005.name: Episode 105
tvmaze146_0005_0001_0005.summary: Sean appears to be infatuated with the beautiful actress co-starring on the series, and things take an interesting turn when Matt invites the two of them to a charity benefit. Elsewhere, Beverly and Carol share some pot and commiserate about the men in their lives.

tvmaze146_0006_0001_0006.name: Episode 106
tvmaze146_0006_0001_0006.summary: Beverly suspects Sean is having an affair with Morning, so she decides to leave him and return to London, but on her way to the airport she runs into Matt, which results in a slight speed bump in her plan.

tvmaze146_0007_0001_0007.name: Episode 107
tvmaze146_0007_0001_0007.summary: In the season finale, the pilot for "Pucks!" wraps and a disappointed Sean and Beverly prepare to return to London, but Sean gets a whiff of scandal when he stops at Matt's to say his farewells.

tvmaze146_0008_0002_0001.name: Episode 201
tvmaze146_0008_0002_0001.summary: In the series 2 premiere, "Pucks!" scores big ratings, meaning that the separated Sean and Beverly—and star Matt who had a fling with her—must find a way to coexist and continue working together. Meanwhile, Morning has a very special birthday present for Sean.

tvmaze146_0009_0002_0002.name: Episode 202
tvmaze146_0009_0002_0002.summary: Matt tries to make amends with Sean by buying him a fancy convertible; Matt and Jamie contemplate another romantic assignation.

tvmaze146_0010_0002_0003.name: Episode 203
tvmaze146_0010_0002_0003.summary: The death of Merc's father triggers a debate among Sean, Beverly and Matt about the best way to express one's condolences. At the funeral, Carol's jealousy toward Jamie intensifies.

tvmaze146_0011_0002_0004.name: Episode 204
tvmaze146_0011_0002_0004.summary: The latest research shows that "Pucks!" is taking a ratings hit. But the good news is that viewers are responding favourably to the young cast, necessitating some rewrites to upcoming scripts.

tvmaze146_0012_0002_0005.name: Episode 205
tvmaze146_0012_0002_0005.summary: Matt's stalker adds Sean as a Facebook friend and is able to track down the two of them at a restaurant; a travel agent's mistakes put a crimp in both Merc's and Jamie's getaway plans. Meanwhile, Sean and Beverly discover that Morning has been the victim of a botched plastic-surgery procedure.

tvmaze146_0013_0002_0006.name: Episode 206
tvmaze146_0013_0002_0006.summary: Merc has a double request of Matt: land one of his former "Friends" co-stars for a guest appearance on "Pucks!"; and deliver a speech at a testimonial dinner for Merc. Meanwhile, Sean and Beverly have a boozy bonding moment while writing the "Man of the Year" salute that Matt is expected to give.

tvmaze146_0014_0002_0007.name: Episode 207
tvmaze146_0014_0002_0007.summary: The network forces Sean and Beverly to deal with a weighty issue: confronting Matt about some extra pounds he's put on. Later, Beverly goes on a blind date with Morning's brother.

tvmaze146_0015_0002_0008.name: Episode 208
tvmaze146_0015_0002_0008.summary: Merc's career is in jeopardy when it's discovered that he once passed on a show that became a hit on another network. Meanwhile, Matt has an intimate encounter with his stalker; and Sean is upset to learn about Beverly's second date.

tvmaze146_0016_0002_0009.name: Episode 209
tvmaze146_0016_0002_0009.summary: In the Season 2 finale, Merc threatens to leave Jamie for Carol when he discovers that his wife and Matt had an affair; and Sean is devastated when Beverly turns up at an awards dinner with a date.

tvmaze146_0017_0003_0001.name: Episode 301
tvmaze146_0017_0003_0001.summary: Season 3 begins with Matt fighting for custody of his children and trying to convince his ex-wife to forgive him for sleeping with his stalker. Meanwhile, Sean and Beverly get back together but soon discover that old wounds don't heal so easily, especially when new secrets are revealed about their time apart. At the network, Carol's ambitions are dealt a cruel blow.

tvmaze146_0018_0003_0002.name: Episode 302
tvmaze146_0018_0003_0002.summary: Matt continues to fight for custody of his kids, but getting a DUI with them in the car makes the situation more difficult. Meanwhile, Sean learns that Beverly spent the night with ruggedly handsome Rob; and Carol falls under the spell of her charismatic new boss.

tvmaze146_0019_0003_0003.name: Episode 303
tvmaze146_0019_0003_0003.summary: Matt tries to get Sean and Beverly to kill him off on "Pucks," so he can pursue an exciting career opportunity. Meanwhile, Sean and Beverly try to reignite a romantic spark in their relationship; and Castor struggles with plunging ratings and his dire mental state.

tvmaze146_0020_0003_0004.name: Episode 304
tvmaze146_0020_0003_0004.summary: Matt's career takes an unexpected and unwelcome turn when he goes to appear on "The Tonight Show." Meanwhile, Merc pitches new shows to Carol.

tvmaze146_0021_0003_0005.name: Episode 305
tvmaze146_0021_0003_0005.summary: The future of "Pucks!" is in jeopardy as the network hosts its annual party for the press. Meanwhile, Sean and Beverly visit a sex therapist; and Merc Lapidus steals all of his blind ex-wife's artwork, but Matt comes to her rescue.

tvmaze146_0022_0003_0006.name: Episode 306
tvmaze146_0022_0003_0006.summary: "Pucks!" is pulled from the schedule, even though it is not officially cancelled, and everyone reacts in different ways. Sean goes into denial, while Beverly mentally starts packing her bags. As for Matt, he finds solace in the arms of a 19-year-old fan.

tvmaze146_0023_0003_0007.name: Episode 307
tvmaze146_0023_0003_0007.summary: Beverly prepares to return to England, while Sean hangs onto hopes of keeping his Hollywood dream alive. Meanwhile, Matt is crushed to learn that his former stalker is no longer obsessed with him; and Carol is equally despondent when her dreams for a future with Castor are dashed.

tvmaze146_0024_0003_0008.name: Episode 308
tvmaze146_0024_0003_0008.summary: Everyone becomes focused on what they will do next when filming on "Pucks!" comes to an end.

tvmaze146_0025_0003_0009.name: Episode 309
tvmaze146_0025_0003_0009.summary: Series 3 concludes with Matt learning that NBC expects him to audition for the lead in a new drama pilot. Meanwhile, Beverly struggles to keep Sean on course and return to London when interest in "The Opposite of Us" intensifies.

tvmaze146_0026_0004_0001.name: Episode 401
tvmaze146_0026_0004_0001.summary: Season 4 begins with Matt getting some disturbing news about his finances. Meanwhile, Carol lobbies to run the network; and Sean and Beverly are dragged back to Hollywood from London to make six more episodes of "Pucks!"

tvmaze146_0027_0004_0002.name: Episode 402
tvmaze146_0027_0004_0002.summary: Matt scrambles to solve his financial woes; several networks compete for Sean and Beverly's new show; Carol tries to mend fences with a woman whose husband she slept with.

tvmaze146_0028_0004_0003.name: Episode 403
tvmaze146_0028_0004_0003.summary: Sean's former writing partner turns up to wreak havoc; Merc's career is given a new lease on life; Matt and Carol find romance in the most unexpected places.

tvmaze146_0029_0004_0004.name: Episode 404
tvmaze146_0029_0004_0004.summary: Sean's former writing partner tightens the screws on Sean and Beverly; Carol throws herself into a new and unexpected romance; Matt finds what he believes is the answer to his disastrous love life and his financial woes.

tvmaze146_0030_0004_0005.name: Episode 405
tvmaze146_0030_0004_0005.summary: Sean and Beverly are forced to consider a writing partnership with Tim.

tvmaze146_0031_0004_0006.name: Episode 406
tvmaze146_0031_0004_0006.summary: Matt is forced to spend a day at the hospital when his father undergoes heart surgery.

tvmaze146_0032_0004_0007.name: Episode 407
tvmaze146_0032_0004_0007.summary: Sean gets his feelings hurt when Matt doesn't display any interest in his new show; Carol tries to slow down the pace of her new relationship with Helen.

tvmaze146_0033_0004_0008.name: Episode 408
tvmaze146_0033_0004_0008.summary: Beverly and Carol are forced to hide their friendship from an increasingly jealous Helen. Meanwhile, Matt struggles with the decision of whether to sell his beach house or accept a job as a game show host.

tvmaze146_0034_0004_0009.name: Episode 409
tvmaze146_0034_0004_0009.summary: Season 4 ends with Beverly and Carol struggling to hide their friendship from Helen. Meanwhile, it's show time for "The Box."

show_list.name: The Americans
show_list.summary: The Americans is a period drama about the complex marriage of two KGB spies posing as Americans in suburban Washington D.C. shortly after Ronald Reagan is elected President.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: The Americans is a period drama about the complex marriage of two KGB spies posing as Americans in suburban Washington D.C. shortly after Ronald Reagan is elected President. The arranged marriage of Philip and Elizabeth Jennings grows more passionate and genuine by the day, but is constantly tested by the escalation of the Cold War. Tensions heighten upon the arrival of a new neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI agent.

last_episode.name: The Soviet Division
last_episode.summary: The riveting season finale of The Americans finds Philip and Elizabeth racing against the clock as a life hangs in the balance, while Stan faces an uncertain future.

tvmaze157_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze157_0001_0001_0001.summary: The Americans is a period drama about the complex marriage of two KGB spies posing as Americans in suburban Washington D.C. shortly after Ronald Reagan is elected President. The arranged marriage of Philip and Elizabeth Jennings grows more passionate and genuine by the day, but is constantly tested by the escalation of the Cold War. Tensions heighten upon the arrival of a new neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI agent.

tvmaze157_0002_0001_0002.name: The Clock
tvmaze157_0002_0001_0002.summary: When Philip and Elizabeth are given an urgent task to plant a bug in Defense Secretary Caspar Weinberger's office, they risk exposure when an unwilling maid of the Weinberger home refuses to cooperate. Stan closes in on a member of the Soviet Rezidentura in an effort to uncover the identities of deep cover Directorate S operatives.

tvmaze157_0003_0001_0003.name: Gregory
tvmaze157_0003_0001_0003.summary: Philip and Elizabeth discover that their murdered colleague Robert had a wife they never knew about. As they try to determine what she knows and where her allegiance lies, Stan's investigation into Robert's death puts him hot on their trail.

tvmaze157_0004_0001_0004.name: In Control
tvmaze157_0004_0001_0004.summary: When an assassin attempts to kill President Reagan, Philip and Elizabeth scramble to handle the fallout within the KGB. Meanwhile, Stan pressures his source within the Rezidentura to find out if the KGB was responsible for the attempted assassination.

tvmaze157_0005_0001_0005.name: COMINT
tvmaze157_0005_0001_0005.summary: A crucial agent crumbles under emotional distress and threatens to topple a valuable network of KGB informants. Professionally, Philip and Elizabeth are tasked with infiltrating the FBI's new communications encryption system while personally they are forced to grapple with one of the darker aspects of life as a spy.

tvmaze157_0006_0001_0006.name: Trust Me
tvmaze157_0006_0001_0006.summary: A mole hunt within the KGB causes suspicion amongst allies and shatters trust within the Jennings' marriage. Meanwhile, Stan's plan to keep his mole safe puts her at even greater risk of discovery.

tvmaze157_0007_0001_0007.name: Duty and Honor
tvmaze157_0007_0001_0007.summary: Philip and Elizabeth's troubled marriage is further tested when a mission to discredit a Polish pro-democracy leader reunites Philip with his old flame.

tvmaze157_0008_0001_0008.name: Mutually Assured Destruction
tvmaze157_0008_0001_0008.summary: Philip and Elizabeth must stop an assassin from taking out key US scientists, while Stan and the FBI hunt the same man. Grannie shocks Elizabeth with the truth of what happened between Philip and Irina in New York.

tvmaze157_0009_0001_0009.name: Safe House
tvmaze157_0009_0001_0009.summary: Philip and Elizabeth are put to the test when a routine mission goes horribly wrong. Stan and the FBI are pushed to their limit when one of their own goes missing.

tvmaze157_0010_0001_0010.name: Only You
tvmaze157_0010_0001_0010.summary: Stan pursues a lead that puts him on the trail to one of Gregory's crew members, closing the gap between him and Elizabeth, and reigniting some of the deepest conflicts between her and Philip.

tvmaze157_0011_0001_0011.name: Covert War
tvmaze157_0011_0001_0011.summary: Events in Moscow strike a personal chord for Elizabeth, leading her to take on a dangerous mission she can't complete without Philip's help, and placing the couple on a collision course with both Grannie and the FBI.

tvmaze157_0012_0001_0012.name: The Oath
tvmaze157_0012_0001_0012.summary: One of Elizabeth's agents has key intel for sale, but she and Philip find themselves taking increasingly greater risks for what could well be a set-up. Meanwhile, Stan's pursuit of Directorate S suddenly begins to yield unexpected results.

tvmaze157_0013_0001_0013.name: The Colonel
tvmaze157_0013_0001_0013.summary: When Philip and Elizabeth are ordered to go through with a meeting that could potentially be a set-up, they find themselves confronted with unexpected truths about their relationship. Stan's investigation puts him and the FBI even closer to Philip and Elizabeth.

tvmaze157_0014_0002_0001.name: Comrades
tvmaze157_0014_0002_0001.summary: Elizabeth comes back from her injury and straight into what should have been a routine mission - but it goes awry, leaving her and Philip in fear not only for themselves but for their whole network... and family. Paige's suspicions have only grown in her mother's absence. Meanwhile, Stan continues to fall for the Russian agent who has started to play him.

tvmaze157_0015_0002_0002.name: Cardinal
tvmaze157_0015_0002_0002.summary: As Philip investigates the fallout from the last operation, Elizabeth sticks close to home, concerned for her family until she gets a mysterious distress signal. Meanwhile, a walk-in arrives at the Rezidentura - providing both Nina and Stan with unique opportunities.

tvmaze157_0016_0002_0003.name: The Walk In
tvmaze157_0016_0002_0003.summary: Philip and Elizabeth complete their next mission - but not without complications - and Philip's fears about Elizabeth's readiness for action deepen. Stan tracks the KGB walk-in which leads to much praise at work and a deepening of his attachment to, and dependence on, Nina. Meanwhile, Paige snoops into her mother's family background and Oleg begins to scrutinize Nina's secret operation.

tvmaze157_0017_0002_0004.name: A Little Night Music
tvmaze157_0017_0002_0004.summary: Just when Philip and Elizabeth think they have a quiet road ahead, an old friend returns to complicate things. Not only do they have to intercept a target who could prove valuable to the Soviet Union, but they also have to take on an important rogue mission without the support of the Centre. Divisions inside the Rezidentura deepen between Oleg and Arkady and there's an upheaval at the FBI as the chickens come home to roost for Agent Gaad. Meanwhile, Martha's frustrations threaten to blow Philip's cover.

tvmaze157_0018_0002_0005.name: The Deal
tvmaze157_0018_0002_0005.summary: Philip and Elizabeth are finally assigned a new handler as Philip works to clean up the mess of the last operation and Elizabeth, in disguise as Clark's sister Jennifer, does her best to smooth things over with Martha. As Stan searches for a missing scientist, Oleg and Arkady continue to argue over how best to handle the situation on their side, leaving Nina once again caught between the FBI and KGB.

tvmaze157_0019_0002_0006.name: Behind the Red Door
tvmaze157_0019_0002_0006.summary: A dangerous Naval officer becomes the key to Philip and Elizabeth's mission as well as a potential threat to their family's safety. Lucia, a Sandinista intelligence officer working with the Jennings, is tasked with getting Elizabeth access to Capitol Hill. Stan struggles with the potential costs of protecting Nina.

tvmaze157_0020_0002_0007.name: ARPANET
tvmaze157_0020_0002_0007.summary: Philip uses his agent Charles Duluth to help him gain access to an early precursor to the Internet so that the KGB can bug American government communications. Nina faces the threat of a potential FBI polygraph exam, bringing her closer to KGB colleague Oleg.

tvmaze157_0021_0002_0008.name: New Car
tvmaze157_0021_0002_0008.summary: Philip and Elizabeth both find themselves faced with painful turns in their various missions. Stan fights to gain access to an American military program that could give him the upper hand in his battle of wills with Oleg.

tvmaze157_0022_0002_0009.name: Martial Eagle
tvmaze157_0022_0002_0009.summary: Philip and Elizabeth's long-planned mission turns ugly, impacting each of them in different ways. Stan digs in deeper at work as his personal life continues to unravel.

tvmaze157_0023_0002_0010.name: Yousaf
tvmaze157_0023_0002_0010.summary: A new mission with international stakes has Philip calling on Annelise for assistance just as an old foe returns to D.C. with a vendetta. Stan makes a discovery that could put the FBI hot on the trail of Illegals.

tvmaze157_0024_0002_0011.name: Stealth
tvmaze157_0024_0002_0011.summary: Elizabeth makes a shocking discovery about Kate. Philip pursues a contact for information about stealth. Stan continues his pursuit of the illegals.

tvmaze157_0025_0002_0012.name: Operation Chronicle
tvmaze157_0025_0002_0012.summary: With Larrick closing in, Elizabeth rushes to exfiltrate Jared while Philip readies Fred for a crucial mission. Arkady finally plays his hand, forcing Stan to make an impossible choice.

tvmaze157_0026_0002_0013.name: Echo
tvmaze157_0026_0002_0013.summary: No one is safe as Philip and Elizabeth evacuate their children while trying to complete the mission. Stan holds Nina's future in his hands.

tvmaze157_0027_0003_0001.name: EST Men
tvmaze157_0027_0003_0001.summary: Tensions simmer between Philip and Elizabeth as they disagree over handling orders from the Centre. When Elizabeth loses key intel, Philip enlists Annelise on a mission with an unexpected outcome. Stan tries a new approach to mending his marriage with Sandra amidst learning tough news about Nina.

tvmaze157_0028_0003_0002.name: Baggage
tvmaze157_0028_0003_0002.summary: Elizabeth and Philip come together to deal with a mission gone wrong, but struggle to reconcile their increasingly opposing ideologies. Stan welcomes a Soviet defector, Zinaida, to America. Nina acclimates to her new living arrangements.

tvmaze157_0029_0003_0003.name: Open House
tvmaze157_0029_0003_0003.summary: Danger mounts for Elizabeth and Philip as they get closer to the inner circle of the C.I.A. Afghan Group. Stan monitors Zinaida. Agent Aderholt challenges Agent Gaad on a crucial operation. Arkady tasks Oleg and Tatiana with gathering high--level intel. Martha proposes a lifestyle change to Clark.

tvmaze157_0030_0003_0004.name: Dimebag
tvmaze157_0030_0003_0004.summary: Philip faces a moral dilemma while developing an asset. Philip and Elizabeth's friction escalates. Stan develops a theory with serious repercussions for national security. Paige makes a surprising birthday wish.

tvmaze157_0031_0003_0005.name: Salang Pass
tvmaze157_0031_0003_0005.summary: Philip juggles the many women in his life while Elizabeth takes drastic measures to complete a mission. Stan asserts a plan to save Nina with an unlikely ally.

tvmaze157_0032_0003_0006.name: Born Again
tvmaze157_0032_0003_0006.summary: Gabriel has surprising information. Elizabeth begins to take family matters into her own hands. Stan receives upsetting news from his past and turns to Sandra for support.

tvmaze157_0033_0003_0007.name: Walter Taffet
tvmaze157_0033_0003_0007.summary: Philip and Elizabeth feel the weight of a new family secret while following up on the KGB's interests in South Africa. Stan faces struggles both at work and at home. Martha confronts a shocking development. Written by Lara Shapiro; directed by Noah Emmerich.

tvmaze157_0034_0003_0008.name: Divestment
tvmaze157_0034_0003_0008.summary: Martha and Clark's marriage meets its most challenging test yet. As pressures on Philip intensify, Elizabeth turns to Gabriel with a difficult request. Nina receives a new assignment that reconnects her with her past.

tvmaze157_0035_0003_0009.name: Do Mail Robots Dream of Electric Sheep?
tvmaze157_0035_0003_0009.summary: Philip and Elizabeth struggle with the gravity of unexpected collateral damage. Stan and Oleg hatch a risky plan to help save Nina.

tvmaze157_0036_0003_0010.name: Stingers
tvmaze157_0036_0003_0010.summary: Philip and Elizabeth deploy a plan for the C.I.A.'s Mujahideen visitors. Tensions at the Jennings' home escalate.

tvmaze157_0037_0003_0011.name: One Day in the Life of Anton Baklanov
tvmaze157_0037_0003_0011.summary: Philip and Elizabeth's home and work lives collide in new and dangerous ways. Nina struggles to figure out her next steps. Arkady assigns Oleg and Tatiana to an operation with uncertain potential.

tvmaze157_0038_0003_0012.name: I Am Abassin Zadran
tvmaze157_0038_0003_0012.summary: Martha hosts an unexpected guest. Philip and Elizabeth must work a formidable Mujahideen commander. Paige acts out.

tvmaze157_0039_0003_0013.name: March 8, 1983
tvmaze157_0039_0003_0013.summary: Elizabeth and Paige take a trip that lands them in treacherous territory. After an emotionally charged mission, Philip turns to an unlikely source for solace. Stan's plan to save Nina culminates in unforeseen ways.

tvmaze157_0040_0004_0001.name: The Glanders
tvmaze157_0040_0004_0001.summary: Picking up on the heels of last season's finale, the season 4 premiere of The Americans sees Philip and Elizabeth dealing with the fallout of all they've wrought. What will happen when the FBI finds out about Gene's suicide? How will Pastor Tim deal with the revelation that they are Russian spies? And will they be able to handle a dangerous, new bioweapons assignment?

tvmaze157_0041_0004_0002.name: Pastor Tim
tvmaze157_0041_0004_0002.summary: Philip tries with increasing desperation to get rid of a sensitive and dangerous package as family tensions in the Jennings House reach a boiling point when Paige shares a secret of her own.

tvmaze157_0042_0004_0003.name: Experimental Prototype City of Tomorrow
tvmaze157_0042_0004_0003.summary: Paige copes with new burdens that come with her family's secret – as Philip and Elizabeth struggle to contain their cover without destroying their daughter.

tvmaze157_0043_0004_0004.name: Chloramphenicol
tvmaze157_0043_0004_0004.summary: A devastating flaw during a mission forces Philip, Elizabeth, William and Gabriel to confront the depths of their patriotism… and their mortality. In Russia, in striving to be a better person, has Nina put her life on the line?

tvmaze157_0044_0004_0005.name: Clark's Place
tvmaze157_0044_0004_0005.summary: Philip must consider his life with Martha and make a crushing choice from which there is no coming back.

tvmaze157_0045_0004_0006.name: The Rat
tvmaze157_0045_0004_0006.summary: Martha must finally face the truth she has denied – and her life may never be the same. Plus, a chilling new development in William's work forces the Jennings to face the realities of what a biological war would mean.

tvmaze157_0046_0004_0007.name: Travel Agents
tvmaze157_0046_0004_0007.summary: The KGB and the FBI both race to track down a vital agent… everything is at stake.

tvmaze157_0047_0004_0008.name: The Magic of David Copperfield V: The Statue of Liberty Disappears
tvmaze157_0047_0004_0008.summary: The Jennings's approach their breaking points as both Philip and Elizabeth must handle loyal agents. Will they make it through with their patriotism – and sanity – intact?

tvmaze157_0048_0004_0009.name: The Day After
tvmaze157_0048_0004_0009.summary: The Day After premieres, making the stakes - and terrible consequences - of the Cold War plain. Even with that in mind, will Elizabeth be able to complete the painful process of the "Patty" operation?

tvmaze157_0049_0004_0010.name: Munchkins
tvmaze157_0049_0004_0010.summary: When Paige's long-ago indiscretion threatens to resurface and destroy the family, Philip and Elizabeth find themselves scrambling – and Paige finds herself reevaluating who her parents really are.

tvmaze157_0050_0004_0011.name: Dinner for Seven
tvmaze157_0050_0004_0011.summary: Elizabeth completes the last steps of a very personal operation… but at what cost?

tvmaze157_0051_0004_0012.name: A Roy Rogers in Franconia
tvmaze157_0051_0004_0012.summary: As Paige deals with last episode's trauma, she sees her mother in a new light… and finds she has inherited some of her parents' skills. Plus, has Oleg reached his breaking point with Stan?

tvmaze157_0052_0004_0013.name: Persona Non Grata
tvmaze157_0052_0004_0013.summary: The explosive season finale of The Americans finds Philip and Elizabeth in a high-stakes race against the FBI to recover a hazardous package. Will they get there in time? And will Paige follow her parents into the family business?

tvmaze157_0053_0005_0001.name: Amber Waves
tvmaze157_0053_0005_0001.summary: As Philip and Elizabeth struggle to contain the risks from Paige's growing relationship with Matthew Beeman, the Centre sends them on an operation unlike any they've ever had before, straining their family and marriage to its limits.

tvmaze157_0054_0005_0002.name: Pests
tvmaze157_0054_0005_0002.summary: Stan and Oleg wrestle with the harsh consequences of their complicated history, as Philip and Elizabeth face a new mission with devastating implications for their country.

tvmaze157_0055_0005_0003.name: The Midges
tvmaze157_0055_0005_0003.summary: Philip and Elizabeth tell Paige more about the family business, but pressing new questions arise when an operation takes a ghastly and unexpected turn. Meanwhile, a sensitive package jeopardizes Oleg's life back home.

tvmaze157_0056_0005_0004.name: What's the Matter with Kansas?
tvmaze157_0056_0005_0004.summary: Philip and Elizabeth have qualms about a new assignment, while a specter from Philip's past creates unforeseen dangers. At the FBI, Stan makes a shocking play that could throw his career into turmoil.

tvmaze157_0057_0005_0005.name: Lotus 1-2-3
tvmaze157_0057_0005_0005.summary: Philip and Elizabeth receive surprising news about Henry -- and shattering news about a past operation. Stan might be falling in love, but Philip wonders if something darker is going on.

tvmaze157_0058_0005_0006.name: Crossbreed
tvmaze157_0058_0005_0006.summary: Gabriel stuns Philip and Elizabeth with a sudden announcement and a crushing revelation about Philip's past. Stan and Aderholt draw a fly into their web, while Oleg and Ruslan ambush their first suspect.

tvmaze157_0059_0005_0007.name: The Committee on Human Rights
tvmaze157_0059_0005_0007.summary: As Paige becomes even more enmeshed in her parents' world, tensions with Matthew Beeman come to a head, Philip and Elizabeth's honeytraps take surprising turns, and Stan faces the consequences of overplaying his hand at the FBI.

tvmaze157_0060_0005_0008.name: Immersion
tvmaze157_0060_0005_0008.summary: A secret brings Elizabeth and Paige together, while, in Moscow, Oleg's own secrets put him under KGB suspicion. A new twist in the Morozov operation creates an opportunity that changes everything.

tvmaze157_0061_0005_0009.name: IHOP
tvmaze157_0061_0005_0009.summary: Philip and Elizabeth are thrown off balance when things with Tuan take an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Henry makes a startling proposition and Stan has a disturbing encounter with Frank Gaad's widow.

tvmaze157_0062_0005_0010.name: Darkroom
tvmaze157_0062_0005_0010.summary: Paige's snooping leads Philip and Elizabeth to make a choice that could shift the balance of their lives forever. Stan and Aderholt's recruitment of Sofia suddenly bears fruit.

tvmaze157_0063_0005_0011.name: Dyatkovo
tvmaze157_0063_0005_0011.summary: A surprise assignment from the Centre divides Philip and Elizabeth, forcing them into a moment of profound crisis. Stan gives Henry a tour of the FBI – but will he see too much?

tvmaze157_0064_0005_0012.name: The World Council of Churches
tvmaze157_0064_0005_0012.summary: As Philip and Elizabeth grapple with a momentous decision, Tuan takes matters into his own hands in the Morozov operation. Back in Russia, Oleg's investigation collides with the realities of the Soviet system.

tvmaze157_0065_0005_0013.name: The Soviet Division
tvmaze157_0065_0005_0013.summary: The riveting season finale of The Americans finds Philip and Elizabeth racing against the clock as a life hangs in the balance, while Stan faces an uncertain future.

show_list.name: Kevin Can Wait
show_list.summary: Kevin James returns to series television in an irresistible comedy about a newly retired police officer looking forward to quality time with his family - and his fellow retired cops. When his oldest daughter announces she's dropping out of college to support her fiancé, Kevin knows his only choice is to move them both into his home to keep her in school. The fun has to wait… his family is his new beat on Kevin Can Wait.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Kevin, a newly retired police officer, faces tougher challenges at home than he ever did on the streets. In the opener, Kevin's retirement plans go awry when he learns his wife has shielded him from key family problems while he worked as a cop and that he must now face them head-on.

previous_episode.name: Sting of Queens: Part Two
previous_episode.summary: Kevin is strong-armed by his undercover partner, Vanessa, to extend their investigation by attending a fraudulent dealer's weekend art show in Boston, causing him to miss Mets Fantasy Camp with his buddies. Also, Chale's dream job is not what it seems, and Donna mouths off to her boss.

tvmaze17127_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze17127_0001_0001_0001.summary: Kevin, a newly retired police officer, faces tougher challenges at home than he ever did on the streets. In the opener, Kevin's retirement plans go awry when he learns his wife has shielded him from key family problems while he worked as a cop and that he must now face them head-on.

tvmaze17127_0002_0001_0002.name: Sleep Disorder
tvmaze17127_0002_0001_0002.summary: Kevin rearranges the house to his liking after his buddies convince him that Donna makes all their decisions and has organized the house for her own benefit. Meanwhile, Kendra enlists her Uncle Kyle to help toughen up Chale.

tvmaze17127_0003_0001_0003.name: Chore Weasel
tvmaze17127_0003_0001_0003.summary: Kevin thinks he's got it made when he hires someone, via a new online app, to do household chores for him while he plays football with his buddies and then takes all the credit with Donna.

tvmaze17127_0004_0001_0004.name: Kevin and Donna's Book Club
tvmaze17127_0004_0001_0004.summary: After Kevin witnesses Donna and her friends' raucous laughter during their book club gathering, he tries to spice up his own social life by evaluating how each of his buddies could be more fun.

tvmaze17127_0005_0001_0005.name: Kevin's Good Story
tvmaze17127_0005_0001_0005.summary: Kevin forgets his wedding anniversary and tries to use Goody's heroic cop story to bail himself out.

tvmaze17127_0006_0001_0006.name: Beat the Parents
tvmaze17127_0006_0001_0006.summary: Kevin and Donna try to sabotage their son's friendship with a boy from school after meeting the kid's arrogant father and pushy mom.

tvmaze17127_0007_0001_0007.name: Hallow-We-Ain't-Home
tvmaze17127_0007_0001_0007.summary: On Halloween, Kevin and Donna's neighbors "trick" them in holiday style when they pretend not to be home to avoid giving out candy. Also, Chale has an altercation with a man dressed as a Viking.

tvmaze17127_0008_0001_0008.name: Who's Better Than Us?
tvmaze17127_0008_0001_0008.summary: Kevin gets jealous when he hears how happy his former patrol partner is with the extremely well fit rookie now riding with him and sets out to show his old friend what he's missing.

tvmaze17127_0009_0001_0009.name: The Power of Positive Drinking
tvmaze17127_0009_0001_0009.summary: When Kevin takes a job as a bartender, he goes too far when he starts dispensing unsolicited advice to his customers.

tvmaze17127_0010_0001_0010.name: The Fantastic Pho
tvmaze17127_0010_0001_0010.summary: A newly retired police officer realizes taking care of his family is a job in its own right.

tvmaze17127_0011_0001_0011.name: Kevin's Bringing Supper Back
tvmaze17127_0011_0001_0011.summary: Kevin's resolve to spend more quality time with his family is put to the ultimate test when his buddies surprise him with concert tickets to his favorite musician, fellow Long Islander Billy Joel.

tvmaze17127_0012_0001_0012.name: I'll Be Home for Christmas... Maybe
tvmaze17127_0012_0001_0012.summary: Kevin volunteers to help Mott and his seven kids prepare for the holidays while Mott's wife is away, much to the dismay of Donna who is left high and dry on her own until Kyle swoops in to help.

tvmaze17127_0013_0001_0013.name: Ring Worm
tvmaze17127_0013_0001_0013.summary: After Kevin learns Chale took a job to buy Kendra an engagement ring, he decides to make good on his overdue promise to buy Donna a proper ring, but his plan backfires when he tries to surprise her.

tvmaze17127_0014_0001_0014.name: Kevin vs. the Dutch Elm
tvmaze17127_0014_0001_0014.summary: While Kevin tries to charm his elderly neighbor into giving him permission to cut down one of her trees, he gets intimidated by her son and inadvertently invites them to his house for a non-existent party.

tvmaze17127_0015_0001_0015.name: Choke Doubt
tvmaze17127_0015_0001_0015.summary: Kevin brags about saving a man from choking after hearing how much attention his brother Kyle is receiving for saving a cat.

tvmaze17127_0016_0001_0016.name: The Back Out
tvmaze17127_0016_0001_0016.summary: When he catches them "cheating" on him with his colleague. Also, Kyle, still bitter that Kevin overlooked him to be best man at his wedding to Donna, tries to convince Chale to give him that responsibility.

tvmaze17127_0017_0001_0017.name: Unholy War
tvmaze17127_0017_0001_0017.summary: Approval by becoming more involved in the church, Kevin's drive to get the church for Kendra becomes an insatiable desire to get revenge on his old rival.

tvmaze17127_0018_0001_0018.name: Neighborhood Watch
tvmaze17127_0018_0001_0018.summary: Kevin concocts an elaborate plan to get out of having to spend time with Donna's cousin Irene and her chatty husband.

tvmaze17127_0019_0001_0019.name: Showroom Showdown
tvmaze17127_0019_0001_0019.summary: When Kevin and Chale get jobs working in the warehouse at an electronics store to help pay for the wedding, Chale's quick promotion to the sales floor kick-starts Kevin's competitive side.

tvmaze17127_0020_0001_0020.name: Double Date
tvmaze17127_0020_0001_0020.summary: Invite the Motts on a weekend getaway with them, Kevin and Donna are offended by the friendship demotion and go online to find new couples to hang out with.

tvmaze17127_0021_0001_0021.name: Kenny Can Wait
tvmaze17127_0021_0001_0021.summary: Kevin strikes up an unlikely friendship with Harry Connick Jr., but gets caught in a web of lies trying to impress his new friend.

tvmaze17127_0022_0001_0022.name: Quiet Diet
tvmaze17127_0022_0001_0022.summary: When Donna says she'll send Kevin to the Mets Fantasy Camp if he lowers his cholesterol, Chale secretly coaches Kevin through a juice cleanse.

tvmaze17127_0023_0001_0023.name: Sting of Queens: Part One
tvmaze17127_0023_0001_0023.summary: Kevin begrudgingly agrees to come out of retirement briefly to reprise an undercover assignment where he and his old rival, Vanessa Cellucci, once again, pose as husband and wife. Also, Donna is up for a promotion, Kendra gets accepted to law school, and Chale gets a lucrative new job.

tvmaze17127_0024_0001_0024.name: Sting of Queens: Part Two
tvmaze17127_0024_0001_0024.summary: Kevin is strong-armed by his undercover partner, Vanessa, to extend their investigation by attending a fraudulent dealer's weekend art show in Boston, causing him to miss Mets Fantasy Camp with his buddies. Also, Chale's dream job is not what it seems, and Donna mouths off to her boss.

show_list.name: Suits
show_list.summary: Suits delves into the fast-paced, high-stakes world of a top Manhattan corporate law firm where hotshot associate Harvey Specter makes a risky move by hiring Mike Ross a brilliant but unmotivated college dropout, as his associate. As he becomes enmeshed in this unfamiliar world, Mike relies heavily on the firm's best paralegal Rachel Zane and Harvey's no-nonsense assistant Donna Paulsen to help him serve justice. With a photographic memory and the street smarts of a hustler, Mike proves to be a legal prodigy despite the absence of bonafide legal credentials.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: In the premiere of this legal drama, successful lawyer Harvey Specter (Gabriel Macht) hires brilliant college dropout Mike Ross (Patrick J. Adams) as a new associate at a top law firm despite the fact that Mike doesn't have a degree. In order to work together, both parties have to keep up the ruse to convince their coworkers that Mike is a real lawyer.

previous_episode.name: Character and Fitness
previous_episode.summary: Mike needs Harvey and Rachel's help to overcome an impossible obstacle, or his dream of becoming a real lawyer is over. Donna's new venture hits a snag. Louis tries to patch things up with Tara.

tvmaze172_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze172_0001_0001_0001.summary: In the premiere of this legal drama, successful lawyer Harvey Specter (Gabriel Macht) hires brilliant college dropout Mike Ross (Patrick J. Adams) as a new associate at a top law firm despite the fact that Mike doesn't have a degree. In order to work together, both parties have to keep up the ruse to convince their coworkers that Mike is a real lawyer.

tvmaze172_0002_0001_0002.name: Errors and Omissions
tvmaze172_0002_0001_0002.summary: Mike has an ethical dilemma when Louis forces him to make a decision that could hurt his relationship with Harvey. Elsewhere, Harvey's past comes back to haunt him during a case.

tvmaze172_0003_0001_0003.name: Inside Track
tvmaze172_0003_0001_0003.summary: Harvey goes rogue in order to fix a crisis with a client despite Jessica's desire to reign him in. Elsewhere, Mike turns to Rachel for guidance when he learns he'll be hosting a dinner for rookies, an important tradition at the firm.

tvmaze172_0004_0001_0004.name: Dirty Little Secrets
tvmaze172_0004_0001_0004.summary: Harvey defends a figure from Jessica's past, making it difficult for Jessica to detach herself from the case. Elsewhere, Mike is eager to take on a pro bono case but soon learns it won't be an easy win.

tvmaze172_0005_0001_0005.name: Bail Out
tvmaze172_0005_0001_0005.summary: An old friend surfaces to ask Mike for help. Elsewhere, Harvey has a chance to close a lucrative deal or help his driver defend himself from a lawsuit.

tvmaze172_0006_0001_0006.name: Tricks of the Trade
tvmaze172_0006_0001_0006.summary: The guys defend a woman falsely accused of insider trading. Elsewhere, Mike helps Rachel study for the LSAT and realises she's close to discovering his secret.

tvmaze172_0007_0001_0007.name: Play The Man
tvmaze172_0007_0001_0007.summary: Mike takes on Louis' protégé during a mock trial, but his conflict with Rachel could hurt his chances of winning. Elsewhere, Harvey works on a merger between two hotel chains, but his past with the opposing counsel complicates matters.

tvmaze172_0008_0001_0008.name: Identity Crisis
tvmaze172_0008_0001_0008.summary: Harvey and Louis are forced to work together to go after an investment firm that ripped off a nonprofit. But Louis, anxious to make a good impression, inadvertently hurts the case. Elsewhere, Mike tries to contain a modern-day Robin Hood whose actions are damaging a client's business.

tvmaze172_0009_0001_0009.name: Undefeated
tvmaze172_0009_0001_0009.summary: Harvey takes on an undefeated lawyer from Boston during a class-action lawsuit.

tvmaze172_0010_0001_0010.name: The Shelf Life
tvmaze172_0010_0001_0010.summary: Mike questions the firing of an executive, whom Harvey dismissed at the request of a client.

tvmaze172_0011_0001_0011.name: Rules Of The Game
tvmaze172_0011_0001_0011.summary: Harvey's former mentor (Gary Cole) turns to his protégé when his office comes under investigation. Elsewhere, Mike and Louis try to settle a mogul's estate in the midst of family clashes; and Jenny worries that Mike is hiding something.

tvmaze172_0012_0001_0012.name: Dog Fight
tvmaze172_0012_0001_0012.summary: In the first-series finale, Harvey tries to free an innocent man but hits a wall when he goes to the district attorney (Chi McBride), who seems more focused on preserving the system than seeking justice. Elsewhere, Trevor causes problems for Mike when he shows up on Mike's doorstep.

tvmaze172_0013_0002_0001.name: She Knows
tvmaze172_0013_0002_0001.summary: In the Series 2 opener, Mike is excited to close a big case for the firm but doesn't realise Trevor confronted Jessica. Meanwhile, Jessica's former partner resurfaces, prompting Harvey to reconsider what he's willing to do to protect Mike's secret.

tvmaze172_0014_0002_0002.name: The Choice
tvmaze172_0014_0002_0002.summary: Jessica tries to drum up support in the firm and asks Harvey to help her with the task, but his ambition may produce more ill will than good. Elsewhere, Mike approaches Rachel about her message.

tvmaze172_0015_0002_0003.name: Meet the New Boss
tvmaze172_0015_0002_0003.summary: Harvey and Daniel clash over a case, leaving Mike caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Mike must handle problems with the women in his life; and Louis meets a worthy opponent when trying to quell complaints about the way the firm treats its associates.

tvmaze172_0016_0002_0004.name: Discovery
tvmaze172_0016_0002_0004.summary: Travis returns to town and takes aim at Harvey, causing trouble that Harvey and Jessica must hide from Daniel. Elsewhere, Louis and Mike become closer as friends, but Louis' paranoia threatens to ruin the new bond.

tvmaze172_0017_0002_0005.name: Break Point
tvmaze172_0017_0002_0005.summary: Jessica takes the lead on a case that could have serious consequences for the firm, and Harvey has a hard time taking a backseat during the proceedings. Elsewhere, Mike works on a dispute between a tennis phenom and his trainer, who's also his father.

tvmaze172_0018_0002_0006.name: All In
tvmaze172_0018_0002_0006.summary: Harvey and Mike take on an unorthodox case in light of Harvey's history with the client. Elsewhere, Louis and Rachel join forces to preserve a beloved institution, and Jessica encounters a problem while defending the firm.

tvmaze172_0019_0002_0007.name: Sucker Punch
tvmaze172_0019_0002_0007.summary: Harvey turns to an old colleague for help defending the firm against the lawsuit despite the pair's tumultuous past.

tvmaze172_0020_0002_0008.name: Rewind
tvmaze172_0020_0002_0008.summary: Mike and Harvey look into the past to discover how their decisions have influenced the present.

tvmaze172_0021_0002_0009.name: Asterisk
tvmaze172_0021_0002_0009.summary: Harvey tries to sway an important figure whose vote will determine the firm's future.

tvmaze172_0022_0002_0010.name: High Noon
tvmaze172_0022_0002_0010.summary: Personal issues cause Mike to drop off the grid when Harvey needs him during the fight for the firm.

tvmaze172_0023_0002_0011.name: Blind-Sided
tvmaze172_0023_0002_0011.summary: A criminal case resonates with Mike, making it difficult for him to separate his feelings from the case.

tvmaze172_0024_0002_0012.name: Blood in the Water
tvmaze172_0024_0002_0012.summary: The firm tries to recover from the battle with Daniel, but Harvey must fend off another attack from a rival who seems to have a personal vendetta. Elsewhere, Mike and Louis face consequences for previous actions.

tvmaze172_0025_0002_0013.name: Zane Vs. Zane
tvmaze172_0025_0002_0013.summary: Harvey faces off with Rachel's father on a gender-discrimination case, forcing Rachel to deal with her strained relationship with her dad.

tvmaze172_0026_0002_0014.name: He's Back
tvmaze172_0026_0002_0014.summary: Daniel returns with a lawsuit against Jessica.

tvmaze172_0027_0002_0015.name: Normandy
tvmaze172_0027_0002_0015.summary: Dana resurfaces and causes problems for Harvey and Jessica in their battle against Hardman.

tvmaze172_0028_0002_0016.name: War
tvmaze172_0028_0002_0016.summary: In the Series 2 finale, Harvey and Jessica clash over their vision for the direction of the firm when faced with a lucrative offer from a British firm.

tvmaze172_0029_0003_0001.name: The Arrangement
tvmaze172_0029_0003_0001.summary: In the Series 3 premiere, new partner Darby assigns Harvey a high-stakes case. Elsewhere, Mike tries to make things right with Harvey and deal with the fallout from his revelation to Rachel.

tvmaze172_0030_0003_0002.name: I Want You to Want Me
tvmaze172_0030_0003_0002.summary: Louis has an offer for Mike that could affect his future at the firm; Harvey and Jessica take on an old foe, who throws a wrench into their defense of Ava Hessington.

tvmaze172_0031_0003_0003.name: Unfinished Business
tvmaze172_0031_0003_0003.summary: Harvey's client is arrested for murder; Katrina attempts to win over Louis, who's still stewing over Mike's rejection; and a British version of Harvey makes waves at the firm.

tvmaze172_0032_0003_0004.name: Conflict Of Interest
tvmaze172_0032_0003_0004.summary: Harvey and Louis are at odds when Harvey's defense of Ava conflicts with Louis' assignment to prevent a hostile takeover of Hessington Oil.

tvmaze172_0033_0003_0005.name: Shadow Of A Doubt
tvmaze172_0033_0003_0005.summary: Harvey and Stephen join forces for Ava's defense; Mike asks Rachel for help with a case, but complications arise when her parents end up coming close to learning his secret.

tvmaze172_0034_0003_0006.name: The Other Time
tvmaze172_0034_0003_0006.summary: Cameron's dirty tactics on Ava's case lead Harvey to recall why he left the D.A.'s office. Elsewhere, Mike looks back at what prevented him from earning a degree while Rachel visits law schools.

tvmaze172_0035_0003_0007.name: She's Mine
tvmaze172_0035_0003_0007.summary: Harvey butts heads with Stephen over Ava's case and other issues; Harvey and Jessica must overcome the tension between them to work on Ava's defense; and Louis seeks help from Rachel in his battle with Nigel.

tvmaze172_0036_0003_0008.name: Endgame
tvmaze172_0036_0003_0008.summary: Ava's murder trial begins as Mike, Harvey and Jessica navigate a series of betrayals. Elsewhere, Louis and Donna each seek revenge.

tvmaze172_0037_0003_0009.name: Bad Faith
tvmaze172_0037_0003_0009.summary: Harvey and Scottie find themselves at odds once again, while Louis persuades Jessica to let him handle the dissolution talks. Elsewhere, Mike makes a big move in his relationship with Rachel.

tvmaze172_0038_0003_0010.name: Stay
tvmaze172_0038_0003_0010.summary: Harvey and Scottie find themselves on opposite sides when an old enemy complicates the Pearson Darby negotiations. Elsewhere, Sheila and Louis are at odds over a new hire, and Jessica is unhappy with Mike and Rachel.

tvmaze172_0039_0003_0011.name: Buried Secrets
tvmaze172_0039_0003_0011.summary: Complications arise between Harvey, Jessica and Scottie; Mike faces his demons during a case against an old enemy; Louis' suspicions may expose Mike.

tvmaze172_0040_0003_0012.name: Yesterday's Gone
tvmaze172_0040_0003_0012.summary: Jessica finds an unlikely friend in Harvey as her concerns continue to mount.

tvmaze172_0041_0003_0013.name: Moot Point
tvmaze172_0041_0003_0013.summary: Harvey faces an old rival from law school; Jessica tries to stay out of Louis and Scottie's feud.

tvmaze172_0042_0003_0014.name: Heartburn
tvmaze172_0042_0003_0014.summary: A major client demands that Harvey and Mike perform an unpleasant task; Louis faces a difficult challenge; Laura collects an old debt.

tvmaze172_0043_0003_0015.name: Know When to Fold 'Em
tvmaze172_0043_0003_0015.summary: A persistent attorney goes after one of Harvey's clients; Mike is faced with a difficult decision; former name partner Charles Van Dyke returns with revenge on his mind.

tvmaze172_0044_0003_0016.name: No Way Out
tvmaze172_0044_0003_0016.summary: Harvey and Mike clash with a tenacious U.S. attorney in the Series 3 finale. Elsewhere, Scottie and Harvey struggle to reach a compromise, and Mike and Rachel have different ideas about the future.

tvmaze172_0045_0004_0001.name: One-Two-Three Go...
tvmaze172_0045_0004_0001.summary: Mike and Harvey clash over investment-banking strategies in the Season 4 opener. Meanwhile, Pearson realizes a former district attorney may be pursuing revenge against Harvey and the firm.

tvmaze172_0046_0004_0002.name: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
tvmaze172_0046_0004_0002.summary: A takeover battle pits Harvey and Mike against one another, and the situation is only complicated further by Mike's relationship with Rachel. Elsewhere, Louis partners with recent SEC defector Jeff Malonein.

tvmaze172_0047_0004_0003.name: Two in the Knees
tvmaze172_0047_0004_0003.summary: Logan Sanders, a client of Pearson Specter, looks to Harvey to confirm that his relationship with Mike won't prevent them from winning the takeover battle. Elsewhere, misunderstandings arise between Louis and his new colleague Jeff Malone.

tvmaze172_0048_0004_0004.name: Leveraged
tvmaze172_0048_0004_0004.summary: Mike initiates a hostile takeover of Gillis Industries while Harvey and Louis work feverishly against his efforts. Elsewhere, Jessica and Malone meet with Sean Cahill, who has the weight of the SEC behind him in bringing down the firm.

tvmaze172_0049_0004_0005.name: Pound of Flesh
tvmaze172_0049_0004_0005.summary: Rachel becomes increasingly anxious about work, school, and the growing attraction between herself and Pearson Specter client Logan Sanders. Meanwhile, Louis helps Donna prepare for a major role while she encourages him to face his fear. Harvey and Mike agree to a ceasefire, but Sam accuses him of collusion and Mike learns how ruthless his new partner can be.

tvmaze172_0050_0004_0006.name: Litt the Hell Up
tvmaze172_0050_0004_0006.summary: Harvey tries to end the takeover when Sean Cahill brings Pearson Specter client Logan Sanders to the SEC for questioning. Elsewhere, Louis finds a way to make a name for himself when Mike insists on playing hardball.

tvmaze172_0051_0004_0007.name: We're Done
tvmaze172_0051_0004_0007.summary: Rachel brings disturbing news while Mike is still reeling from the aftermath of the battle for Gillis Industries. Feeling Harvey is his only friend left, Mike makes a rash decision; elsewhere, Jessica asks Louis to pick his own reward after his victory for the firm.

tvmaze172_0052_0004_0008.name: Exposure
tvmaze172_0052_0004_0008.summary: Mike and Rachel work closely with one another while Jessica and Harvey try to outmaneuver Sean Cahill. Elsewhere, Louis tries to hide evidence for the sake of his career.

tvmaze172_0053_0004_0009.name: Gone
tvmaze172_0053_0004_0009.summary: Professional and personal secrets are unearthed when Sean begins a round of depositions as the SEC investigation comes to a head.

tvmaze172_0054_0004_0010.name: This is Rome
tvmaze172_0054_0004_0010.summary: Harvey and Jessica try to protect the firm from competitors; Louis tries to balance his personal and professional affairs.

tvmaze172_0055_0004_0011.name: Enough Is Enough
tvmaze172_0055_0004_0011.summary: Gabriel Macht directs the Season 4 mid-season premiere, which finds Louis gaining leverage in his quest to become a name partner of the firm; and the Pearson Specter team dealing with the fallout of Louis learning Mike's secret.

tvmaze172_0056_0004_0012.name: Respect
tvmaze172_0056_0004_0012.summary: Harvard ethics professor Henry Gerard seeks Harvey's help with a case that requires a lack of ethics to win. Mike, meanwhile, does his best to not be spotted by the professor, whose class he never took; and Louis tries to wine and dine a socialite CEO.

tvmaze172_0057_0004_0013.name: Fork in the Road
tvmaze172_0057_0004_0013.summary: Harvey and Louis travel to see a client to whom they have deep ties; and Harvey takes advantage of the time to force Louis and Mike to confront their trust issues. In other events, in a flashback, the root of Harvey and Louis's competitive relationship is explained; and Mike learns the limits of his intelligence when it comes to the law.

tvmaze172_0058_0004_0014.name: Derailed
tvmaze172_0058_0004_0014.summary: When Mike takes a humanitarian case with the potential to jeopardize firm business, Harvey must decide how much to rein in his associate. Meanwhile, Jessica wrestles with the distance she's been forced to put between herself and Jeff Malone. And Louis fights to get the respect a name partner deserves.

tvmaze172_0059_0004_0015.name: Intent
tvmaze172_0059_0004_0015.summary: Harvey and Mike scramble to save the Liberty Rail case; D.A. Wolf comes after the firm; and Jessica and Malone try to adjust to their new circumstances.

tvmaze172_0060_0004_0016.name: Not Just a Pretty Face
tvmaze172_0060_0004_0016.summary: When SEC investigator Sean Cahill fails to link his corrupt boss Eric Woodall with corporate raider Charles Forstman, Harvey consults with Jessica but must ultimately revisit his own uncomfortable past in order to find a way to put them away for good. Mike and Rachel confront the fact that, while Rachel is Harvey's associate, Mike is his guy. And Donna helps Louis with an unexpected crisis.

tvmaze172_0061_0005_0001.name: Denial
tvmaze172_0061_0005_0001.summary: In the Season 5 premiere, Harvey's work is impacted by changes around the office; and Donna adjusts to working for Louis, who believes she's certain to return to Harvey. In other events, Mike and Rachel must decide how and when to share their big news; and an up-and-coming partner confronts Jessica about Harvey's way of doing business.

tvmaze172_0062_0005_0002.name: Compensation
tvmaze172_0062_0005_0002.summary: Harvey searches for a replacement for Donna. Mike takes a case as a favor, which he must justify to Jessica - while Rachel's father, Robert Zane, offers some unsolicited advice about Rachel's engagement to Mike. And Louis is embroiled in surprising money matters, while an up-and-coming partner, Jack, makes his presence known to Jessica, confronting her about whether Harvey's way of doing business is beneficial to the firm.

tvmaze172_0063_0005_0003.name: No Refills
tvmaze172_0063_0005_0003.summary: Harvey brings some star power to his ongoing conflict with Jack Soloff - a conflict that Louis and Donna can't seem to stay clear of. Mike brings in Robert Zane to co-counsel a case, pitting his instincts as a lawyer against his desire to stay in his future father-in-law's good graces. And while Jessica mediates between Mike and Zane, she tasks Rachel with an unusual assignment.

tvmaze172_0064_0005_0004.name: No Puedo Hacerlo
tvmaze172_0064_0005_0004.summary: Harvey steps outside his usual area of expertise, in order to take a case from a client who has a special tie to the firm. Mike and Zane work their class-action case together, but Mike learns they have different ideas about what constitutes a win - for themselves, and for their clients. And Donna counsels Louis on the best way to settle a feud.

tvmaze172_0065_0005_0005.name: Toe to Toe
tvmaze172_0065_0005_0005.summary: When Harvey's bitter rival Travis Tanner turns up on the other side of a case, claiming to be a changed man, Harvey and Mike must decide whether to believe him - or bury him. As Harvey's sessions with Dr. Agard continue, she links his personal stake in the Tanner fight to issues from his past. Meanwhile, Jessica tasks Louis to make things right with Harvey, and with Rachel and Donna's help he devises a plan - one which could make an enemy of the formidable Jack Soloff.

tvmaze172_0066_0005_0006.name: Privilege
tvmaze172_0066_0005_0006.summary: Reeling from Dr. Agard's revelation about the root of his panic attacks, Harvey is forced to make a tough personal decision in a case that touches a nerve. Meanwhile, Mike and Louis have taken over responsibility for Harvey's oldest client, and must decide what to do when that client's demands go against his own best interests. And Donna tries to work her magic to make Rachel's dream wedding possible.

tvmaze172_0067_0005_0007.name: Hitting Home
tvmaze172_0067_0005_0007.summary: Mike teams with Jack Soloff on a case; Esther Litt returns to P.S.L. in hopes of discreetly solving a problem; and Donna and Harvey try to return their friendship to normal.

tvmaze172_0068_0005_0008.name: Mea Culpa
tvmaze172_0068_0005_0008.summary: Jessica does damage control in the wake of Harvey punching Louis, just as Jack Soloff and Daniel Hardman are looking for weaknesses to exploit. Meanwhile, Donna counsels both men on how to rectify their issues. And Mike must find a way to turn down his recently announced promotion without raising suspicion - while he and Rachel combat an opposing attorney who holds the key to uncovering his secret.

tvmaze172_0069_0005_0009.name: Uninvited Guests
tvmaze172_0069_0005_0009.summary: Rachel and her mother, Laura Zane, plan for Rachel's dream wedding, but Rachel fears the event may reveal Mike's secret. Meanwhile Daniel Hardman and Jack Soloff make their move against Jessica and the partners, as Harvey and Mike tangle with Hardman's mysterious backer, and Louis tries to find Jack's Achilles heel.

tvmaze172_0070_0005_0010.name: Faith
tvmaze172_0070_0005_0010.summary: Jessica and Louis try to rally the partners to stop the takeover attempt by Hardman and Soloff. In other events, Mike and Harvey each face down past demons in order to make potentially life-altering decisions.

tvmaze172_0071_0005_0011.name: Blowback
tvmaze172_0071_0005_0011.summary: As we begin our mid-season premiere, Mike's worst fears have come true. He's been arrested for fraud and is under investigation by a ruthless government prosecutor, Assistant US Attorney Anita Gibbs. Meanwhile, Jessica and Harvey must figure out how to build a defense for Mike, knowing full well that he's guilty of the crime for which he stands accused. And Rachel must come to terms with her family's reaction to the news that her fiancé is not the person he claimed to be - and that he could soon be in prison.

tvmaze172_0072_0005_0012.name: Live to Fight
tvmaze172_0072_0005_0012.summary: Mike and Louis must identify an anonymous tipster in order to diffuse a damning piece of evidence. Meanwhile, Gibbs isn't just after Mike, she's set her sights on Jessica and Harvey as well

tvmaze172_0073_0005_0013.name: God's Green Earth
tvmaze172_0073_0005_0013.summary: With time running out before Mike's case goes to trial, Harvey and Mike are at odds over their strategy, and just what lengths they'll go to in order to defeat Gibbs.

tvmaze172_0074_0005_0014.name: Self Defense
tvmaze172_0074_0005_0014.summary: As time runs out before the trial, Mike wants to represent himself while Harvey wants to lead the charge. To decide the issue, Harvey challenges Mike to a winner takes all showdown.

tvmaze172_0075_0005_0015.name: Tick Tock
tvmaze172_0075_0005_0015.summary: With things looking bad for the firm, Louis mulls over Anita Gibbs' offer to turn on his compatriots in exchange for immunity. Meanwhile, Rachel gives Mike advice on how best to win hearts and minds in the courtroom. As the pressure mounts, Donna pleads with Harvey to not do anything rash, even as Jessica encourages him to do so. And Harvey and Mike look to a new, last-ditch strategy to win the case.. but as they run out of moves to play and deals to make, they face the possibility of putting Mike's fate in the last place they want it - the hands of a jury.

tvmaze172_0076_0005_0016.name: 25th Hour
tvmaze172_0076_0005_0016.summary: Mike makes the one play he has left when faced with a court battle that could go either way.

tvmaze172_0077_0006_0001.name: To Trouble
tvmaze172_0077_0006_0001.summary: Season 6 begins immediately following the events of the shocking Season 5 cliffhanger that left Mike behind bars. After signing a plea deal to spare his colleagues at Pearson Specter Litt, Mike will be confronted with the harsh realities of prison life as he starts his two-year sentence. Meanwhile, the once bustling Pearson Specter Litt offices are a ghost town – the partners have defected, leaving Harvey, Jessica (Gina Torres), Louis (Rick Hoffman), Donna (Sarah Rafferty) and Rachel (Meghan Markle) to pick up the pieces. But the firm's troubles are far from over and they will have to deal with the fallout from Mike's crime before they can even begin to rebuild.

tvmaze172_0078_0006_0002.name: Accounts Payable
tvmaze172_0078_0006_0002.summary: PSL faces a class action lawsuit from former clients; and Mike has problems with a fellow prisoner.

tvmaze172_0079_0006_0003.name: Back on the Map
tvmaze172_0079_0006_0003.summary: Mike tries to remain safe without breaking Danbury's unwritten rules; Jessica and Harvey try to land a whale; Louis searches for an office tenant; and Rachel faces a fellow student

tvmaze172_0080_0006_0004.name: Turn
tvmaze172_0080_0006_0004.summary: Mike may take a deal to reduce his sentence; Jessica and Louis have different ways of dealing with their new tenants; and Rachel represents a death-row inmate.

tvmaze172_0081_0006_0005.name: Trust
tvmaze172_0081_0006_0005.summary: Mike tries to gain Kevin's trust while Harvey enacts a risky plan; Jessica mends the firm's reputation; Rachel runs into a roadblock; and Louis enlists Donna's help in a matter of the heart.

tvmaze172_0082_0006_0006.name: Spain
tvmaze172_0082_0006_0006.summary: Harvey defends Sutter from Cahill; Mike's past threatens to derail his mission; Rachel and Jessica search for evidence to re-open Bailey's case; and Louis woos Tara with a trip to the Hamptons.

tvmaze172_0083_0006_0007.name: Shake the Trees
tvmaze172_0083_0006_0007.summary: Harvey, Louis and Donna search for a link to Sutter's inside trading; Mike goes to extremes to get Kevin on his side; and Rachel and Jessica deliver bad news to Leonard Bailey.

tvmaze172_0084_0006_0008.name: Borrowed Time
tvmaze172_0084_0006_0008.summary: Harvey rebuts Cahill's star witness; and Mike tries to deliver one of his own. In other events, Jessica and Rachel try to delay Leonard's execution; and Louis adjusts to life as "the other man."

tvmaze172_0085_0006_0009.name: The Hand That Feeds You
tvmaze172_0085_0006_0009.summary: In order to protect Mike, Harvey considers putting Gallo back on the streets; Jessica and Rachel get Bailey's case re-opened; Louis deals with anxiety over Tara.

tvmaze172_0086_0006_0010.name: P.S.L.
tvmaze172_0086_0006_0010.summary: Jessica and Rachel fight to save Leonard Bailey; Harvey and Louis try to keep clients from abandoning ship by wooing their oldest client.

tvmaze172_0087_0006_0011.name: She's Gone
tvmaze172_0087_0006_0011.summary: Harvey, Louis and Donna plan for the future, after Jessica's departure from Pearson Specter Litt. Mike discovers the perils of life as an ex-convict. And Rachel considers her options for life after law school.

tvmaze172_0088_0006_0012.name: The Painting
tvmaze172_0088_0006_0012.summary: Harvey tries to repair a broken relationship - leaving Louis, Donna and Rachel to manage PSL in his absence. Meanwhile, Mike gets a helping hand from an unexpected place.

tvmaze172_0089_0006_0013.name: Teeth, Nose, Teeth
tvmaze172_0089_0006_0013.summary: Rachel receives a letter that creates an unexpected issue for Harvey and Louis. Mike's mentorship of Oliver and Marissa gets put to the test. And Donna gets a surprise from the IT department.

tvmaze172_0090_0006_0014.name: Admission of Guilt
tvmaze172_0090_0006_0014.summary: Harvey and Mike walk a fine line when they partner on a class action; Louis needs Rachel's help impressing a client during an annual presentation; and Donna and Benjamin refine their product.

tvmaze172_0091_0006_0015.name: Quid Pro Quo
tvmaze172_0091_0006_0015.summary: When Mike's class action hits a snag, it might cost him more than the case; Harvey, Louis and Rachel consider getting their hands dirty; and Donna and Benjamin seek an investor.

tvmaze172_0092_0006_0016.name: Character and Fitness
tvmaze172_0092_0006_0016.summary: Mike needs Harvey and Rachel's help to overcome an impossible obstacle, or his dream of becoming a real lawyer is over. Donna's new venture hits a snag. Louis tries to patch things up with Tara.

show_list.name: House of Cards
show_list.summary: Based on the BBC miniseries of the same name, House of Cards follows Francis Underwood, the politician's politician – masterful, beguiling, charismatic and ruthless. He and his equally ambitious wife Claire will stop at nothing to ensure their ascendancy. This wicked political drama slithers beneath the curtain and through the back halls of greed, sex, love and corruption in modern Washington D.C.

first_episode.name: Chapter 1
first_episode.summary: Allegiances are abandoned after a promise is broken in the opener of this drama, which follows a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife as they navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

last_episode.name: Chapter 65
last_episode.summary: In the wake of a surprising announcement, everything at the White House is shaken up. A decision must be made about whether to go to war.

tvmaze175_0001_0001_0001.name: Chapter 1
tvmaze175_0001_0001_0001.summary: Allegiances are abandoned after a promise is broken in the opener of this drama, which follows a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife as they navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

tvmaze175_0002_0001_0002.name: Chapter 2
tvmaze175_0002_0001_0002.summary: Francis attacks the White House through the media; Claire makes a cruel decision.

tvmaze175_0003_0001_0003.name: Chapter 3
tvmaze175_0003_0001_0003.summary: Francis deals with a crisis in his home district; Zoe experiences the politics of journalism.

tvmaze175_0004_0001_0004.name: Chapter 4
tvmaze175_0004_0001_0004.summary: Francis takes on leaders in Congress; Peter Russo is forced to choose between politics and family.

tvmaze175_0005_0001_0005.name: Chapter 5
tvmaze175_0005_0001_0005.summary: Francis' fight over an education bill creates unfortunate side effects.

tvmaze175_0006_0001_0006.name: Chapter 6
tvmaze175_0006_0001_0006.summary: Francis battles striking teachers; Claire receives a surprise confession.

tvmaze175_0007_0001_0007.name: Chapter 7
tvmaze175_0007_0001_0007.summary: Francis wins a major victory; Peter faces his past; and Stamper attempts to bury a secret.

tvmaze175_0008_0001_0008.name: Chapter 8
tvmaze175_0008_0001_0008.summary: Francis receives an honor; Peter returns to Philadelphia.

tvmaze175_0009_0001_0009.name: Chapter 9
tvmaze175_0009_0001_0009.summary: Francis and Stamper seek support in Congress.

tvmaze175_0010_0001_0010.name: Chapter 10
tvmaze175_0010_0001_0010.summary: Claire defies Francis; Peter presents an ultimatum.

tvmaze175_0011_0001_0011.name: Chapter 11
tvmaze175_0011_0001_0011.summary: Peter battles personal demons; Francis enters dangerous territory.

tvmaze175_0013_0001_0013.name: Chapter 13
tvmaze175_0013_0001_0013.summary: Francis desperately tries to keep his plan on track in the Season 1 finale. Later, Claire suffers the consequences of her decisions.

tvmaze175_0014_0002_0001.name: Chapter 14
tvmaze175_0014_0002_0001.summary: The Underwoods face two threats in the Season 2 premiere. Later, Francis grooms his replacement; and Claire goes on the offensive.

tvmaze175_0015_0002_0002.name: Chapter 15
tvmaze175_0015_0002_0002.summary: Francis targets China. Meanwhile, Claire confronts a painful trauma from her past; and Lucas Goodwin presses for the truth.

tvmaze175_0016_0002_0003.name: Chapter 16
tvmaze175_0016_0002_0003.summary: Tensions rise between Francis and Raymond Tusk. Later, a battle in the Senate pits Francis against the Republicans.

tvmaze175_0017_0002_0004.name: Chapter 17
tvmaze175_0017_0002_0004.summary: A terror scare at the Capitol traps Francis with a resentful Donald Blythe. Meanwhile, Claire gives an attention-grabbing live interview.

tvmaze175_0018_0002_0005.name: Chapter 18
tvmaze175_0018_0002_0005.summary: Lucas goes to extreme measures to expose Francis.

tvmaze175_0019_0002_0006.name: Chapter 19
tvmaze175_0019_0002_0006.summary: Francis and Tusk end their alliance. Meanwhile, Lucas must make a difficult choice; and Stamper grows closer to Rachel.

tvmaze175_0020_0002_0007.name: Chapter 20
tvmaze175_0020_0002_0007.summary: The Walkers deepen their friendship with the Underwoods.

tvmaze175_0021_0002_0008.name: Chapter 21
