tvmaze175_0021_0002_0008.summary: Claire influences Tricia Walker politically and domestically. Later, Francis has a showdown with Linda Vasquez.

tvmaze175_0023_0002_0010.name: Chapter 23
tvmaze175_0023_0002_0010.summary: Francis tries to finish off Tusk for good. Later, Claire and Jackie Sharp collide.

tvmaze175_0024_0002_0011.name: Chapter 24
tvmaze175_0024_0002_0011.summary: Francis is interrogated. Meanwhile, Stamper wrestles with personal demons.

tvmaze175_0025_0002_0012.name: Chapter 25
tvmaze175_0025_0002_0012.summary: Francis finds himself shut out. Later, Claire makes a difficult sacrifice; and Stamper tries to regain control.

tvmaze175_0026_0002_0013.name: Chapter 26
tvmaze175_0026_0002_0013.summary: Francis faces annihilation in the Season 2 finale. Meanwhile, Stamper ties up loose ends; and Claire feels the repercussions of ruthlessness.

tvmaze175_0027_0003_0001.name: Chapter 27
tvmaze175_0027_0003_0001.summary: A rocky start for the Underwood Presidency. Frank wants to introduce an ambitious jobs program, while Claire sets her sights on the United Nations.

tvmaze175_0028_0003_0002.name: Chapter 28
tvmaze175_0028_0003_0002.summary: Claire's U.N. bid runs into trouble. Frank fights off mutiny with a bold address to the country.

tvmaze175_0029_0003_0003.name: Chapter 29
tvmaze175_0029_0003_0003.summary: The Russian President's state visit becomes a Cold War of wills and some punks heat things up.

tvmaze175_0030_0003_0004.name: Chapter 30
tvmaze175_0030_0003_0004.summary: Claire bypasses Russia at the U.N. Frank tries to outmaneuver a potential challenger and ends up face to face with a higher power.

tvmaze175_0031_0003_0005.name: Chapter 31
tvmaze175_0031_0003_0005.summary: Frank declares war on Congress to jump-start his jobs program. Claire spars with the Russian ambassador.

tvmaze175_0032_0003_0006.name: Chapter 32
tvmaze175_0032_0003_0006.summary: Frank and Claire travel to Moscow to negotiate the return of an imprisoned U.S. citizen. Claire takes a stand that jeopardizes their plans.

tvmaze175_0033_0003_0007.name: Chapter 33
tvmaze175_0033_0003_0007.summary: The damage is done, and the Underwoods must repair it. But deep wounds don't heal fast and sometimes not at all.

tvmaze175_0034_0003_0008.name: Chapter 34
tvmaze175_0034_0003_0008.summary: A hurricane endangers more than just the entire East Coast, and Frank must make a difficult choice.

tvmaze175_0035_0003_0009.name: Chapter 35
tvmaze175_0035_0003_0009.summary: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos just as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

tvmaze175_0036_0003_0010.name: Chapter 36
tvmaze175_0036_0003_0010.summary: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one, while Claire tries to preserve the peacekeeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.

tvmaze175_0037_0003_0011.name: Chapter 37
tvmaze175_0037_0003_0011.summary: Things turn ugly when Frank, Jackie, and Heather square off during their first debate. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

tvmaze175_0038_0003_0012.name: Chapter 38
tvmaze175_0038_0003_0012.summary: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos just as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

tvmaze175_0039_0003_0013.name: Chapter 39
tvmaze175_0039_0003_0013.summary: In the midst of the Iowa caucuses, Frank and Claire must confront hard truths about each other.

tvmaze175_0040_0004_0001.name: Chapter 40
tvmaze175_0040_0004_0001.summary: Claire's absence causes problems for Frank on the campaign trail amid rumors of a marital rift. Claire tries to strike out on her own.

tvmaze175_0041_0004_0002.name: Chapter 41
tvmaze175_0041_0004_0002.summary: As Claire begins exploring a campaign of her own, she and Frank engage in backdoor political maneuvering. But this time they're not on the same side.

tvmaze175_0042_0004_0003.name: Chapter 42
tvmaze175_0042_0004_0003.summary: Claire joins Frank as he stumps in South Carolina, but he doesn't trust her. A disastrous scandal blindsides Frank's campaign on primary day.

tvmaze175_0043_0004_0004.name: Chapter 43
tvmaze175_0043_0004_0004.summary: Claire threatens Frank. Frank makes a politically bold move that may provoke Russia. An event at a campaign stop changes everything.

tvmaze175_0044_0004_0005.name: Chapter 44
tvmaze175_0044_0004_0005.summary: Claire advises Donald Blythe on dealing with Petrov. Further investigations of Lucas Goodwin dredges up his accusations against Frank.

tvmaze175_0045_0004_0006.name: Chapter 45
tvmaze175_0045_0004_0006.summary: Claire clashes with the Secretary of State over her involvement in negotiations with Russia. Dunbar must choose between her campaign and her ethics.

tvmaze175_0046_0004_0007.name: Chapter 46
tvmaze175_0046_0004_0007.summary: Frank and Claire adjust to their new reality. The search for Frank's running mate begins. Frank starts a campaign to weaken Conway's strong support.

tvmaze175_0047_0004_0008.name: Chapter 47
tvmaze175_0047_0004_0008.summary: Formidable as ever, both Underwoods have their eyes on the big picture as they manipulate a potential running mate and push the gun bill.

tvmaze175_0048_0004_0009.name: Chapter 48
tvmaze175_0048_0004_0009.summary: At the convention, Frank and his team publicly push for Catherine Durant to be chosen as his running mate, but privately pursue a different agenda.

tvmaze175_0049_0004_0010.name: Chapter 49
tvmaze175_0049_0004_0010.summary: As Frank deals with a new threat to his candidacy, Claire has doubts about their plan. Claire faces a difficult decision concerning her mother.

tvmaze175_0050_0004_0011.name: Chapter 50
tvmaze175_0050_0004_0011.summary: Frank ups the ante on the war on terror to counter Conway's public show of strength. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

tvmaze175_0051_0004_0012.name: Chapter 51
tvmaze175_0051_0004_0012.summary: Frank asks Will to help deal with extremists threatening to murder hostages. Hammerschmidt digs deeper into the allegations against Frank.

tvmaze175_0052_0004_0013.name: Chapter 52
tvmaze175_0052_0004_0013.summary: As the hostage situation continues, Claire secretly negotiates with Yusuf al Ahmadi. Frank confronts Hammerschmidt.

tvmaze175_0053_0005_0001.name: Chapter 53
tvmaze175_0053_0005_0001.summary: As Congress debates investigating Frank, he and Claire attempt to stoke fear of terrorism. Tom Yates continues his stay in the White House.

tvmaze175_0054_0005_0002.name: Chapter 54
tvmaze175_0054_0005_0002.summary: Frank and his team work to leverage support in key states by any means necessary. Claire learns some upsetting news about one of Frank's friends.

tvmaze175_0055_0005_0003.name: Chapter 55
tvmaze175_0055_0005_0003.summary: The day before the election, Conway holds a 24-hour Skype session with voters, while Frank and Claire stump in key states and try to discredit him.

tvmaze175_0056_0005_0004.name: Chapter 56
tvmaze175_0056_0005_0004.summary: With a tight race and low voter turnout on Election Day, things look grim for Frank. But he's still got one more trick up his sleeve.

tvmaze175_0057_0005_0005.name: Chapter 57
tvmaze175_0057_0005_0005.summary: Nine weeks after Election Day, the Underwoods work to consolidate their power. Leann tries to track down a missing Aidan Macallan.

tvmaze175_0058_0005_0006.name: Chapter 58
tvmaze175_0058_0005_0006.summary: In the midst of uncertainty, suspected Russian forces take over an American station in Antarctica. Meanwhile, a damaging news leak could hurt Frank.

tvmaze175_0059_0005_0007.name: Chapter 59
tvmaze175_0059_0005_0007.summary: When a crisis forces White House personnel to take shelter in a bunker, Commerce Department official Jane Davis negotiates through back channels.

tvmaze175_0060_0005_0008.name: Chapter 60
tvmaze175_0060_0005_0008.summary: While Frank attends an elite men's weekend gathering to firm up support, Claire deals with a stranded Russian ship and threats from Petrov.

tvmaze175_0061_0005_0009.name: Chapter 61
tvmaze175_0061_0005_0009.summary: Petrov tries to influence affairs in the U.S. Jane discusses her agenda with Claire. With her job at stake, Leann reaches out to a reporter for help.

tvmaze175_0062_0005_0010.name: Chapter 62
tvmaze175_0062_0005_0010.summary: The Underwoods and their team angle to undermine the revived committee investigating Frank. Hammerschmidt's investigation heats up.

tvmaze175_0063_0005_0011.name: Chapter 63
tvmaze175_0063_0005_0011.summary: As the team tries to control fallout from damaging testimony and leaks, everyone is under suspicion and tensions flare between Frank and Claire.

tvmaze175_0064_0005_0012.name: Chapter 64
tvmaze175_0064_0005_0012.summary: Frank attempts to stop Cathy from testifying. With Hammerschmidt sniffing out the truth, the Underwoods throw someone close to them under the bus.

tvmaze175_0065_0005_0013.name: Chapter 65
tvmaze175_0065_0005_0013.summary: In the wake of a surprising announcement, everything at the White House is shaken up. A decision must be made about whether to go to war.

show_list.name: Supergirl
show_list.summary: Born on the planet Krypton, Kara Zor-El escaped amid its destruction years ago. Since arriving on Earth, she's been hiding the powers she shares with her famous cousin. But now at age 24, she decides to embrace her superhuman abilities and become the hero she was destined to be, Supergirl.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Twenty-four-year-old Kara Zor-El, cousin of Superman, who was taken in by the Danvers family when she was 12 after being sent away from Krypton, must learn to embrace her powers after previously hiding them.

previous_episode.name: Nevertheless, She Persisted
previous_episode.summary: Lillian comes up with the ultimate weapon to drive the Daxamites off of Earth, but Supergirl is reluctant to make the sacrifice necessary. Instead, she challenges Rhea to a ritual trial by combat to save National City and Earth. Superman returns. Cat Grant offers Supergirl some sage advice.

tvmaze1850_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze1850_0001_0001_0001.summary: Twenty-four-year-old Kara Zor-El, cousin of Superman, who was taken in by the Danvers family when she was 12 after being sent away from Krypton, must learn to embrace her powers after previously hiding them.

tvmaze1850_0002_0001_0002.name: Stronger Together
tvmaze1850_0002_0001_0002.summary: A new Fort Rozz prisoner, Hellgrammite, commits a series of robberies of chemical manufacturing plants. While the DEO goes after him, Supergirl discovers that fame is fickle when the public turns against her after a series of mishaps.

tvmaze1850_0003_0001_0003.name: Fight or Flight
tvmaze1850_0003_0001_0003.summary: Supergirl faces her first non-alien nemesis when one of her cousin's enemies--the nuclear-powered Reactron--comes looking to kill her. Meanwhile, Cat runs a derogatory exposé on Supergirl after interviewing the superhero.

tvmaze1850_0004_0001_0004.name: Livewire
tvmaze1850_0004_0001_0004.summary: Kara has her hands full dealing with her foster mother Eliza's visit as well as a new super-villain, Livewire, who is out for revenge against Cat.

tvmaze1850_0005_0001_0005.name: How Does She Do It?
tvmaze1850_0005_0001_0005.summary: Kara finds herself juggling her personal and public lives when she offers to take care of Cat's son Carter, deal with James' relationship with Lucy, and try to stop a bomber who is targeting Maxtech properties.

tvmaze1850_0006_0001_0006.name: Red Faced
tvmaze1850_0006_0001_0006.summary: While Kara deals with personal pressures as both office assistant and superhero, General Sam Lane arrives in National City to field-test his new anti-insurgent android, Red Tornado... and to tell James that he's not good enough for his daughter Lucy. Meanwhile, Alex and Kara ask Winn to hack the DEO mainframe to find out how Jeremiah died, and Cat deals with her domineering mother.

tvmaze1850_0007_0001_0007.name: Human for a Day
tvmaze1850_0007_0001_0007.summary: Kara is still without her powers when an earthquake rocks National City. Now she and her friends must rise to the occasion. Meanwhile, the DEO's attempts to restrain an escaped prisoner are threatened by Alex's mistrust of Hank after she learns of his role in Jeremiah's death.

tvmaze1850_0008_0001_0008.name: Hostile Takeover
tvmaze1850_0008_0001_0008.summary: Astra calls Supergirl out to fight, but soon loses. However, Hank and Alex suspect that the Kryptonian general lost too easily. Meanwhile, an email hack threatens Cat's position as CEO of CatCo, and Kara learns that someone is trying to force her boss out of the company.

tvmaze1850_0009_0001_0009.name: Blood Bonds
tvmaze1850_0009_0001_0009.summary: Supergirl tries to convince her aunt to help them recover Hank from the Kryptonians and is forced to rely on blind faith. Meanwhile, Max continues his campaign to bring down Supergirl, and Kara tries to convince Cat that she and Supergirl are not one and the same.

tvmaze1850_0010_0001_0010.name: Childish Things
tvmaze1850_0010_0001_0010.summary: The Toyman--Winn's father--breaks out of prison and begins a new criminal rampage on a quest to be reunited with his son. Meanwhile, Lucy accepts a job at CatCo, much to Jimmy's discomfort.

tvmaze1850_0011_0001_0011.name: Strange Visitor from Another Planet
tvmaze1850_0011_0001_0011.summary: Kara must help Hank face his painful past when a White Martian, a member of the alien race that wiped out his people, kidnaps Senator Miranda Crane, an anti-alien politician. Also, Cat's estranged son, Adam, arrives in National City.

tvmaze1850_0012_0001_0012.name: Bizarro
tvmaze1850_0012_0001_0012.summary: Max creates a reverse image of Supergirl using her DNA, and sets it to fight the Woman of Steel. Meanwhile, James and Winn share a drink, and Max reveals to Alex how much he knows about her connection to Supergirl.

tvmaze1850_0013_0001_0013.name: For the Girl Who Has Everything
tvmaze1850_0013_0001_0013.summary: Supergirl is ensnared by an alien plant that forces her into her deepest desire, and her friends and sister must free her before it's too late. Meanwhile, the Kryptonians launch their plan to bring humanity to its knees and save Earth.

tvmaze1850_0014_0001_0014.name: Truth, Justice and the American Way
tvmaze1850_0014_0001_0014.summary: An armored alien with advanced tech is hunting down the Fort Rozz prisoners... and executing them. While Supergirl tries to find him, James questions whether the DEO has the right to lock up Max without charges or a trial. Meanwhile, Kara tries to deal with Cat's new assistant at work, who is intent on upstaging Kara.

tvmaze1850_0015_0001_0015.name: Solitude
tvmaze1850_0015_0001_0015.summary: A new enemy emerges to threaten Supergirl and National City... and has a connection to Krypton. Meanwhile, Lucy demands the truth from James, and Kara continues refusing to work with Hank, unaware that Alex is the one who killed Astra.

tvmaze1850_0016_0001_0016.name: Falling
tvmaze1850_0016_0001_0016.summary: After defending Supergirl to the public, Cat is forced to issue a public warning after exposure to Red Kryptonite turns Supergirl into a power-mad villain.

tvmaze1850_0017_0001_0017.name: Manhunter
tvmaze1850_0017_0001_0017.summary: A captive Hank tells the U.S government how he came to lead the DEO, but receives a less than sympathetic ear. Meanwhile, Kara reveals her identity to someone close to the investigation, and Siobhan plans revenge Kara for getting her fired from CatCo.

tvmaze1850_0018_0001_0018.name: Worlds Finest
tvmaze1850_0018_0001_0018.summary: Supergirl finds herself in a super team-up when a new superhero, The Flash, accidentally crosses dimensions and finds himself in Kara's universe. Together they have to battle Livewire and a new villainess, Silver Banshee.

tvmaze1850_0019_0001_0019.name: Myriad
tvmaze1850_0019_0001_0019.summary: Kara must find a way to free her friends when Non and Indigo use mind control to turn National City's citizens into their own army.

tvmaze1850_0020_0001_0020.name: Better Angels
tvmaze1850_0020_0001_0020.summary: To stop Non from wiping out Earth's population, Supergirl has no choice but to sacrifice her life. Before she does so, Kara says goodbye as best she can to her friends without telling them the truth and inciting a panic.

tvmaze1850_0021_0002_0001.name: The Adventures of Supergirl
tvmaze1850_0021_0002_0001.summary: After a seemingly Kryptonian pod crashes in National City, Superman comes to visit his cousin. While the two of them try to determine if Lena Luthor--Lex's sister--is up to no good, Kara wrestles with her personal life.

tvmaze1850_0022_0002_0002.name: The Last Children of Krypton
tvmaze1850_0022_0002_0002.summary: Cadmus creates a second Metallo and declares war on any aliens on Earth. Meanwhile, Kara finds her new boss less than sympathetic, and Cat gives her surprising news.

tvmaze1850_0023_0002_0003.name: Welcome to Earth
tvmaze1850_0023_0002_0003.summary: Supergirl and the DEO are called on to protect the President when she comes to National City to sign her Alien Amnesty Act. However, a hostile alien threatens to kill the President and anyone who gets in its way. Meanwhile, Alex meets Maggie Sawyer, a detective with the NCPD's science division, and Snapper challenges James' authority.

tvmaze1850_0024_0002_0004.name: Survivors
tvmaze1850_0024_0002_0004.summary: While Hank tries to bond with Megan, Supergirl and Alex discover that a woman named Roulette is running an underground fight club using aliens as gladiators. Meanwhile, Mon-El convinces Winn to take him out for a night on the town.

tvmaze1850_0025_0002_0005.name: Crossfire
tvmaze1850_0025_0002_0005.summary: Cadmus provides a gang of crooks with alien weaponry in an attempt to spread fear and panic among the populace. Meanwhile, Kara tries to mentor Mon-El with minimal success, and James decides that he wants to be a superhero.

tvmaze1850_0026_0002_0006.name: Changing
tvmaze1850_0026_0002_0006.summary: Supergirl battles a scientist who has been possessed by an alien parasite, giving the ability to drain the lifeforce from anyone he touches. Meanwhile, Alex comes out to Kara, and the Guardian makes his first public appearance.

tvmaze1850_0027_0002_0007.name: The Darkest Place
tvmaze1850_0027_0002_0007.summary: While Cadmus captures Supegirl and Mon-El, Guardian and Winn go after a murderous vigilante that is letting Guardian take the blame for his murders. Meanwhile, Alex and Maggie have issues.

tvmaze1850_0028_0002_0008.name: Medusa
tvmaze1850_0028_0002_0008.summary:
When the Danvers celebrate Thanksgiving, Alex tries to find the right time to tell her mother Eliza that she's gay. Meanwhile, Lena is forced to choose when Supergirl tells her that Lillian plans to unleash a virus that will wipe out every alien in the city.

Crossover among four CW shows: Supergirl "Medusa"; The Flash "Invasion!"; Arrow ‘Invasion!"; DC's Legends of Tomorrow "Invasion!"

tvmaze1850_0029_0002_0009.name: Supergirl Lives
tvmaze1850_0029_0002_0009.summary: When a girl disappears, Kara discovers a pattern of missing people and goes looking with Mon-El... and they both end up on an alien planet under a red sun which renders them powerless. Meanwhile, Winn has a brush with death, and Alex and Maggie have their first disagreement.

tvmaze1850_0030_0002_0010.name: We Can Be Heroes
tvmaze1850_0030_0002_0010.summary: Livewire escapes prison, but the DEO soon realizes that she wasn't a willing escapee. Meanwhile, Megan collapses and Hank refuses to mind-meld with her to find out what is wrong with her, and James considers telling Kara that he's Guardian.

tvmaze1850_0031_0002_0011.name: The Martian Chronicles
tvmaze1850_0031_0002_0011.summary: M'gann's White Martian mate Armek comes to Earth to bring her back to face justice for her "treachery' When she takes refuge in the DEO, Armek infiltrates the building and uses his shapeshifting powers to spread confusion.

tvmaze1850_0032_0002_0012.name: Luthors
tvmaze1850_0032_0002_0012.summary: Metallo breaks Lillian out of jail and the evidence shows that Lena was responsible. Kara is the only one who believes that Lena is innocent, and sets out to prove it.

tvmaze1850_0033_0002_0013.name: Mr. & Mrs. Mxyzptlk
tvmaze1850_0033_0002_0013.summary: It's Valentine's Day, and Kara finds herself dealing with the amorous advances of Mxyztplk, a fifth-dimensional being with unlimited magical powers. Meanwhile, Alex discovers that Maggie hates Valentine's Day, while an alien woman hits on Winn.

tvmaze1850_0034_0002_0014.name: Homecoming
tvmaze1850_0034_0002_0014.summary: The DEO manages to rescue Jeremiah from Cadmus, but Mon-El's suspicions soon drive a wedge between him and the Danvers sisters. Meanwhile, Cadmus continues with its master plan to cleanse the planet of alien influence.

tvmaze1850_0035_0002_0015.name: Exodus
tvmaze1850_0035_0002_0015.summary: Alex refuses to obey Hank's orders to stand down and sets out to find Cadmus and protect Jeremiah. Meanwhile, Kara takes drastic steps when Snapper refuses to publish her story intended to protect the remaining aliens on Earth from Cadmus.

tvmaze1850_0036_0002_0016.name: Star-Crossed
tvmaze1850_0036_0002_0016.summary: Mon-El's parents arrive to bring home and help restore Daxam to its former glory... and Supergirl realizes that Mon-El has been lying to her. Meanwhile, Winn discovers that Lyra has set him up when he's the prime suspect in a museum robbery. The Music Meister puts Supergirl into a coma and the story line concludes in The Flash: "Duet", Season 3, Episode 17.

tvmaze1850_0037_0002_0017.name: Distant Sun
tvmaze1850_0037_0002_0017.summary: Someone hires bounty hunters to kill Supergirl, and Mon-El believes that his parents are responsible. Meanwhile, Maggie and Alex run into Maggie's old girlfriend, and President Marsdin gives express orders to Hank not to attack the Daxamites.

tvmaze1850_0038_0002_0018.name: Ace Reporter
tvmaze1850_0038_0002_0018.summary:
Watched

Lena's ex, Jack Spheer, arrives in National City to roll out a new nanite medical procedure. However, Kara soon realizes that something more is going on when one of the human test subjects die under mysterious circumstances. Meanwhile, Lyra comes between Winn and James in their crimefighting efforts.

tvmaze1850_0039_0002_0019.name: Alex
tvmaze1850_0039_0002_0019.summary: A man abducts Alex and threatens to kill her unless Kara helps a supermax prisoner escape... and the abductor knows that Kara is Supergirl. Meanwhile, Rhea approaches Lena with an offer.

tvmaze1850_0040_0002_0020.name: City of Lost Children
tvmaze1850_0040_0002_0020.summary: Alien refugees, the Phorians, trigger telekinetic quakes every time that Lena and Rhea activate the portal. While James tries to get through to one alien boy who knows where the others are, the DEO tries to find the portal before it's too late for National City.

tvmaze1850_0041_0002_0021.name: Resist
tvmaze1850_0041_0002_0021.summary: Alex takes over as Acting Director of the DEO as the Daxamites take over National City, open fire on Air Force One, and recruit a familiar face to their side. Meanwhile, Cat Grant returns to National City to inspire Supergirl and the populace.

tvmaze1850_0042_0002_0022.name: Nevertheless, She Persisted
tvmaze1850_0042_0002_0022.summary: Lillian comes up with the ultimate weapon to drive the Daxamites off of Earth, but Supergirl is reluctant to make the sacrifice necessary. Instead, she challenges Rhea to a ritual trial by combat to save National City and Earth. Superman returns. Cat Grant offers Supergirl some sage advice.

show_list.name: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
show_list.summary: When heroes alone are not enough... the world needs legends. Having seen the future, one he will desperately try to prevent from happening, time-traveling rogue Rip Hunter is tasked with assembling a disparate group of both heroes and villains to confront an unstoppable threat - one in which not only is the planet at stake, but all of time itself. Can this ragtag team defeat an immortal threat unlike anything they have ever known?

first_episode.name: Pilot, Part 1
first_episode.summary: Rip Hunter, Time Master, assembles a team of heroes and villains from the year 2016 to battle Vandal Savage, who has conquered Earth in the year 2166. To stop Vandal, they must travel throughout the villain's timeline and stop him from amassing enough power to become a world-conquering tyrant. First stop: 1975 and a meeting with the academic who knows the most about Vandal.

previous_episode.name: Aruba
previous_episode.summary: The 2017 team has no choice but to go back to 1916 and stop the Legion from getting the Spear of Destiny... even though if they meet their past selves it could a temporal calamity.

tvmaze1851_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot, Part 1
tvmaze1851_0001_0001_0001.summary: Rip Hunter, Time Master, assembles a team of heroes and villains from the year 2016 to battle Vandal Savage, who has conquered Earth in the year 2166. To stop Vandal, they must travel throughout the villain's timeline and stop him from amassing enough power to become a world-conquering tyrant. First stop: 1975 and a meeting with the academic who knows the most about Vandal.

tvmaze1851_0002_0001_0002.name: Pilot, Part 2
tvmaze1851_0002_0001_0002.summary: The team goes after Savage's operation in Norway in 1975, but the mission goes bad when Savage detonates the nuclear warhead he is trying to sell. Atom loses a piece of his suit's technology, and Martin contacts his younger self in 1975 in the hopes of finding it. Meanwhile, Carter and Kendra learn of a dagger that can kill Savage for good, but Kendra has to recall her first life in order to use it.

tvmaze1851_0003_0001_0003.name: Blood Ties
tvmaze1851_0003_0001_0003.summary: With Waverider undergoing repairs in 1975, Sara and Rip set out to check the bank where Vandal keeps his money. Meanwhile, Ray and Martin try to save Kendra's life, and Len, Mick, and Jax take a trip to Central City.

tvmaze1851_0004_0001_0004.name: White Knights
tvmaze1851_0004_0001_0004.summary: The team gets a lead on Vandal in 1986, and travels to Russia to discover what he's trying to create. While Len and Ray try to get close to the lead scientist, Rip entertains an offer from the Time Masters Council.

tvmaze1851_0005_0001_0005.name: Fail-Safe
tvmaze1851_0005_0001_0005.summary: Rip sends Len and Sara in to rescue Martin, Ray, and Mick from the Russian gulag. However, he gives Sara secondary orders in case their rescue attempt fails. Meanwhile, Ray takes a beating for Mick, while Kendra helps Jax prove himself without becoming Firestorm.

tvmaze1851_0006_0001_0006.name: Star City 2046
tvmaze1851_0006_0001_0006.summary: The team finds itself stranded in Star City 2046, in a future where Vandal has conquered Earth and the city's defenders have fallen. Despite Rip's warnings, Sara sets out to find Oliver Queen and help him fight the city's ruler: Grant Wilson, the new Deathstroke.

tvmaze1851_0007_0001_0007.name: Marooned
tvmaze1851_0007_0001_0007.summary: While trying to pick up Vandal's trail, Waverider receives a distress signal from a sister ship. Rip goes to investigate, only to discover that time pirates have set a trap for him and his crew.

tvmaze1851_0008_0001_0008.name: Night of the Hawk
tvmaze1851_0008_0001_0008.summary: The team tracks Savage to a small town in Oregon during the 1950s. Upon arrival, they discover there have been a recent string of murders and they suspect Savage is involved.

tvmaze1851_0009_0001_0009.name: Left Behind
tvmaze1851_0009_0001_0009.summary: Trapped in 1958 when Waverider leaves them behind, Ray and Kendra bond as a couple while Sara decides to return to the League of Assassins and Ra's al Ghul. Meanwhile, Chronos abducts Len and reveals his true identity.

tvmaze1851_0010_0001_0010.name: Progeny
tvmaze1851_0010_0001_0010.summary: The team convinces Rip not to kill Per Degaton, a boy who as an adult will help Vandal conquer the planet. However, Rip has other ideas and soon abducts the boy. Meanwhile, Kendra remembers more of her past with Carter, Ray meets an ancestor, and Sara tells Len to talk with the imprisoned Mick.

tvmaze1851_0011_0001_0011.name: The Magnificent Eight
tvmaze1851_0011_0001_0011.summary: When the team needs a place to hide out, Rip sets a course for the Old West. Upon arrival, they start a fight with a gang of outlaws, putting the small town in jeopardy. Luckily, an old friend of Rip's, Jonah Hex, steps in to save them.

tvmaze1851_0012_0001_0012.name: Last Refuge
tvmaze1851_0012_0001_0012.summary: The Time Masters send their top assassin, The Pilgrim, back in time to kill the team's younger selves and eliminate them from the timestream. Once the team removes their past selves from the time stream, they are forced to take refuge in the place where Rip grew up.

tvmaze1851_0013_0001_0013.name: Leviathan
tvmaze1851_0013_0001_0013.summary: The team goes after Vandal in 2146, and discover that he has a daughter. Meanwhile, Kendra discovers how she can kill Vandal but makes a startling discovery when she confronts the immortal tyrant.

tvmaze1851_0014_0001_0014.name: River of Time
tvmaze1851_0014_0001_0014.summary: The team attempts to return Vandal to the Vanishing Point for trial, after discovering that he has learned how to time travel and poses a threat to the timeline. However, the damaged Waverider may not be able to make the journey. Meanwhile, a captive Vandal attempts to turn the team against each other.

tvmaze1851_0015_0001_0015.name: Destiny
tvmaze1851_0015_0001_0015.summary: At the Vanishing Point, the Time Masters reveal the source of their power to Rip and how they've been manipulating the team... and why. Meanwhile, Mick is reprogrammed to serve as Chronos once more and hunt down Sara and Len, while Vandal travels to 2166 with Kendra to fulfill his destiny.

tvmaze1851_0016_0001_0016.name: Legendary
tvmaze1851_0016_0001_0016.summary: Rip returns his teammates to 2016 so that they can take up their original lives. However, they insist on completing their mission and the team soon begins hunting Vandal and his captives, Kendra and Carter.

tvmaze1851_0017_0002_0001.name: Out of Time
tvmaze1851_0017_0002_0001.summary: Historian Hank Heywood notices the presence of the Legends in the past, and contacts Oliver Queen. The two of them find Waverider--and Mick--in the waters of the Atlantic. Once revived, Mick tells them what happened to the team in 1942.

tvmaze1851_0018_0002_0002.name: The Justice Society of America
tvmaze1851_0018_0002_0002.summary: In 1942, the Legends are forced to team up with the Justice Society of America to recover a mystic amulet from the Nazis... unaware that Reverse Flash wants the Amulet for himself. Meanwhile, Nate meets his grandfather, Commander Steel, while Ray and JSA member Vixen bond.

tvmaze1851_0019_0002_0003.name: Shogun
tvmaze1851_0019_0002_0003.summary: Nate discovers that thanks to the Nazi serum, he can transform his skin into steel. However, in his first training session, he accidentally blasts himself and Ray out of the ship... and into 1641 Japan. Meanwhile, Jax and Martin discover a hidden compartment in Waverider and a cryptic message from a friend.

tvmaze1851_0020_0002_0004.name: Abominations
tvmaze1851_0020_0002_0004.summary: The team follows a stranded time pirate to Mississippi, 1863, and discover that the man has unleashed a bioweapon that transforms humans into zombie-like creatures. If they don't stop the zombies from overrunning Grant's army, history will be altered beyond repair.

tvmaze1851_0021_0002_0005.name: Compromised
tvmaze1851_0021_0002_0005.summary: The Legends trace a temporal aberration to the White House in 1987 and discover that Darhk is trying to obtain a rare item. Amaya teams up with a former JSA teammate, while Martin tries to convince his younger self to pay more attention to his wife before it's too late. Meanwhile, Mick has second thoughts about making Ray the new Captain Cold.

tvmaze1851_0022_0002_0006.name: Outlaw Country
tvmaze1851_0022_0002_0006.summary: The team detects a timequake in 1874 and travel to Colorado, where they meet their former ally Jonah Hex. Jonah is on the trail of an outlaw, Quentin Turnbull, and the team realize that Quentin is the reason for the timequake. Meanwhile, Amaya gives Mick advice on controlling his rage, and Martin has memories of a woman he doesn't know.

tvmaze1851_0023_0002_0007.name: Invasion!
tvmaze1851_0023_0002_0007.summary: The abducted heroes return to Earth and tell the others about the Dominators' plans. Meanwhile, Martin deals with the daughter he never had until he altered the timeline, while Steel, Vixen, and Heat Wave go back to 1951 to capture a Dominator.

tvmaze1851_0024_0002_0008.name: The Chicago Way
tvmaze1851_0024_0002_0008.summary: The team travel to Chicago, 1927, to prevent a timequake and find Damian and the mysterious speedster responsible... and they've teamed up with Malcolm Merlin. As the villains try to regain the amulet the Legends took from them, Mick is plagued by hallucinations of an old friend. Meanwhile, Martin reveals the existence of his daughter to Jax.

tvmaze1851_0025_0002_0009.name: Raiders of the Lost Art
tvmaze1851_0025_0002_0009.summary: The team follow a temporal aberration to 1967 and find their former captain Rip Hunter... with no memory of who he is, and directing a student film. Damien and Malcolm arrive due to the Medallion, and the Legends soon realize that they're after something that Rip has... even if he doesn't know it.

tvmaze1851_0026_0002_0010.name: The Legion of Doom
tvmaze1851_0026_0002_0010.summary: While the Legends deal with Martin's daughter and try to work out the identity of the speedster opposing them, Malcolm and Damien have their own demands for Eobard while trying to tap into Rip's memories.

tvmaze1851_0027_0002_0011.name: Turncoat
tvmaze1851_0027_0002_0011.summary: The Legends trace a timequake to Christmas Day, 1776... and discover that George Washington has been killed. They try to save Washington's life but the mission goes awry when Mick is captured by the British, Sara is shot, Ray is trapped at six inches, and Nate and Amaya are the only ones left to track Mick and the missing Washington.

tvmaze1851_0028_0002_0012.name: Camelot/3000
tvmaze1851_0028_0002_0012.summary: After Rip takes a fragment of the Spear from JSA member Dr. Mid-Nite in 3000, the Legends travel to 507 AD to stop Rip and Damien from acquiring another fragment hidden at the court of King Arthur.

tvmaze1851_0029_0002_0013.name: Land of the Lost
tvmaze1851_0029_0002_0013.summary: Rip forces Waverider down in 65 million B.C. While Ray, Nate, and Amaya seek out a lost piece of technology they need to restore the timeship, Jax and Sara enter Rip's subconscious in a desperate attempt to find the location of the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny.

tvmaze1851_0030_0002_0014.name: Moonshot
tvmaze1851_0030_0002_0014.summary: The Legends locate Henry Heywood in 1970, at Mission Control in Houston. They approach him and learn where he hid the fragment of the Spear... and that Eobard is planning to use Apollo 13 to gain the fragment for the Legion.

tvmaze1851_0031_0002_0015.name: Fellowship of the Spear
tvmaze1851_0031_0002_0015.summary: After stealing the remaining Spear fragment from the Legion, the team realizes that the relic is too dangerous for anyone to possess it. Destroying the Spear requires the blood of Christ, and the only place it can be found is at the Battle of Somme in 1916. However, to find the blood, the Legends need the help of soldier J.R.R. Tolkien.

tvmaze1851_0032_0002_0016.name: Doomworld
tvmaze1851_0032_0002_0016.summary: The Legion of Doom use the Spear to rewrite reality to their specifications. The Legends have no memory of their former existence, except for Mick... who is now partnered with Len. However, Nate soon realizes that something is wrong and sets out to restore his teammate's memories.

tvmaze1851_0033_0002_0017.name: Aruba
tvmaze1851_0033_0002_0017.summary: The 2017 team has no choice but to go back to 1916 and stop the Legion from getting the Spear of Destiny... even though if they meet their past selves it could a temporal calamity.

show_list.name: Blindspot
show_list.summary: A beautiful woman, with no memories of her past, is found naked in Times Square with her body fully covered in intricate tattoos. Her discovery sets off a vast and complex mystery that immediately ignites the attention of the FBI, which begins to follow the road map on her body into a larger conspiracy of crime, while bringing her closer to discovering the truth about her identity.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: A beautiful woman is found naked in Times Square, covered in fresh tattoos and with no idea who she is. So why is FBI Agent Kurt Weller's name on her back?

previous_episode.name: Lepers Repel
previous_episode.summary: As the FBI copes with a tragedy, Weller finds himself at the center of a surprising event. Jane faces an uncertain future.

tvmaze1855_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze1855_0001_0001_0001.summary: A beautiful woman is found naked in Times Square, covered in fresh tattoos and with no idea who she is. So why is FBI Agent Kurt Weller's name on her back?

tvmaze1855_0002_0001_0002.name: A Stray Howl
tvmaze1855_0002_0001_0002.summary: The team unlocks a cryptic tattoo that points to Major Arthur Gibson, an Air Force pilot with a painful past and a lethal agenda. Jane continues to search for clues to her identity and is haunted when flashes of a disturbing memory force her to question her past. Meanwhile, Weller thinks he might know Jane's true identity.

tvmaze1855_0003_0001_0003.name: Eight Slim Grins
tvmaze1855_0003_0001_0003.summary: An infamous crew of thieves almost pulls off the perfect jewel heist, except one thief - with a Navy SEAL tattoo identical to Jane's - is captured at the scene of the crime. Does this man know Jane? Meanwhile, Jane receives a visit - and an ambiguous warning - from the mysterious bearded man from her first memory as Weller and Mayfair struggle with Jane's role on the team.

tvmaze1855_0004_0001_0004.name: Bone May Rot
tvmaze1855_0004_0001_0004.summary: Patterson and her puzzle-expert boyfriend, David, decode a tattoo clue that sends the team to the Centers for Disease Control. While at the CDC, the team discovers a hidden message on Jane's body that uncovers a plot that could have catastrophic global consequences. Meanwhile, Jane and Weller grow closer.

tvmaze1855_0005_0001_0005.name: Split the Law
tvmaze1855_0005_0001_0005.summary: After a seemingly straightforward hostage situation turns out to have deeper international implications, the CIA and FBI find themselves racing against each other to apprehend the same criminal with a dark history. Carter expresses concern about Jane's trustworthiness, causing friction with Mayfair and testing Reade's loyalty to the team. Meeting Weller's family proves overwhelming for Jane as she grapples with her identity.

tvmaze1855_0006_0001_0006.name: Cede Your Soul
tvmaze1855_0006_0001_0006.summary: When an assassination leads the team to a dangerous app that allows criminals to track government vehicles, they have to work with the app's surprising creator to take it down. Jane and Weller attempt to keep their relationship professional. Zapata struggles with a moral issue.

tvmaze1855_0007_0001_0007.name: Sent on Tour
tvmaze1855_0007_0001_0007.summary: One of Jane's tattoos sends the team to a remote location where they find themselves face to face with a dangerous criminal in a case that puts Jane and Weller's strained relationship to the test and threatens to expose Mayfair's secrets. Meanwhile, Patterson breaks the rules to solve a tattoo puzzle.

tvmaze1855_0008_0001_0008.name: Persecute Envoys
tvmaze1855_0008_0001_0008.summary: After a police officer is murdered, Patterson unlocks a disturbing tattoo that appears to have predicted his killing, and the team chases a violent clue trail to stop further attacks. Mayfair reveals secrets from her past to Weller, seriously testing their relationship.

tvmaze1855_0009_0001_0009.name: Authentic Flirt
tvmaze1855_0009_0001_0009.summary: Jane and Weller go undercover as a world-class assassin couple to prevent deadly information from getting into the wrong hands. The intimate assignment draws them closer than ever. Meanwhile, David embarks on a solo mission to win Patterson back, and Carter clashes with Mayfair over how to handle a dangerous individual.

tvmaze1855_0010_0001_0010.name: Evil Handmade Instrument
tvmaze1855_0010_0001_0010.summary: In the thrilling mid-season finale the team goes after a group of sleeper spies that have just been activated and race to stop a slew of assassinations.

tvmaze1855_0011_0001_0011.name: Cease Forcing Enemy
tvmaze1855_0011_0001_0011.summary: Jane reels from a series of massive revelations about her tattoos and grapples with whether to trust Oscar. Meanwhile, a tattoo leads the team to a shocking discovery in the Black Sea.

tvmaze1855_0012_0001_0012.name: Scientists Hollow Fortune
tvmaze1855_0012_0001_0012.summary: After a disturbed Iraq War vet shoots up a military base, the team exposes a sinister plot. As Jane and Weller race to stop a single-minded scientist, Jane recalls her own mysterious military past and contemplates a new relationship with Oscar.

tvmaze1855_0013_0001_0013.name: Erase Weary Youth
tvmaze1855_0013_0001_0013.summary: After a tip reveals there's a mole within the FBI's New York Office, the team must hunt for the operative while facing extreme scrutiny from Inspector Fischer. The team's deepest secrets threaten to be exposed, and everyone is a potential suspect - but some, especially Jane Doe have more to hide.

tvmaze1855_0014_0001_0014.name: Rules in Defiance
tvmaze1855_0014_0001_0014.summary: An anonymous tip leads the team to investigate an urgent death row case, ultimately sending Zapata undercover. After nearly getting caught during the mole hunt, Jane considers leaving the FBI.

tvmaze1855_0015_0001_0015.name: Older Cutthroat Canyon
tvmaze1855_0015_0001_0015.summary: After a painting featuring one of Jane's tattoos is heisted from a gallery, the team discovers Jane is the real target. In order to protect her team, Jane goes AWOL.

tvmaze1855_0016_0001_0016.name: Any Wounded Thief
tvmaze1855_0016_0001_0016.summary: After an armored truck is robbed, the team discovers that the stolen goods are chemical weapons and they must race to thwart a terrorist plot. Meanwhile, Jane grapples with a confusing memory of Weller - while growing even closer to Oscar. Meanwhile Patterson receives a phone call from someone from her past.

tvmaze1855_0017_0001_0017.name: Mans Telepathic Loyal Lookouts
tvmaze1855_0017_0001_0017.summary: After Patterson discovers a hidden message in the New York Times crossword, she embarks on a tattoo scavenger hunt that leads her into danger. Oscar finally tells Jane more about who she was, and Weller seeks his Dad's opinion about who kidnapped Taylor Shaw.

tvmaze1855_0018_0001_0018.name: One Begets Technique
tvmaze1855_0018_0001_0018.summary: In order to capture a dangerous international criminal, Jane and Weller are forced to collaborate with the only person he will meet: their former target, Rich DotCom. Jane must decide whether to risk hurting Weller by executing a morally questionable order from Oscar.

tvmaze1855_0019_0001_0019.name: In the Comet of Us
tvmaze1855_0019_0001_0019.summary: When a school shooting breaks out during the investigation of a tattoo, the team splits up to take down the shooter. Mayfair copes with some issues from her past.

tvmaze1855_0020_0001_0020.name: Swift Hardhearted Stone
tvmaze1855_0020_0001_0020.summary: When a mysterious young girl with a tattoo connection falls into Borden's care, he brings her case to the FBI team-- but her ties to a terrorist organization prove dangerous for all of them. Meanwhile, a conflicted Jane starts to grow close to Weller again, and friendship blossoms between Borden and Patterson.

tvmaze1855_0021_0001_0021.name: Of Whose Uneasy Route
tvmaze1855_0021_0001_0021.summary: The FBI is locked down when criminal hackers infiltrate the building, trapping the team inside SIOC. As they fight their way out, the close quarters force Mayfair, Zapata, Reade, and Sarah to confront personal conflicts.

tvmaze1855_0022_0001_0022.name: If Love a Rebel, Death Will Render
tvmaze1855_0022_0001_0022.summary: After an abandoned baby is found with a tattoo identical to one of Jane's, the team races to piece together the child's identity and save dozens of infants. A furious Jane confronts Oscar about the outcome of his secret missions.

tvmaze1855_0023_0001_0023.name: Why Await Life's End
tvmaze1855_0023_0001_0023.summary: Weller searches for the truth within a heartbreaking and confounding assertion. Jane reaches out to a former suspect for help with Oscar. Meanwhile, the rest of the team struggle to help a friend...

tvmaze1855_0024_0002_0001.name: In Night So Ransomed Rogue
tvmaze1855_0024_0002_0001.summary: After escaping from CIA custody, the team recaptures Jane and convinces her to become a triple-agent within her old terrorist organization where she unlocks some major secrets from her past, while recent betrayals from both sides threaten to tear her and the team apart for good.

tvmaze1855_0025_0002_0002.name: Heave Fiery Knot
tvmaze1855_0025_0002_0002.summary: The team races to stop a corrupt DEA agent from selling stinger missiles to a drug cartel as Weller fights to keep everyone together under the increasing pressures of Jane's rift with the others and the uncomfortable addition of Nas as co-leader.

tvmaze1855_0026_0002_0003.name: Hero Fears Imminent Rot
tvmaze1855_0026_0002_0003.summary: Weller and the team must race the clock to stop a series of escalating New York City bombings, while Jane is forced to go on an assassination mission to prove her loyalty... or suffer the consequences.

tvmaze1855_0027_0002_0004.name: If Beth
tvmaze1855_0027_0002_0004.summary: Nas and Weller navigate their new dynamic as co-leaders during the team's hunt for a museum gala assassin, who turns out to be harboring a dark secret; Jane starts to see a softer side of her old organization.

tvmaze1855_0028_0002_0005.name: Condone Untidiest Thefts
tvmaze1855_0028_0002_0005.summary: After a prominent politician is almost killed during a rally, Weller and the team must work with U.S. Marshal Allie Knight to take down a mob leader.

tvmaze1855_0029_0002_0006.name: Her Spy's Harmed
tvmaze1855_0029_0002_0006.summary: A fugitive whistle-blower is sought by Weller and Nas in Bulgaria. Meanwhile, Jane joins Roman for a Sandstorm mission; and Reade and Zapata tend to a pressing matter.

tvmaze1855_0030_0002_0007.name: Resolves Eleven Myths
tvmaze1855_0030_0002_0007.summary: Rich Dotcom returns to the FBI when he needs help with a pressing issue.

tvmaze1855_0031_0002_0008.name: We Fight Deaths on Thick Lone Waters
tvmaze1855_0031_0002_0008.summary: When Weller and Jane go missing during an undercover operation, the rest of the team must interrogate two criminals who hold the key to finding them. AUSA Weitz returns with a vendetta against the team.

tvmaze1855_0032_0002_0009.name: Why Let Cooler Pasture Deform
tvmaze1855_0032_0002_0009.summary: After Jane discovers that Sandstorm is gearing up for an imminent attack, she risks everything to send a secret SOS to her FBI team.

tvmaze1855_0033_0002_0010.name: Nor I, Nigel, AKA Leg in Iron
tvmaze1855_0033_0002_0010.summary: Patterson is missing... and a newly amnesiac Roman is on the loose. Jane and Weller must race Shepherd - and the clock - to find them before it's too late.

tvmaze1855_0034_0002_0011.name: Droll Autumn, Unmutual Lord
tvmaze1855_0034_0002_0011.summary: After one of the world's most-wanted terrorists surfaces in New York for unknown reasons, the team must partner with the CIA to stop a deadly bombing.

tvmaze1855_0035_0002_0012.name: Devil Never Even Lived
tvmaze1855_0035_0002_0012.summary: When an unusual tattoo leads back to Roman, the team must decide whether to send him into the field...to go undercover with a dangerous biker gang.

tvmaze1855_0036_0002_0013.name: Name Not One Man
tvmaze1855_0036_0002_0013.summary: The team gets a major break in the Sandstorm case when they discover Shepherd's true identity... and a decades-old connection between her and Weller.

tvmaze1855_0037_0002_0014.name: Borrow or Rob
tvmaze1855_0037_0002_0014.summary: A tattoo points the team toward a powerful collegiate secret society, but they can't infiltrate it without the help of one of its alumni.

tvmaze1855_0038_0002_0015.name: Draw O Caesar, Erase a Coward
tvmaze1855_0038_0002_0015.summary: After a set of tattoos produces multiple leads, the team divides into unlikely pairings - Weller and Roman; Jane and Zapata; Patterson and Reade - to chase down a deadly underworld courier.

tvmaze1855_0039_0002_0016.name: Evil Did I Dwell, Lewd I Did Live
tvmaze1855_0039_0002_0016.summary: With Nas's help, Weller and Jane finally come face-to-face with Nas's inside source within Sandstorm, and square off with an old foe.

tvmaze1855_0040_0002_0017.name: Solos
tvmaze1855_0040_0002_0017.summary: Jane and her new flame Oliver find themselves in a dangerous situation that exposes the secrets they've both been keeping. Uncertain if they can trust each other, the couple must stay alive while Weller and the team race to save them.

tvmaze1855_0041_0002_0018.name: Senile Lines
tvmaze1855_0041_0002_0018.summary: Under investigation by an old rival, the team struggles to defend itself. Meanwhile, a tattoo leads them to a mysterious death at a foster home.

tvmaze1855_0042_0002_0019.name: Regard a Mere Mad Rager
tvmaze1855_0042_0002_0019.summary: Jane and Weller go undercover on a high-stakes scavenger hunt run by powerful hackers. Shepherd journeys to Thailand to procure a dangerous weapon.

tvmaze1855_0043_0002_0020.name: In Words, Drown I
tvmaze1855_0043_0002_0020.summary: Zapata's transgressions catch up to her, sending her to jail alongside a potentially powerful Sandstorm asset named Devon. Weller and the team must go to exceptional lengths to help Zapata out.

tvmaze1855_0044_0002_0021.name: Mom
tvmaze1855_0044_0002_0021.summary: The team finally cracks a member of Sandstorm, leading to a huge breakthrough in uncovering Phase Two.

tvmaze1855_0045_0002_0022.name: Lepers Repel
tvmaze1855_0045_0002_0022.summary: As the FBI copes with a tragedy, Weller finds himself at the center of a surprising event. Jane faces an uncertain future.

show_list.name: Quantico
show_list.summary: Quantico is about a diverse group of recruits that have arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

first_episode.name: Run
first_episode.summary: A diverse group of recruits has arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

last_episode.name: RESISTANCE
last_episode.summary: In the Season 2 finale, Alex and the team make a last stand against the Collaborators at the Constitutional Convention, where a new amendment to the Constitution threatens every American's freedom.

tvmaze2114_0001_0001_0001.name: Run
tvmaze2114_0001_0001_0001.summary: A diverse group of recruits has arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

tvmaze2114_0002_0001_0002.name: America
tvmaze2114_0002_0001_0002.summary: Alex is on the run and must outsmart Liam and his team to get into her apartment for anything that could help clear her name. Meanwhile, in a flashback to Quantico training, the NATS are tasked with finding a needle in a haystack while looking for potential threats to national security.

tvmaze2114_0003_0001_0003.name: Cover
tvmaze2114_0003_0001_0003.summary: At Quantico, Alex learns of her father's FBI past; and, in the future, Liam asks Alex's mother to take part in a televised press conference geared to getting Alex to turn herself in. In other events, at Quantico, the NATS learn the art of profiling and focus on their classmates' strengths and weaknesses.

tvmaze2114_0004_0001_0004.name: Kill
tvmaze2114_0004_0001_0004.summary: At Quantico, the recruits take part in a hostage rescue training exercise that leaves Alex questioning whether she should quit; and, in the future, she finds possible evidence that seems to point to one of her closest classmates.

tvmaze2114_0005_0001_0005.name: Found
tvmaze2114_0005_0001_0005.summary: The trainees leave campus for the first time while undergoing their first undercover assignment. With an evening full of unpredictable events, Alex and Ryan find themselves getting close while the recruits' skills are tested. In the future, Alex decides to tell her side of the story and sits down for her first public interview leaving everyone watching to wonder who is really telling the truth.

tvmaze2114_0006_0001_0006.name: God
tvmaze2114_0006_0001_0006.summary: The NATs learn surveillance by putting it into practice with Miranda and her troubled son, Charlie. Shelby tries to keep Caleb at a distance, but Raina opens the door to a closer relationship with Simon. In the future, Alex is helped when she tries to hack into an FBI computer.

tvmaze2114_0007_0001_0007.name: Go
tvmaze2114_0007_0001_0007.summary: It's midterm exam time at Quantico where the NATS are given an explosive assignment which results in some people going home for good. In the future, Alex continues to try and clear her name, finding Nimah and Raina who provide more questions than answers leaving Alex and the world to wonder, "who can you really trust?"

tvmaze2114_0008_0001_0008.name: Over
tvmaze2114_0008_0001_0008.summary: In the future, a hack of the FBI computer system causes confidential information to become public; and Alex realizes that a second bomb is in NYC. In other events, at Quantico, the NATs receive individual assignments that are actually connected.

tvmaze2114_0009_0001_0009.name: Guilty
tvmaze2114_0009_0001_0009.summary: At "Quantico," the NATS attend a class with guest speaker Dr. Susan Langdon. Dr. Langdon is a former agent and profiler who tasks the trainees with looking at serial killer cases to find the one victim that doesn't fit the case, but when Simon becomes too good at finding things that don't belong, it's his life that becomes endangered. In the future, Alex is interrogated by a highly sophisticated FBI team while Ryan's life hangs in the balance.

tvmaze2114_0010_0001_0010.name: Quantico
tvmaze2114_0010_0001_0010.summary: At Quantico, an emergency disciplinary hearing causes deep secrets to be spilled, while in the future Alex works covertly with her team to find the real bomber before her time runs out.

tvmaze2114_0011_0001_0011.name: Inside
tvmaze2114_0011_0001_0011.summary: The terrorists behind the Grand Central Station bombing reveal themselves. In other events, at Quantico, the recruits are given time off for the holidays, but not everyone is in a merry mood when secrets are spilled.

tvmaze2114_0012_0001_0012.name: Alex
tvmaze2114_0012_0001_0012.summary: Alex finds herself in the middle of a congressional hearing to testify about the terrorist bombings. Convinced Elias didn't act alone, she is determined to find answers and the truth. While back at Quantico, a new group of NATS join Alex and her classmates, causing tension and competition between the groups of trainees.

tvmaze2114_0013_0001_0013.name: Clear
tvmaze2114_0013_0001_0013.summary: This week the NATS learn how to source information from confidential informants, but when they test their skills in the real world, they soon realize being an agent is not as easy as it seems. Meanwhile, in the future, Alex and a fellow agent find themselves in a life or death situation when they are forced to provide classified information that could result in deadly consequences.

tvmaze2114_0014_0001_0014.name: Answer
tvmaze2114_0014_0001_0014.summary: At Quantico, the NATS team up for defensive driving lessons while tensions between Liam and Drew explode, resulting in shocking admissions and consequences. In the future, Simon grapples with his new reality in the aftermath of what's transpired. Even though his friends try and help him, it's uncertain he will ever be the same again.

tvmaze2114_0015_0001_0015.name: Turn
tvmaze2114_0015_0001_0015.summary: A terror cell tries to infiltrate Quantico, forcing Miranda and Liam to pay a deadly price. While in the future, Alex continues to get instructions from the terrorist - only this time, it's Claire Haas' life that hangs in the balance.

tvmaze2114_0016_0001_0016.name: Clue
tvmaze2114_0016_0001_0016.summary: At Quantico, the NATS are given a training exercise that hits too close to home for Shelby. While in the future, Alex finds an unlikely ally in Hannah, as she continues to try and stop the terrorist from striking again.

tvmaze2114_0017_0001_0017.name: Care
tvmaze2114_0017_0001_0017.summary: At Quantico, the NATS' current assignment is to learn about human trafficking when Liam and Miranda challenge them to cross the U.S. / Canadian border without passports. Meanwhile, in the future, Simon continues to help Alex try to find the terrorist, but doing so puts his own life in great risk.

tvmaze2114_0018_0001_0018.name: Soon
tvmaze2114_0018_0001_0018.summary: At Quantico, the NATs look into each other's background to determine who gets high-level security clearance, and in the process Alex, Shelby and Iris learn some surprising truths about Drew, Will and Caleb. Meanwhile, in the future, Alex contacts Claire Haas in order to find her missing friends and is shocked when she discovers what happened to Caleb.

tvmaze2114_0019_0001_0019.name: Fast
tvmaze2114_0019_0001_0019.summary: It's career day at Quantico as the NATS meet representatives from various FBI branches to help them decide their future paths. In the future, Alex continues to search for the terrorist, and in the process, discovers some familiar faces - including one who knows the terrorist's endgame.

tvmaze2114_0020_0001_0020.name: Drive
tvmaze2114_0020_0001_0020.summary: With only a few weeks until graduation, the NATS are dispatched to various field offices where Alex and Ryan find themselves working a case together. Meanwhile, in the future, Shelby and Caleb's relationship takes a turn, and Alex doesn't know who to trust when she discovers new information about the man she loves.

tvmaze2114_0021_0001_0021.name: Right
tvmaze2114_0021_0001_0021.summary: The NATS are excited that graduation is near as they prepare to leave Quantico and head out into the real world for their new assignments. In the future, Alex learns someone she cared about at Quantico is not who they seemed to be, as she finds herself at the heart of another possible attack.

tvmaze2114_0022_0001_0022.name: Yes
tvmaze2114_0022_0001_0022.summary: It's graduation day for the NATS of Quantico, while, in the future, Alex and her team find themselves head-to-head with the terrorist,

tvmaze2114_0023_0002_0001.name: KUDOVE
tvmaze2114_0023_0002_0001.summary: While investigating the dark world of espionage at a mysterious CIA training facility, Alex becomes caught at the center of a conspiracy that threatens lives across the globe.

tvmaze2114_0024_0002_0002.name: LIPSTICK
tvmaze2114_0024_0002_0002.summary: The new CIA recruits begin running counter-surveillance exercises at The Farm while Alex and Ryan navigate their new relationship with each other. In the future, Ryan and Raina try to disrupt the terrorists' plan to blend in with hostages while trust becomes a deadly weapon, as not everyone is who they seem to be.

tvmaze2114_0025_0002_0003.name: STESCALADE
tvmaze2114_0025_0002_0003.summary: The new CIA recruits continue training at The Farm; in the future, Alex infiltrates the terrorist group holding everyone hostage, and is shocked to learn not everyone is a stranger.

tvmaze2114_0026_0002_0004.name: KUBARK
tvmaze2114_0026_0002_0004.summary: The trainees are put through a training drill that tests their stress levels while Alex tries to gather information and get close to Owen. Meanwhile, in the future, the terrorist organization demands a trade, a move that could possibly end the stand-off.

tvmaze2114_0027_0002_0005.name: KMFORGET
tvmaze2114_0027_0002_0005.summary: At the Farm, Harry is still suspicious of Alex and Ryan, and he's determined to learn more about their plan, while Leon is recruited for a special assignment by Owen. Meanwhile, in the future, Alex continues to run from the terrorists but faces her toughest challenge yet when the terrorists corner her.

tvmaze2114_0028_0002_0006.name: AQUILINE
tvmaze2114_0028_0002_0006.summary: At the Farm, the trainees learn their next task is to decide on a drone strike, which triggers Alex's memories of Simon's sacrifice. Meanwhile, Shelby and Leon's relationship reaches the next level, and Nimah advises Alex and Ryan not to trust Harry. In the future, Alex questions if she can trust Lydia, leading to combat between the two.

tvmaze2114_0029_0002_0007.name: LCFLUTTER
tvmaze2114_0029_0002_0007.summary: At the Farm, Owen teaches the trainees about enhanced interrogation techniques, and turns the tables on his students by putting himself in the hot seat. Meanwhile, Shelby goes undercover. In the future, a new president is sworn in, and Miranda makes a tough choice.

tvmaze2114_0030_0002_0008.name: ODENVY
tvmaze2114_0030_0002_0008.summary: At the Farm, Lydia and Owen teach the group about the necessity of lying and cutting off relationships. Perfect timing for Alex, since she is feeling disconnected from Ryan personally and professionally. In the future, Alex and company attempt to destroy the biological weapon.

tvmaze2114_0031_0002_0009.name: CLEOPATRA
tvmaze2114_0031_0002_0009.summary: The recruits are schooled in the art of seduction, which Alex sees as a perfect opportunity to get closer to Owen, but will it threatens her relationship with Ryan? And in the future, Alex finally gets the answers she's been looking for about who and what the terrorists are on.

tvmaze2114_0032_0002_0010.name: JMPALM
tvmaze2114_0032_0002_0010.summary: At the Farm, Owen teaches the recruits a lesson on the necessity of betrayal, with a mission of getting the Venezuelan Consul Gabriel Carrera to turn on his country. In the future, Alex is forced to team up with Miranda to save the hostages, while President Claire Haas has a plan to end the crisis once and for all.

tvmaze2114_0033_0002_0011.name: ZRTORCH
tvmaze2114_0033_0002_0011.summary: Alex tries to convince Owen of the traitor amongst them. The recruits are tasked with getting an asset out of Germany - but their target has a death wish. In the future, the terrorists resort to new means to gain information from the hostages.

tvmaze2114_0034_0002_0012.name: FALLENORACLE
tvmaze2114_0034_0002_0012.summary: At the Farm, the recruits break into the NSA on a mission to delete all their personal information, but the rogue group within the CIA has other plans. In the future, the hostages strategize an escape via underground tunnels as a set-up to get the terrorists to reveal themselves.

tvmaze2114_0035_0002_0013.name: EPICSHELTER
tvmaze2114_0035_0002_0013.summary: The recruits learn how to burn everything down if they are ever exposed. Meanwhile, a mysterious death leads to an FBI investigation at the Farm. In the future, Alex heads back into the crisis zone and exposes the true traitor within the CIA.

tvmaze2114_0036_0002_0014.name: LNWILT
tvmaze2114_0036_0002_0014.summary: In the wake of the G20 hostage crisis, President Claire Haas assembles an illegal and clandestine joint task force, bringing together Alex and her friends from both the FBI and CIA to unmask a global conspiracy.

tvmaze2114_0037_0002_0015.name: MOCKINGBIRD
tvmaze2114_0037_0002_0015.summary: While their newly appointed leader gets familiar with the team of CIA and FBI agents, Owen leads an investigation into the strange world of fake news. But hunting down the publishers of a fake story might lead to deadly consequences.

tvmaze2114_0038_0002_0016.name: MKTOPAZ
tvmaze2114_0038_0002_0016.summary: When Clay is forced to use his fiancée to carry out an operation, the whole team reexamines their personal connections, or more accurately, the lack thereof. Meanwhile, Alex forges an unexpected bond with an asset at the center of a conspiracy, and Harry struggles to find his place on the task force.

tvmaze2114_0039_0002_0017.name: ODYOKE
tvmaze2114_0039_0002_0017.summary: When one of Alex's friends is framed for a domestic terror attack, they turn to her for help. With an upcoming vote in the House for a Muslim registry bill, the task force realizes this attack isn't a coincidence. The Collaborators are actively stirring fear to pass the registry, and our team heads to the Hill to turn the votes. Meanwhile, Alex and Owen track down an assassin.

tvmaze2114_0040_0002_0018.name: KUMONK
tvmaze2114_0040_0002_0018.summary: A despondent Clay meets with the President to discuss the future of the task force, but he's interrupted by the arrival of his brother. Meanwhile, Alex leads an operation to expose the collaborators' plans to sink the President's reputation, and she teaches Owen to trust his instincts.

tvmaze2114_0041_0002_0019.name: MHORDER
tvmaze2114_0041_0002_0019.summary: With all the collaborators unveiled, the team uses Clay and Maxine's engagement party to entice them into one place. The mission: turn one against the others. But everyone's lives are put at risk when one member of the team makes a surprising decision.

tvmaze2114_0042_0002_0020.name: GLOBALREACH
tvmaze2114_0042_0002_0020.summary: Risking it all, Alex works with Owen to infiltrate the Collaborators. When they begin to test her loyalty, Alex realizes she's become a pawn in their plan to take down both the President and the task force.

tvmaze2114_0043_0002_0021.name: RAINBOW
tvmaze2114_0043_0002_0021.summary: After an impossible choice is made, a flood of new proposals shine a light on the final stages of the Collaborators' plan. Fractured but not defeated, the task force, with the help of some old friends, work to put the pieces together before the Collaborators can enact an unthinkable terrorist attack.

tvmaze2114_0044_0002_0022.name: RESISTANCE
tvmaze2114_0044_0002_0022.summary: In the Season 2 finale, Alex and the team make a last stand against the Collaborators at the Constitutional Convention, where a new amendment to the Constitution threatens every American's freedom.

show_list.name: World of Dance
show_list.summary: World of Dance is an unparalleled dance competition series where the winner will receive a life-altering grand prize of $1 million. In partnership with preeminent global dance brand World of Dance, the series brings the world's elite dancers together to compete in epic battles of artistry, precision and athleticism. Solo artists will compete against duos and crews in an unlimited range of dance, including hip hop, krumping, popping, locking, tap, ballet, break dancing, ballroom, clogging, stomping and more.

first_episode.name: The Qualifiers 1
first_episode.summary: Elite dance acts from all ages and dance genres enter the arena to showcase their artistry, precision and athleticism to move forward in the competition.

tvmaze21599_0001_0001_0001.name: The Qualifiers 1
tvmaze21599_0001_0001_0001.summary: Elite dance acts from all ages and dance genres enter the arena to showcase their artistry, precision and athleticism to move forward in the competition.

tvmaze21599_0002_0001_0002.name: The Qualifiers 2
tvmaze21599_0002_0001_0002.summary: Elite dance acts from all ages and dance genres enter the arena to showcase their artistry, precision and athleticism to move forward in the competition.

tvmaze21599_0004_0001_0004.name: The Duels 1
tvmaze21599_0004_0001_0004.summary: The top qualifying acts from each division will choose a rival and face off in a head-to-head elimination duel; the judges score each act based on their artistry, precision and athleticism; the top scoring acts move forward in the competition.

show_list.name: Marvel's Luke Cage
show_list.summary: After a sabotaged experiment leaves him with super strength and unbreakable skin, Luke Cage becomes a fugitive trying to rebuild his life in modern day Harlem, New York City. But he is soon pulled out of the shadows and must fight a battle for the heart of his city – forcing him to confront a past he had tried to bury.

first_episode.name: Moment of Truth
first_episode.summary: Luke tries to keep a low profile and pay his bills by working two jobs. However, he gets into trouble anyway when he has a one-nighter with a police detective, who is investigating an arms deal that local crime lord Cornell "Cottonmouth" Stokes was engineering.

last_episode.name: You Know My Steez
last_episode.summary: After a fierce battle with Stryker, Luke is taken into custody while Misty tries to arrest Mariah for the murder of her cousin Cornell.

tvmaze2174_0001_0001_0001.name: Moment of Truth
tvmaze2174_0001_0001_0001.summary: Luke tries to keep a low profile and pay his bills by working two jobs. However, he gets into trouble anyway when he has a one-nighter with a police detective, who is investigating an arms deal that local crime lord Cornell "Cottonmouth" Stokes was engineering.

tvmaze2174_0002_0001_0002.name: Code of the Streets
tvmaze2174_0002_0001_0002.summary: Pop asks Luke for help finding Chico so that he can set up a parlay with Cornell to get his money back. However, Cornell's lieutenant Tone has other plans.

tvmaze2174_0003_0001_0003.name: Who's Gonna Take the Weight?
tvmaze2174_0003_0001_0003.summary: After Pop's death, Luke sets out to take Cornell down by taking his money. However, both Cornell and Misty figure out that Luke is responsible.

tvmaze2174_0004_0001_0004.name: Step in the Arena
tvmaze2174_0004_0001_0004.summary: As Luke fights for his life beneath a toppled building, he remembers his past and the experimental treatment at Seagate Prison that gave him his powers.

tvmaze2174_0005_0001_0005.name: Just to Get a Rep
tvmaze2174_0005_0001_0005.summary: Cornell takes the battle to Luke when he tells his men to squeeze the people of Harlem for everything they have... and blame Luke. Meanwhile, Misty receives word that her partner Scarfe may be crooked.

tvmaze2174_0006_0001_0006.name: Suckas Need Bodyguards
tvmaze2174_0006_0001_0006.summary: When Scarfe tries to hold up Cornell for more money, Cornell shoots him. Badly wounded, Scarfe turns to Luke for help and offers to give him the evidence that will put Cornell away for good.

tvmaze2174_0007_0001_0007.name: Manifest
tvmaze2174_0007_0001_0007.summary: While Mariah faces pressure to resign, Cornell tries to blackmail Luke into working for him. In the past, Cornell and Mariah's history with Mama Mabel is revealed.

tvmaze2174_0008_0001_0008.name: Blowin' Up the Spot
tvmaze2174_0008_0001_0008.summary: After Cornell's death, Mariah covers up her involvement with Shades' help and sets up Luke as the patsy. Meanwhile, Luke finds out Diamondback's true identity.

tvmaze2174_0009_0001_0009.name: DWYCK
tvmaze2174_0009_0001_0009.summary: Stryker tightens his grip on Cornell's criminal empire, while Mariah plots to take advantage of Luke's attack on two cops to turn the public against him.

tvmaze2174_0010_0001_0010.name: Take It Personal
tvmaze2174_0010_0001_0010.summary: After Claire and Burstein save his life, Luke learns some of what Reva was hiding from him. Meanwhile, Mariah tries to turn the people of Harlem against Luke as part of Stryker's scheme to sell his super-weapons.

tvmaze2174_0011_0001_0011.name: Now You're Mine
tvmaze2174_0011_0001_0011.summary: When Luke busts into his club, Stryker turns the situation around and makes Luke look like the guilty party. Meanwhile, Misty's life is in danger and Claire is the only one who can help her.

tvmaze2174_0012_0001_0012.name: Soliloquy of Chaos
tvmaze2174_0012_0001_0012.summary: After the events at the club, Stryker is forced to go on the run and orders Zip to eliminate Shades. Meanwhile, Luke gets a lead on Stryker's location and Mariah offers him what he needs to clear his name.

tvmaze2174_0013_0001_0013.name: You Know My Steez
tvmaze2174_0013_0001_0013.summary: After a fierce battle with Stryker, Luke is taken into custody while Misty tries to arrest Mariah for the murder of her cousin Cornell.

show_list.name: Marvel's Iron Fist
show_list.summary: After his family meets a tragic fate while on expedition in China, a young Rand is adopted by the people of the mystical lost city of K'un-Lun, where he's taught a magical fighting style. Years later, he returns to New York to fight crime.

first_episode.name: Snow Gives Way
first_episode.summary: A man claiming to be Danny Rand shows up at Rand Enterprises... 15 years after Danny Rand and his parents died in a plane crash over the Himalayas. The current owners, Joy and Ward Meacham, are skeptical of the man's claims.

last_episode.name: Dragon Plays with Fire
last_episode.summary: With the DEA after him, Danny has no choice but to take the fight to Harold and obtain the evidence that will clear his name.

tvmaze2175_0001_0001_0001.name: Snow Gives Way
tvmaze2175_0001_0001_0001.summary: A man claiming to be Danny Rand shows up at Rand Enterprises... 15 years after Danny Rand and his parents died in a plane crash over the Himalayas. The current owners, Joy and Ward Meacham, are skeptical of the man's claims.

tvmaze2175_0002_0001_0002.name: Shadow Hawk Takes Flight
tvmaze2175_0002_0001_0002.summary: While Danny deals with life in a psychiatric hospital, Ward tries to bribe Colleen into signing papers that will let him commit Danny permanently. Meanwhile, Joy gets indisputable proof that Danny is who he claims.

tvmaze2175_0003_0001_0003.name: Rolling Thunder Cannon Punch
tvmaze2175_0003_0001_0003.summary: Joy's loyalties are tested when she realizes that she holds the key to proving Danny's identity. Meanwhile, Harold receives a visitor and Colleen enters the ring as the Daughter of the Dragon.

tvmaze2175_0004_0001_0004.name: Eight Diagram Dragon Palm
tvmaze2175_0004_0001_0004.summary: Harold orders Ward to drop the litigation keeping Danny from taking his rightful place at Rand Enterprises. Meanwhile, the Triads take it personally when Joy brokers the pier deal.

tvmaze2175_0005_0001_0005.name: Under Leaf Pluck Lotus
tvmaze2175_0005_0001_0005.summary: Danny discovers that the Hand is shipping a new version of heroin into NYC using the pier. He recruits Colleen to help him find evidence and discovers the drug's creator instead.

tvmaze2175_0006_0001_0006.name: Immortal Emerges from Cave
tvmaze2175_0006_0001_0006.summary: The Hand challenge Danny to a series of battle to determine the fate of their struggle. Meanwhile, Ward begins to lose his grip on reality, and Claire and Colleen get Radovan treatment.

tvmaze2175_0007_0001_0007.name: Felling Tree with Roots
tvmaze2175_0007_0001_0007.summary: Joy suggests that Ward get treatment for his drug addiction. Meanwhile, Danny finds out more about the Hand's operation and convinces the Triad to help him attack it.

tvmaze2175_0008_0001_0008.name: The Blessing of Many Fractures
tvmaze2175_0008_0001_0008.summary: Danny travels to China with Claire and Colleen to find the center of Gao's heroin operation, and faces an opponent unlike any he's ever fought. Meanwhile, Ward prepares to tell Joy that their father was still alive.

tvmaze2175_0009_0001_0009.name: The Mistress of All Agonies
tvmaze2175_0009_0001_0009.summary: Gao tries to convince Danny and the others to let her go, while Colleen slowly succumbs to illness. Meanwhile, Ward discovers that Harold isn't as dead as he thought, and Joy learns the truth about the family secret.

tvmaze2175_0010_0001_0010.name: Black Tiger Steals Heart
tvmaze2175_0010_0001_0010.summary: Danny wakes up at Bakuto's school and has a conversation with the imprisoned Gao. Meanwhile, an old friend comes to visit Danny, and Harold pays Lawrence a visit.

tvmaze2175_0011_0001_0011.name: Lead Horse Back to Stable
tvmaze2175_0011_0001_0011.summary: Danny goes to Claire for treatment for the wound Bakuto left in his side. Meanwhile, Colleen swears to the Hand to find out where Danny is, and has her eyes opened to the truth.

tvmaze2175_0012_0001_0012.name: Bar the Big Boss
tvmaze2175_0012_0001_0012.summary: Bakuto frees Ward from the psych hospital but demands a heavy price in return. Meanwhile, Danny must surrender himself to save the Meachums.

tvmaze2175_0013_0001_0013.name: Dragon Plays with Fire
tvmaze2175_0013_0001_0013.summary: With the DEA after him, Danny has no choice but to take the fight to Harold and obtain the evidence that will clear his name.

show_list.name: Hawaii Five-0
show_list.summary: Hawaii Five-0 is a contemporary take on the classic series about a new elite federalized task force whose mission is to wipe out the crime that washes up on the Islands' sun-drenched beaches. Detective Steve McGarrett, a decorated Naval officer-turned-cop, returned to Oahu to investigate his father's murder and stayed after Hawaii's former governor persuaded him to head up the new team: his rules, no red tape and full blanket authority to hunt down the biggest "game" in town. Joining McGarrett is Detective Danny "Danno" Williams, a relocated ex-New Jersey cop - a working man in paradise who prefers skyscrapers to the coastline - but who's committed to keeping the Islands safe for his young daughter; Chin Ho Kelly, an ex-Honolulu police detective and former protégé of McGarrett's father who was wrongly accused of corruption; Dr. Max Bergman, the quirky coroner; Chin's cousin, Kono Kalakaua, a beautiful and fearless native; and Captain Lou Grover, who formerly headed Hawaii's SWAT unit. Joining them is Jerry Ortega, a former classmate of Chin's and the Island's local conspiracy theorist. The state's brash FIVE-0 unit, who may spar and jest among themselves, remain determined to eliminate the seedy elements from the 50th state.

first_episode.name: 'Pailaka (Pilot)
first_episode.summary: Upon returning to Hawaii to investigate his father's murder, decorated Naval officer Steve McGarrett is recruited by the Governor to head up an elite new police task force - his rules, her backing, no red tape. Their first case involves tracking a weapons dealer connected to McGarrett's father's murder.

previous_episode.name: Ua Mau Ke Ea O Ka Aina I Ka Pono (The Life of the Land is Perpetuated in Righteousness)
previous_episode.summary: McGarrett risks his life when Five-0 attempts their most dangerous rescue yet of young girls trapped in the sex trafficking ring they have been tracking this year. Also, Kono, deeply affected by the case, makes a life-changing decision.

tvmaze24_0001_0001_0001.name: 'Pailaka (Pilot)
tvmaze24_0001_0001_0001.summary: Upon returning to Hawaii to investigate his father's murder, decorated Naval officer Steve McGarrett is recruited by the Governor to head up an elite new police task force - his rules, her backing, no red tape. Their first case involves tracking a weapons dealer connected to McGarrett's father's murder.

tvmaze24_0002_0001_0002.name: Ohana (Family)
