tvmaze24_0002_0001_0002.summary: Following the violent abduction of an ex-NSA cyber-terrorism expert in the middle of downtown Waikiki, Five-0 must race to rescue the man, and prevent a breach of national security.

tvmaze24_0003_0001_0003.name: Malama Ka 'Aina (Respect the Land)
tvmaze24_0003_0001_0003.summary: When an escalating gang war spills into the stands of the local high school football game, injuring several bystanders and killing a gang leader, Five-0 uncovers an unlikely partnership between Samoan gangs and a mainland mob.

tvmaze24_0004_0001_0004.name: Lankila (Victory)
tvmaze24_0004_0001_0004.summary: Five-0 is tasked with tracking down a violent convict after he breaks from an Island prison in search of his stolen money and kidnaps a young couple on vacation in Waikiki. Meanwhile, McGarrett's estranged sister, Mary, arrives from the mainland.

tvmaze24_0005_0001_0005.name: Nalowale (Forgotten/Missing)
tvmaze24_0005_0001_0005.summary: When the teenage daughter of the U.S. Ambassador to the Philippines is found dead off the coast of Waikiki, the Governor tasks Five-0 with finding her sister, who was also abducted.

tvmaze24_0006_0001_0006.name: Ko'olauloa (North Shore of O'ahu)
tvmaze24_0006_0001_0006.summary: When the CEO of a hugely successful surf company is murdered, Kono revisits her past while Five-0 is thrown headlong into the varied but interconnected worlds of North Shore surfing.

tvmaze24_0007_0001_0007.name: Ho'apono (Accept)
tvmaze24_0007_0001_0007.summary: When a Navy SEAL, who's on the run for a murder he swears he didn't commit, takes hostages and safe haven aboard the U.S.S. Missouri memorial battleship, McGarrett must use every SEAL skill in his arsenal to diffuse the situation.

tvmaze24_0008_0001_0008.name: Mana'o (Belief)
tvmaze24_0008_0001_0008.summary: Hawaiian luau turns into a nightmare when the body of a dead cop, who turns out to be Danny's ex-partner from the Honolulu P.D., is found in the barbeque pit. Five-0's dogged investigation into the murder matches them against Internal Affairs, dirty cops and Hawaii's most powerful cocaine cartel.

tvmaze24_0009_0001_0009.name: Po'ipu (The Siege)
tvmaze24_0009_0001_0009.summary: When a member of the security detail for an upcoming Aid Summit is murdered before he can reveal the details of an assassination plot, Five-0 is brought in to investigate the murder and protect the target, a ruthless dictator.

tvmaze24_0010_0001_0010.name: Heihei (Race)
tvmaze24_0010_0001_0010.summary: ......"Heihei*" - Five-0 is baffled when a highly skilled ring of thieves pulls off the heist of an armored car, killing two security guards but leaving the money behind. Their only lead in the case requires Danny to reluctantly ask his ex-wife for a favor.

tvmaze24_0011_0001_0011.name: Palekaiko (Paradise)
tvmaze24_0011_0001_0011.summary: While Five-0 investigates the murder of a man on his honeymoon and his wife's abduction, Medical Examiner Dr. Max Bergman recognizes uncanny similarities to a series of unsolved homicides from a year ago.

tvmaze24_0012_0001_0012.name: Hana 'a'a Makehewa (Desperate Measures)
tvmaze24_0012_0001_0012.summary: It's Christmas in Hawaii, but instead of celebrating, Five-0 is negotiating a hostage situation when the man who killed McGarrett's father resurfaces. The murderer, Victor Hesse, threatens to detonate an explosive that he's strapped to Chin Ho's chest.

tvmaze24_0013_0001_0013.name: Ke Kinohi (The Beginning)
tvmaze24_0013_0001_0013.summary: When McGarrett's sister is kidnapped and his father's Champ box stolen from his apartment, Steve and Five-0 discover new clues in his mother's murder, including possible ties to the Japanese Yakuza.

tvmaze24_0014_0001_0014.name: He Kane Hewa'ole (An Innocent Man)
tvmaze24_0014_0001_0014.summary: Five-0 joins the Honolulu Police Department in a high-speed police chase that ends with the driver fatally injured, and a gruesome discovery by the team. The investigation leads to an awkward reunion between Chin Ho and his ex-fiancé.

tvmaze24_0015_0001_0015.name: Kai e'e (Tidal Wave)
tvmaze24_0015_0001_0015.summary: Five-0 struggles to stay a step ahead of a major tsunami that has the island evacuating its shores as they investigate the disappearance of the head of the Tsunami Warning Center.

tvmaze24_0016_0001_0016.name: E Malama (To Protect)
tvmaze24_0016_0001_0016.summary: When the sole witness in a high-profile murder case disappears, Five-0 must head into the jungle to locate and protect her from assassins who are closing in fast.

tvmaze24_0017_0001_0017.name: Powa Maka Moana (Pirate)
tvmaze24_0017_0001_0017.summary: Five-0 is first on the scene when a pirate attack turns an afternoon pleasure cruise into a kidnap-and-ransom nightmare for a group of wealthy spring breakers.

tvmaze24_0018_0001_0018.name: Loa Aloha (The Long Goodbye)
tvmaze24_0018_0001_0018.summary: While Five-0 races to stop a mad bomber before he kills again, Danny gets an unexpected visit from his little brother, Matt, a fun-loving, Wall Street broker. The family reunion is cut short, however, when Danny discovers the real reason that Matt is in Hawaii.

tvmaze24_0019_0001_0019.name: Ne Me'e Laua Na Paio (Heroes and Villains)
tvmaze24_0019_0001_0019.summary: Five-0 must unravel the mystery of why a mild-mannered sci-fi fan wearing a cape was given truth serum before being tossed out of a 21st-story window. Meanwhile, McGarrett gets an unexpected visit from a CIA agent who shares his personal interest in tracking down the Yakuza who had his parents killed.

tvmaze24_0020_0001_0020.name: Ma Ke Kahakai (Shore)
tvmaze24_0020_0001_0020.summary: While hiking in a remote area of the jungle to see the famed petroglyphs, McGarrett and Danny instead find a homicide victim. Meanwhile, their aunt's failing health leads Kono and Chin Ho to visit home, where Kono finally learns the truth about the scandal that ended her cousin's career with the Honolulu Police Department.

tvmaze24_0021_0001_0021.name: Ho'opa'i (Revenge)
tvmaze24_0021_0001_0021.summary: When a crime lord moves against the family of an undercover NYPD detective who infiltrated his organization, it's up to Five-0 to stop the policeman from exacting revenge.

tvmaze24_0022_0001_0022.name: Ho'ohuli Na'au (Close to Heart)
tvmaze24_0022_0001_0022.summary: It's the worst kind of overexposure when world-renowned photographer Renny Sinclair is murdered while on assignment in Hawaii shooting the annual swimsuit edition of a top sports magazine.

tvmaze24_0023_0001_0023.name: Ua Hiki Mai Kapalena Pau (Until the End is Near)
tvmaze24_0023_0001_0023.summary: With the invaluable information that was shared by Agent Jenna Kaye, Five-0 is closer than ever to capturing Wo Fat. Their mission takes an abrupt turn, however, when Danny is exposed to a lethal neurological agent that presents an even greater threat: bio-terrorism on the island.

tvmaze24_0024_0001_0024.name: Oia'i'o (Trust)
tvmaze24_0024_0001_0024.summary: When Five-0 gets too close to the truth about Wo Fat and his associates, the criminal mastermind retaliates by trying to destroy the team. They've always played by their own rules, but when the Governor can no longer protect them, it's time for Five-0 to pay the consequences of their actions.

tvmaze24_0025_0002_0001.name: Ha'i'ole (Unbreakable)
tvmaze24_0025_0002_0001.summary: While McGarrett sits in prison awaiting trial for the murder of the governor, Danny brings him a surprise visitor to help clear him. Meanwhile, Kono is suspended for the force, pending an internal investigation.

tvmaze24_0026_0002_0002.name: Ua Lawe Wale (Taken)
tvmaze24_0026_0002_0002.summary: Gov. Denning assigns Officer Lori Weston to Five-0 to make sure McGarrett and team follow the new rules set by him and also apply her excellent profiling skills to the task force. Meanwhile, as Five-0 investigates the kidnapping of a teenage paddleboard champion, Internal Affairs Capt. Vince Fryer continues his interrogation of Kono.

tvmaze24_0027_0002_0003.name: Kame'e (The Hero)
tvmaze24_0027_0002_0003.summary: At his mentor's request, McGarrett persuades Max to redo the autopsy on a SEAL, thought to have committed suicide, in order to investigate his murder. Meanwhile, Chin Ho worries about Kono hanging out with a group of dirty ex-cops, including Frank Delano.

tvmaze24_0028_0002_0004.name: Mea Makamae (Treasure)
tvmaze24_0028_0002_0004.summary: The FIVE-0 take to the beautiful waters off Hawaii to investigate the murder of a deep sea diver known for his valuable shipwreck finds.

tvmaze24_0029_0002_0005.name: Ma'ema'e (Clean)
tvmaze24_0029_0002_0005.summary: The FIVE-0's investigation into the murder of the state's women's volleyball coach leads them to find out more bad news about Kono, and Chin Ho reconnects with his former fiancée, Malia.

tvmaze24_0030_0002_0006.name: Ka Hakka Maika'i (The Good Fight)
tvmaze24_0030_0002_0006.summary: The FIVE-0's investigation into the murder of a wealthy restaurant owner causes McGarrett to take part in a charity MMA fight to the finish. Meanwhile, NCIS Agent Kensi Blye lends her expertise to McGarrett and Lt. Commander White when they ask her to examine a video of McGarrett's father.

tvmaze24_0031_0002_0007.name: Ka Iwi Kapu (Sacred Bones)
tvmaze24_0031_0002_0007.summary: When the Five-0s investigate the murder of a young couple filming a spooky documentary about a traditional Hawaiian burial site, they are threatened by a drifter who puts a curse on Danny.

tvmaze24_0032_0002_0008.name: Lapa'au (Healing)
tvmaze24_0032_0002_0008.summary: The FIVE-0's investigation into the suspicious plane crash and death of a customs agent takes an unexpected turn when it is revealed that the victim was dead before takeoff. Meanwhile, Danny finds himself the proud caretaker of an orphaned dog.

tvmaze24_0033_0002_0009.name: Ike Maka (Identity)
tvmaze24_0033_0002_0009.summary: When the Five-0 discover a John Doe in the trunk of a stolen car, they not only have to find a killer, but also need to figure out who the physically-altered victim was. Meanwhile, a homeless Danno is sleeping on McGarrett's couch.

tvmaze24_0034_0002_0010.name: Ki'ilua (Deceiver)
tvmaze24_0034_0002_0010.summary: McGarrett finds himself in need of the Five-0's help when he goes to North Korea with Jenna Kaye to deliver a ransom to rebels who are holding her fiancé hostage. Meanwhile, the Five-0 investigate the murder of an investigative reporter who seems to have ties to Jenna.

tvmaze24_0035_0002_0011.name: Pahele (Trap)
tvmaze24_0035_0002_0011.summary: McGarrett and the Five-0 search for a busload of kidnapped school children as well as the people responsible.

tvmaze24_0036_0002_0012.name: Alaheo Pau'ole (Gone Forever)
tvmaze24_0036_0002_0012.summary: On the eve of Chin Ho's wedding to Malia, the Five-0's investigation into a man left for dead in an abandoned WWII bunker crosses paths with Capt. Fryer's case of a Jane Doe.

tvmaze24_0037_0002_0013.name: Ka Ho'oponopono (The Fix)
tvmaze24_0037_0002_0013.summary: When the Five-0 determine that the murder of a teenage girl was a professional hit, they must first find out why she was targeted before they can find her killer.

tvmaze24_0038_0002_0014.name: Pu'olo (The Package)
tvmaze24_0038_0002_0014.summary: McGarrett is rocked to his core when Chin Ho tells him some shocking news about Joe White. Meanwhile, Danny plays mid-wife for his ex-wife when she goes into early labor.

tvmaze24_0039_0002_0015.name: Mai Ka Wa Kaliko (Out of the Past)
tvmaze24_0039_0002_0015.summary: Dirty cop from Danno's past comes to the island to exact revenge on Danno and his family for ruining his life, forcing the Five-0 to find a way to help their teammate.

tvmaze24_0040_0002_0016.name: I Helu Pu (The Reckoning)
tvmaze24_0040_0002_0016.summary: When Five-0 nearly causes an international incident while on a case, Lt. Governor Denning tells them one of the team members will pay for it with their job.

tvmaze24_0041_0002_0017.name: Kupale (Defender)
tvmaze24_0041_0002_0017.summary: Five-0 investigates the murder of a man dressed as a Hawaiian NaKoa warrior found in the jungle near the site of a historical war reenactment.

tvmaze24_0042_0002_0018.name: Lekio (Radio)
tvmaze24_0042_0002_0018.summary: Five-0 crosses paths with Tony Archer, a retired NYPD bomb expert who is now a private investigator on Oahu, when they investigate the death of famous talk radio DJ Bobby Raines.

tvmaze24_0043_0002_0019.name: Kalele (Faith)
tvmaze24_0043_0002_0019.summary: When McGarrett's sister is arrested for trying to smuggle $20 million worth of conflict diamonds, he and Chief Fryer reach out to August March, an ex-con who served 30 years for diamond smuggling, to help arrange a sting operation.

tvmaze24_0044_0002_0020.name: Ha'alele (Abandoned)
tvmaze24_0044_0002_0020.summary: Murder case hits close to home for Max when he is convinced that The Trashman, a serial killer with ties to his past, is on the loose. In order to convince Five-0 of his suspicions, Max reveals shocking information about his childhood.

tvmaze24_0045_0002_0021.name: Pa Make Loa (Touch of Death)
tvmaze24_0045_0002_0021.summary: Five-0 and the NCIS: Los Angeles task force team up in Hawaii when there's a suspect on the loose who is threatening to release a deadly virus into the population.

tvmaze24_0046_0002_0022.name: Ua Hopu (Caught)
tvmaze24_0046_0002_0022.summary: Just as McGarrett finally gets his hands on his arch nemesis Wo Fat in a special ops raid, he's blindsided when he finds that the Japanese Yakuza is hot on their trail and wants them both dead.

tvmaze24_0047_0002_0023.name: Ua Hala (Death in the Family)
tvmaze24_0047_0002_0023.summary: Five-0 is in hot pursuit of a shooter who guns down one of their own, while another team member is forced to choose which of their kidnapped loved ones will live.

tvmaze24_0048_0003_0001.name: La O Na Makuahine (Mother's Day)
tvmaze24_0048_0003_0001.summary: Following McGarrett's mother's surprise return and Chin's gut-wrenching decision in last season's finale cliffhanger, the team is determined to track down Wo Fat and Delano for killing an important member of their family.

tvmaze24_0049_0003_0002.name: Kanalua (Doubt)
tvmaze24_0049_0003_0002.summary: McGarrett asks Catherine for her help in locating his mother and the team calls on August March for his assistance when an art heist turns deadly.

tvmaze24_0050_0003_0003.name: Lana I Ka Moana (Adrift)
tvmaze24_0050_0003_0003.summary: McGarrett and Danny's relaxing day at sea takes a deadly turn when their boat is hijacked and they are left to die in the middle of the ocean.

tvmaze24_0051_0003_0004.name: Popilikia (Misfortune)
tvmaze24_0051_0003_0004.summary: Doris McGarrett pays an unexpected visit to her son while the team investigates the death of a polo player who literally loses his head.

tvmaze24_0052_0003_0005.name: Mohai (Offering)
tvmaze24_0052_0003_0005.summary: It's Halloween in Hawaii and the clock is ticking when a grisly murder leads the team to a ritualistic killing, and evidence suggests that the killer will soon strike again.

tvmaze24_0053_0003_0006.name: I Ka Wa Mamua (In a Time Past)
tvmaze24_0053_0003_0006.summary: When Danny is forced to remain completely still while bomb technicians disarm a bomb that he has accidentally activated, McGarrett distracts him by getting his partner to tell the story about his toughest and most emotional case from his days as a cop in New Jersey.

tvmaze24_0054_0003_0007.name: Ohuna (The Secret)
tvmaze24_0054_0003_0007.summary: While the team investigates the murder of a young computer hacker, McGarrett tries to stage a long-needed reunion between his mother and his sister.

tvmaze24_0055_0003_0008.name: Wahine'inoloa (Evil Woman)
tvmaze24_0055_0003_0008.summary: McGarrett plays cat and mouse with a smart and seductive therapist he believes murdered her patient. Meanwhile, Catherine must hunt down one of Doris's old targets who is now seeking revenge.

tvmaze24_0056_0003_0009.name: Ha'awe Make Loa (Death Wish)
tvmaze24_0056_0003_0009.summary: Max and his crush get put in harm's way when a botched bank robbery leads the team to determine that the criminals had very unexpected motives. Meanwhile, Danny is stuck with the tough task of coming to the rescue of the most beautiful women in the world when a stalker goes after a Victoria's Secret model.

tvmaze24_0057_0003_0010.name: Huaka'i Kula (Field Trip)
tvmaze24_0057_0003_0010.summary: An Aloha Girls camping trip with Grace turns deadly when an armed man takes McGarrett and a little girl hostage. Meanwhile, Adam introduces Kono to his dangerous brother who was recently released from prison.

tvmaze24_0058_0003_0011.name: Kahu (Guardian)
tvmaze24_0058_0003_0011.summary: After someone foolishly tries to carjack McGarrett, he and Catherine meet a boy whose father is missing and may be in deadly trouble in the backwoods of Oahu.

tvmaze24_0059_0003_0012.name: Kapu (Forbidden)
tvmaze24_0059_0003_0012.summary: For the first time in television history, a primetime drama will allow viewers to choose the ending of an episode in real time when CBS's HAWAII FIVE-0 lets fans vote on CBS.com or Twitter during the East and West coast broadcasts, Monday, January 14, 2013 on the CBS Television Network.

tvmaze24_0060_0003_0013.name: Olelo Ho'opa'i Make (Death Sentence)
tvmaze24_0060_0003_0013.summary: When Chin is kidnapped in the night and dropped in the middle of Halawa Prison dressed as an inmate, he must fight for his life to escape before the other prisoners recognize him as Five-0.

tvmaze24_0061_0003_0014.name: Hana I Wa'Ia (Scandal)
tvmaze24_0061_0003_0014.summary: On the eve of an election, the Governor asks 5-0 to discreetly investigate the murder of a prostitute found in the bed of a missing Congressman. Meanwhile, Danny goes to court to determine if he will get partial custody of Grace.

tvmaze24_0062_0003_0015.name: Hookman
tvmaze24_0062_0003_0015.summary: Five-0 investigates when a mysterious man targets select police officers for revenge and McGarrett is the next on his hit list.

tvmaze24_0063_0003_0016.name: Kekoa (Warrior)
tvmaze24_0063_0003_0016.summary: Five-0 investigates the murder of a Lua master, and McGarrett hires a private investigator to follow his mother.

tvmaze24_0064_0003_0017.name: Pa'ani (The Game)
tvmaze24_0064_0003_0017.summary: It's an All-Pro football weekend in Hawaii and while Danny obsesses about the big game, Five-0 investigates the murder of a tech executive with the help of a star football player.

tvmaze24_0065_0003_0018.name: Na Ki'i (Dolls)
tvmaze24_0065_0003_0018.summary: When a murder victim falls onto Dog the Bounty Hunter's SUV, Five-0 sends Catherine in undercover at the local roller derby to find the culprit.

tvmaze24_0066_0003_0019.name: Hoa Pili (Close Friend)
tvmaze24_0066_0003_0019.summary: When threats turn deadly against a tour company that endangers the local shark population, Five-0 faces the difficult task of narrowing down the suspect list. Meanwhile, the team debates whether or not Kamekona will earn his helicopter license.

tvmaze24_0067_0003_0020.name: Olelo Pa'a (The Promise)
tvmaze24_0067_0003_0020.summary: When McGarrett and Catherine cross into North Korea to retrieve the remains of a fallen friend, he recounts his last deadly mission there.

tvmaze24_0068_0003_0021.name: Imi Loko Ka 'Uhane (Seek Within One's Soul)
tvmaze24_0068_0003_0021.summary: Five-0 allows a talk show host and her crew to follow them for the day, but the investigation turns dangerous when they have a run-in with Wo Fat.

tvmaze24_0069_0003_0022.name: Ho'opio (To Take Captive)
tvmaze24_0069_0003_0022.summary: When the body of a young girl who was kidnapped 10 years earlier is discovered, Five-0 must hunt down the kidnappers who have now taken their next victim. Meanwhile, Kono asks Catherine for a favor that could damage her relationship with Adam.

tvmaze24_0070_0003_0023.name: He Welo 'Oihana (Family Business)
tvmaze24_0070_0003_0023.summary: McGarrett must help his mother execute a covert op to retrieve an incriminating microfiche. Meanwhile, Kono's life is in danger when she closes in on Adam's secret.

tvmaze24_0071_0003_0024.name: Aloha, Malama Pono (Farewell and Take Care)
tvmaze24_0071_0003_0024.summary: As the CIA tasks Five-0 with finding a dangerous killer loose on the island, Kono goes on the run for a murder she did not commit. Meanwhile, McGarrett's prison visit to Wo Fat ends with a shocking discovery.

tvmaze24_0072_0004_0001.name: Aloha Ke Kahi I Ke Kahi (We Need Each Another)
tvmaze24_0072_0004_0001.summary: After McGarrett and Wo Fat narrowly escape from maximum security, gunmen storm Five-0 headquarters, compromising Kono and Adam's secret location in Hong Kong and forcing McGarrett to break the law and turn on his own in order to find a kidnapped Catherine.

tvmaze24_0073_0004_0002.name: A' ale Ma'a Wau (Fish Out of Water)
tvmaze24_0073_0004_0002.summary: Five-0 murder investigation leads the team to help a Texas Ranger who comes to the island to find his missing daughter. Meanwhile, Kono and Adam fight to stay alive when their hidden location is discovered.

tvmaze24_0074_0004_0003.name: Ka'oia i'o Ma Loko (The Truth Within)
tvmaze24_0074_0004_0003.summary: Conspiracy theorist helps Five-0 when a missing artifact is the key to solving a double murder.

tvmaze24_0075_0004_0004.name: A ia la aku (From This Day Forward)
tvmaze24_0075_0004_0004.summary: Five-0 investigates the murder of a wedding crasher, and their prime suspect is the runaway bride. Meanwhile, Danny makes a big decision regarding his relationship with Gabby.

tvmaze24_0076_0004_0005.name: Kupu'eu (Fallen Hero)
tvmaze24_0076_0004_0005.summary: As Catherine's seemingly harmless surveillance job takes a deadly turn, Adam considers making the ultimate sacrifice to save Kono.

tvmaze24_0077_0004_0006.name: Kupouli 'La (Broken)
tvmaze24_0077_0004_0006.summary: When Halloween comes to Hawaii and a zombie-like man is shot, Five-0 races to stop a madman who is conducting experiments on humans.

tvmaze24_0078_0004_0007.name: Ua Nalohia (In Deep)
tvmaze24_0078_0004_0007.summary: While working the murder case of an undercover ATF agent, McGarrett and the Five-0 team are tasked with watching Mary's newly adopted baby after she gets sick.

tvmaze24_0079_0004_0008.name: Akanahe (Reluctant Partners)
tvmaze24_0079_0004_0008.summary: McGarrett and Grover must work together to protect national security after they are tasked by the Governor to serve a warrant to a young computer hacker.

tvmaze24_0080_0004_0009.name: Hau'oli La Ho'omaika'i (Happy Thanksgiving)
tvmaze24_0080_0004_0009.summary: As Thanksgiving approaches, Five -0 investigates the murder of a secret service agent just as the President travels to Oahu. Also, McGarrett's Aunt Deb visits, bringing with her a shocking secret.

tvmaze24_0081_0004_0010.name: Ho'onani Makuakane (Honor Thy Father)
tvmaze24_0081_0004_0010.summary: The attempted murder of a Pearl Harbor veteran leads Five-0 to use decades old evidence to investigate a deadly crime committed within the internment camps on Oahu during World War II.

tvmaze24_0082_0004_0011.name: Pukana (Keepsake)
tvmaze24_0082_0004_0011.summary: Chin's life is put in danger when a murder investigation reveals that the person behind the crime may be a serial killer. Meanwhile, Danny and Grace find a mysterious puzzle box washed up on the shores of Oahu.

tvmaze24_0083_0004_0012.name: O Kela Me Keia Manawa (Now and Then)
tvmaze24_0083_0004_0012.summary: McGarrett helps Grover investigate his friend's disappearance after he apparently commits murder. Meanwhile, Kono continues her search for Adam.

tvmaze24_0084_0004_0013.name: Hana Lokomaika'i (The Favor)
tvmaze24_0084_0004_0013.summary: Internal Affairs questions Chin about his father's murder 15 years earlier and how his then-new relationship with Malia and her family might have hurt the investigation.

tvmaze24_0085_0004_0014.name: Na Hala a Ka Makua (Sins of the Father)
tvmaze24_0085_0004_0014.summary: McGarrett and Danny are kidnapped by an escaped convict who wants Five-0 to prove his innocence. Meanwhile, Danny must deal with Grace after she punches someone at school.

tvmaze24_0086_0004_0015.name: Pale 'la (Buried Secrets)
tvmaze24_0086_0004_0015.summary: While Five-0 investigates the murder of a real estate agent whose body was found in the walls of one of his listings, Danny is thrown when his mother comes to Oahu with shocking news.

tvmaze24_0087_0004_0016.name: Hoku Welowelo (Fire in the Sky)
tvmaze24_0087_0004_0016.summary: Five-0 investigates a triple homicide connected to a downed top-secret Chinese satellite, while Grover takes Danny's mother on a ride-along.

tvmaze24_0088_0004_0017.name: Ma Lalo o ka 'ili (Beneath the Surface)
tvmaze24_0088_0004_0017.summary: Five-0 aims to uncovers the sordid truth when a girl is taken from her home and her father is shot in the process. Meanwhile, Danny tries to get his parents back together and Jerry deciphers a code he found on the bottom of McGarrett's champ box.

tvmaze24_0089_0004_0018.name: Ho'i Hou (Reunited)
tvmaze24_0089_0004_0018.summary: Five-0 investigates when the daughter of a macadamia nut tycoon is murdered with a stiletto heel during Chin's high school reunion.

tvmaze24_0090_0004_0019.name: Ku I Ka Pili Koko (Blood Brothers)
tvmaze24_0090_0004_0019.summary: Five-0 is set up when a bad tip leads them to an abandoned building that is rigged to explode with McGarrett and Danny trapped inside.

tvmaze24_0091_0004_0020.name: Pe'epe'e Kanaka (Those Among Us)
tvmaze24_0091_0004_0020.summary: The investigation of a murdered pool cleaner leads Five-0 to uncover a possible terrorist cell of radicalized students who are plotting an attack on U.S. soil.

tvmaze24_0092_0004_0021.name: Makani 'Olu a Holo Malie (Fair Winds and Following Seas)
tvmaze24_0092_0004_0021.summary: McGarrett and Catherine travel to Afghanistan to stop the Taliban from harming a young boy whose family saved Catherine's life years ago.

tvmaze24_0093_0004_0022.name: O ka Pili 'Ohana ka 'Oi (Family Comes First)
tvmaze24_0093_0004_0022.summary: When Grover's daughter is kidnapped by an old nemesis, he is forced to help steal $100 million in order to get her back. Meanwhile, Wo Fat escapes prison and heads back to Oahu.

tvmaze24_0094_0005_0001.name: A'ohe kahi e pe'e ai (Nowhere to Hide)
tvmaze24_0094_0005_0001.summary: The island of O'ahu goes on lockdown when Five-0 hunts a terrorist who starts using weaponized drones on civilians. Meanwhile, McGarrett and Danno must go for a mandated review with a psychologist, resulting in a session which looks a lot like couples therapy.

tvmaze24_0095_0005_0002.name: Ka Makuakane (Family Man)
tvmaze24_0095_0005_0002.summary: Five-0 investigates when the young daughter of a Navy Seal currently on a top-secret mission is kidnapped. Meanwhile, with his brother's life on the line, Danny must locate the $18.5 million he owes his captors.

tvmaze24_0096_0005_0003.name: Kanalu Hope Loa (The Last Break)
tvmaze24_0096_0005_0003.summary: Five-0 investigates when three female thieves unknowingly steal something during a tour bus robbery that makes them a serious target. Meanwhile, Danny searches for his brother's hidden millions in order to exchange it for his life.

tvmaze24_0097_0005_0004.name: Ka No'eau (The Painter)
tvmaze24_0097_0005_0004.summary: When a Detroit hit man is taken out by one of his colleagues on the streets of Oahu, Five-0 is shocked to learn the killer's surprising motives. Meanwhile, Chin puts his career on the line to help Danny get the money he needs to save his bother's life.

tvmaze24_0098_0005_0005.name: Ho'oilina (Legacy)
tvmaze24_0098_0005_0005.summary: On the fourth anniversary of his father's death, McGarrett meets a woman who helps him reopen the last unsolved case his father worked on before his death.

tvmaze24_0099_0005_0006.name: Ho'oma'ike (Unmasked)
tvmaze24_0099_0005_0006.summary: It's Halloween and Five-0 must track down a serial killer who is copying murders depicted in a cult slasher film. Meanwhile, McGarrett must help Jerry after he is kidnapped by the counterfeiters he has been tracking.

tvmaze24_0100_0005_0007.name: Ina Paha (If Perhaps)
tvmaze24_0100_0005_0007.summary: When McGarrett is kidnapped by Wo Fat, he experiences what would have happened to the team if they had taken a very different path.

tvmaze24_0101_0005_0008.name: Ka Hana Malu (Inside Job)
tvmaze24_0101_0005_0008.summary: While the team investigates a couple's murder in which their sons are the prime suspects, McGarrett is shocked when Aunt Deb returns to the island with her new fiancé.

tvmaze24_0102_0005_0009.name: Ke Koho Mamao Aku (Longshot)
tvmaze24_0102_0005_0009.summary: It's Christmas in Hawaii and Five-0 travels to the Big Island, where Max is forced to work with a rival medical examiner after a cowboy is poisoned. Meanwhile, McGarrett pressures Danny into stealing a Christmas tree.

tvmaze24_0103_0005_0010.name: Wawahi moe'uhane (Broken Dreams)
tvmaze24_0103_0005_0010.summary: Five-0 enlists the help of an old-school private detective to solve the murder of a young woman who was secretly working as an escort.

tvmaze24_0104_0005_0011.name: Ua 'aihue (Stolen)
tvmaze24_0104_0005_0011.summary: When a tourist is killed after unknowingly transporting a stolen Van Gogh, an undercover Kono and Chin enter the world of black market priceless art and are taken hostage. Also, McGarrett asks Iron Chef Masaharu Morimoto to help train Kamekona to beat Chef Sam Choy in a shrimp cook-off.

tvmaze24_0105_0005_0012.name: Poina 'ole (Not Forgotten)
tvmaze24_0105_0005_0012.summary: When a neurosurgeon is assassinated just before performing surgery, Five-0 uncovers the shocking truth behind the disappearance of four reform school boys 40 years ago. Also, McGarrett's Mercury Marquis is stolen by an unlikely culprit.

tvmaze24_0106_0005_0013.name: La Po'ino (Doomsday)
tvmaze24_0106_0005_0013.summary: A patient infected with a contagious and lethal strain of bird flu is kidnapped and the culprits intend to weaponize the virus.

tvmaze24_0107_0005_0014.name: Powehiwehi (Blackout)
tvmaze24_0107_0005_0014.summary: While Five-0 hunts for a notorious criminal who has never been seen, Kono must fight for her life when she discovers the villain's identity. Also, Kono confesses to Adam that she's conflicted about their future together because of his ties to his formerly corrupt family business.

tvmaze24_0108_0005_0015.name: E 'Imi Pono (Searching for the Truth)
tvmaze24_0108_0005_0015.summary: When a journalist is killed, Five-0 must use his past reporting to hunt down a presumed dead Congolese warlord who is alive and well living on Oahu. Also, as Valentine's Day approaches, Danny overreacts when Grace's texts to a boy start accidently coming up on his cell phone.

tvmaze24_0109_0005_0016.name: Navaho (Embers)
tvmaze24_0109_0005_0016.summary: A California ATF agent helps Five-0 hunt a serial arsonist who is targeting couples on Oahu. Meanwhile, Danny takes Amber on a romantic getaway, but her abusive ex-husband tracks them down with the intent of taking Amber back.

tvmaze24_0110_0005_0017.name: Kuka'awale (Stakeout)
tvmaze24_0110_0005_0017.summary: McGarrett and Danny work on their relationship while they stakeout a woman's apartment after she escapes following a diamond robbery.

tvmaze24_0111_0005_0018.name: Pono Kaulike (Justice for All)
tvmaze24_0111_0005_0018.summary: McGarrett enlists Joe's help after Danny and Chin are arrested for deadly past transgressions.

tvmaze24_0112_0005_0019.name: Kahania (Close Shave)
tvmaze24_0112_0005_0019.summary: McGarrett and Odell come under siege in Odell's barbershop when they try to protect a young man who is being hunted down by a gang. Also, Jerry is wrongfully accused of committing a series of home invasions.

tvmaze24_0113_0005_0020.name: 'Ike Hanau (Instinct)
tvmaze24_0113_0005_0020.summary: When Grover's oldest and closest friend tells him he witnessed his wife fall off a cliff to her death, Grover's gut instinct tells him that this was no accident. Also, Danny and Dr. Shaw get trapped in an elevator with a dead body in need of processing.

tvmaze24_0114_0005_0021.name: Ua helele'i ka hoku (Fallen Star)
tvmaze24_0114_0005_0021.summary: When a performer is killed at a convention of Elvis impersonators and his body is stolen, Five-0 must track down the culprits who are after the hidden diamonds sewn into the victim's costume. Also, Gabriel Waincroft returns to ask for Chin for help getting off the island.

tvmaze24_0115_0005_0022.name: Ho'amoano (Chasing Yesterday)
tvmaze24_0115_0005_0022.summary: When a woman is found murdered in the hotel suite occupied by three married men, Five-0 must help the friends get over their massive hangover and retrace their steps from a wild night to find the killer. Also, Jerry witnesses a woman's kidnapping on the streets of O'ahu.

tvmaze24_0116_0005_0023.name: Mo'o 'olelo Pu (Sharing Traditions)
tvmaze24_0116_0005_0023.summary: When Kono goes on a solo outrigger trip around the Hawaiian islands in honor of her mother, she hits a patch of wild weather and must fight to stay alive. As Five-0 searches for Kono, they investigate a man busted for cooking meth who claims he received a threat on his son's life if he didn't continue making the drug.

tvmaze24_0117_0005_0024.name: Luapo'i (Prey)
tvmaze24_0117_0005_0024.summary: Five-0 investigates the murder of a bounty hunter who was killed after he apprehended a fugitive. Meanwhile, Rachel reveals a long-held secret to Danny that has serious ramifications.

tvmaze24_0118_0005_0025.name: A Make Kaua (Until We Die)
tvmaze24_0118_0005_0025.summary: Season 5 ends with Five-0 learning that a stolen nuclear bomb is somewhere on the island and is about to be detonated. Meanwhile, McGarrett is stunned when Catherine returns to Hawaii; and Chin confronts Adam about his lingering connections to the Yakuza, on the eve of Adam and Kono's wedding.

tvmaze24_0119_0006_0001.name: Mai ho'oni I ka wai lana malie (Do Not Disturb the Water that is Tranquil)
tvmaze24_0119_0006_0001.summary: A murder leads Five-0 to investigate a centuries-old Oahu palace raid involving pirates, buried treasure and a killer who is using a stolen painting as a map. Also, the morning after their wedding, Kono and Adam are threatened and tortured by Gabriel, and Danny shows concern for McGarrett regarding Catherine's return to the island:

tvmaze24_0120_0006_0002.name: Lehu a Lehu (Ashes to Ashes)
tvmaze24_0120_0006_0002.summary: Five-0 investigates when a bomb squad is attacked and the culprit threatens to detonate additional hidden explosive devices unless arsonist Jason Sinclair is released from prison. Also, after Adam returns from the hospital, Kono realizes that they are being watched, and McGarrett prepares to take his relationship with Catharine to the next level.

tvmaze24_0121_0006_0003.name: Ua 'o'oloku Ke Anu I Na Mauna (The Chilling Storm is on the Mountains)
tvmaze24_0121_0006_0003.summary: While Five-0 investigates a scuba diver's death from a gun recently used in another murder, McGarrett prepares to propose to Catherine

tvmaze24_0122_0006_0004.name: Ka Papahana Holo Pono (Best Laid Plans)
tvmaze24_0122_0006_0004.summary: Five-0 investigates when a wealthy recluse is found dead in a remote field with nearly one million dollars in counterfeit bills. Also, Adam is kidnapped by the Yakuza and forced to torture one of Gabriel's men.

tvmaze24_0123_0006_0005.name: Ka 'Alapahi Nui (Big Lie)
tvmaze24_0123_0006_0005.summary: Five-0 must interrogate members of a stunt bikers gang to find a killer who escaped by jumping his motorcycle from one roof onto another. Also, the team prepares to race in a Tough Mudder competition.

tvmaze24_0124_0006_0006.name: Na Pilikua Nui (Monsters)
tvmaze24_0124_0006_0006.summary: It's Halloween in O'ahu, and Five-0 must track down a serial killer inspired by Frankenstein. Also, Jerry calls Five-0 for help when an armed gang raids a blood bank, and Danny must track down Grace who lied and snuck out to a Halloween party

tvmaze24_0125_0006_0007.name: Na Kama Hele (Day Trippers)
tvmaze24_0125_0006_0007.summary: McGarrett's first date with Lynn on a deserted island turns deadly when a mob boss hiding there hunts them down in order to keep his location a secret. Also, Chin, Kono and Grover must race against the game clock to locate the father of a high school football star who will be murdered by a local gambler if his son doesn't throw the big game

tvmaze24_0126_0006_0008.name: Piko Pau 'iole (The Artful Dodger)
tvmaze24_0126_0006_0008.summary: Five-0 must work with charming con man Hank Weber to find a killer when his female partner is murdered on the job. Also, San Francisco Police Inspector Abby Dunn comes to O'ahu and works with Chin to investigate the murders of five Chinese arms dealers.

tvmaze24_0127_0006_0009.name: Hana Keaka (Charade)
tvmaze24_0127_0006_0009.summary: Five-0 goes back to school when a college professor is killed and Danny goes undercover as his replacement

tvmaze24_0128_0006_0010.name: Ka Makau Kaa Kaua (The Sweet Science)
tvmaze24_0128_0006_0010.summary: It's fight night on O'ahu! Five-0 investigates when the brother of the promising local boxer is murdered and the prime suspect is the outspoken reigning champion opponent from the mainland.

tvmaze24_0129_0006_0011.name: Kuleana (One's Personal Sense of Responsibility)
tvmaze24_0129_0006_0011.summary: While McGarrett and Danny attend a couples retreat in Maui to work on their partnership issues, Kamekona's dangerous past comes back to haunt him.

tvmaze24_0130_0006_0012.name: Ua Ola Loko I Ke Aloha (Love Gives Life Within)
tvmaze24_0130_0006_0012.summary: While McGarrett's Aunt Deb visits Oahu on a special personal mission, Five-0 must uncover who stole unstable Japanese WWII bombs left hidden on the island.

tvmaze24_0131_0006_0013.name: Umia Ka Hanu (Hold the Breath)
tvmaze24_0131_0006_0013.summary: While Grover travels to Chicago to finally get a confession from Clay Maxwell about killing his wife, Chin and Kono are held at gunpoint by two killers who have no idea they are cops.

tvmaze24_0132_0006_0014.name: Hoa 'inea (Misery Loves Company)
tvmaze24_0132_0006_0014.summary: As Five-0 investigates a double homicide involving marital infidelity, McGarrett and the team recount their disastrous Valentine's Day experiences.

tvmaze24_0133_0006_0015.name: Ke Koa Lokomaika'i (The Good Soldier)
tvmaze24_0133_0006_0015.summary: While Danny's mother is questioned by the FBI, McGarrett partners with a young man with autism who may have information to help solve the murder of his only friend.

tvmaze24_0134_0006_0016.name: Ka Pohaku Kihi Pa'a (The Solid Cornerstone)
tvmaze24_0134_0006_0016.summary: When Five-0's sketchy confidential informant is accused of murder, McGarrett asks his old friend Odell Martin to defend him.

tvmaze24_0135_0006_0017.name: Waiwai (Assets)
tvmaze24_0135_0006_0017.summary: McGarrett and Five-0 must track down a Russian spy who has stolen a flash drive containing classified NSA information that puts the life of a member of their Ohana at risk. Also, McGarrett finally learns why Catherine left him, and Abby continues to conceal her actual mission from Chin and Five-0

tvmaze24_0136_0006_0018.name: Kanaka Hahai (The Hunter)
tvmaze24_0136_0006_0018.summary: When a man is found left for dead drifting off the coast of Oahu, Five-0 uncovers a deadly slave trade operating aboard an illegal fishing vessel. Also, while Danny is out with his children, his car is stolen so he commandeers a bus to chase down the thieves.

tvmaze24_0137_0006_0019.name: Malama Ka Po'e (Care for One's People)
tvmaze24_0137_0006_0019.summary: A case from 15 years ago forces Grover to take his family on the run when a dangerous mob boss tracks him down to seek revenge.

tvmaze24_0138_0006_0020.name: Ka Haunaele (Rampage)
tvmaze24_0138_0006_0020.summary: While Five-0 investigates the theft of a high tech, indestructible suit built for the U.S. military, Jerry helps his sister try to save a captive elephant.

tvmaze24_0139_0006_0021.name: Ka Pono Ku'oko'a (The Cost of Freedom)
tvmaze24_0139_0006_0021.summary: Five-0 goes on a manhunt when a chemical spill permits six dangerous inmates to escape, including Kono's husband, Adam.

tvmaze24_0140_0006_0022.name: I'ike Ke Ao (For the World to Know)
tvmaze24_0140_0006_0022.summary: Five-0 tries to save a kidnapped college student from a dangerous vigilante. Meanwhile, Max, Kamekona and Flippa fight to survive after being shipwrecked.

tvmaze24_0141_0006_0023.name: Pilina Koko (Blood Ties)
tvmaze24_0141_0006_0023.summary: When a woman is murdered in her home, Five-0 learns that one of their own has a deep connection to the victim's young daughter.

tvmaze24_0142_0006_0024.name: Pa'a ka 'ipuka i ka 'upena nananana (The Entrance is Stopped with a Spider's Web)
tvmaze24_0142_0006_0024.summary: Trapped inside a dilapidated building in Oahu's Chinatown, Five-0 must protect a wounded Gabriel and plan their escape when enemy gunmen storm the building looking to kill him and anyone who gets in their way.

tvmaze24_0143_0006_0025.name: O Ke Ali'i Wale No Ka' U Make Make (My Desire is Only for the Chief)
tvmaze24_0143_0006_0025.summary: In order to stop a meth epidemic on the Island, McGarrett and Danny go undercover as pilots, but when McGarrett is seriously wounded, Danny is forced to break their cover in order to save his partner's life.

tvmaze24_0144_0007_0001.name: Makaukau 'oe e Pa'ani? (Ready to Play?)
tvmaze24_0144_0007_0001.summary: McGarrett refuses to listen to Danny's pleas to take it easy while recovering from surgery; Five-0 goes on the hunt for a serial killer as fear grows that it's not safe to travel to Hawaii.

tvmaze24_0145_0007_0002.name: No Ke Ali'i Wahine A Me Ka Aina (For Queen and Country)
tvmaze24_0145_0007_0002.summary: Five-0 must work with rogue MI-6 agent Harry Langford to find a terrorist planning to cause nuclear reactors across Europe to meltdown. Also, McGarrett and Danny ask retired FBI profiler Alicia Brown to help them find their serial killer vigilante.

tvmaze24_0146_0007_0003.name: He Moho Hou (New Player)
tvmaze24_0146_0007_0003.summary: FBI profiler Alicia Brown is forced to join McGarrett in the hunt for the chess-piece killer when she finds a body in her bed. Meanwhile, Kono reconnects with a former surfing competitor who is now a disabled and homeless war veteran.

tvmaze24_0147_0007_0004.name: Hu A'e Ke Ahi Lanakila A Kamaile (The Fire of Kamile Rises in Triumph)
tvmaze24_0147_0007_0004.summary: Five-0 must find McGarrett and Alicia when they are kidnapped by the serial killer they've been hunting.

tvmaze24_0148_0007_0005.name: Ke Ku 'Ana (The Stand)
tvmaze24_0148_0007_0005.summary: When a cache of guns is stolen from a gun range, Five-0 discovers the culprit is intent on making a dramatic statement on gun violence.

tvmaze24_0149_0007_0006.name: Ka Hale Ho'okauweli (House of Horrors)
tvmaze24_0149_0007_0006.summary: On Halloween, the team investigates the murder of a medium who was apparently frightened to death by a poltergeist; a mysterious death cult kidnaps Kono and Adam.

tvmaze24_0150_0007_0007.name: Ka Makuahine A Me Ke Keikikane (Mother and Son)
tvmaze24_0150_0007_0007.summary: Catherine informs Five-0 that McGarrett's mother has been captured and is in danger of being executed for trying to free Wo Fat's imprisoned father; Also, Chin loses his appeal to have Sara's adoption delayed, and she must move to Mexico.

tvmaze24_0151_0007_0008.name: Hana Komo Pae (Rite of Passage)
tvmaze24_0151_0007_0008.summary: While Danny chaperones Grace's winter formal, terrorists seize the venue and hold everyone hostage in order to kidnap a diplomat's son. Also, Danny and Grover are shocked to learn that Will is Grace's secret boyfriend.

tvmaze24_0152_0007_0009.name: Elua la ma Nowemapa (Two Days in November)
tvmaze24_0152_0007_0009.summary: When a conspiracy theorist with compelling evidence that JFK's cabinet ordered his assassination is murdered, Five-0 investigate's one of history's most notorious unsolved mysteries.

tvmaze24_0153_0007_0010.name: Ka Luhi (The Burden)
tvmaze24_0153_0007_0010.summary: Five-0 investigates the 10-year-old cold case of a missing teen when a boy suffering from PTSD undergoes hypnosis and realizes he may have witnessed her murder. Also, Danny's sister Bridget visits Oahu for a business conference, and he suspects that she may be getting too close to a co-worker.

tvmaze24_0154_0007_0011.name: Ka'ili Aku (Snatchback)
tvmaze24_0154_0007_0011.summary: Five-0 races to Mexico where Chin puts his life on the line after his niece Sara is kidnapped.

tvmaze24_0155_0007_0012.name: Ka 'Aelike (The Deal)
tvmaze24_0155_0007_0012.summary: Chin is kidnapped by a cartel in Mexico and Five-0 races to rescue him before he is executed by his vengeful abductors. Meanwhile, Grover goes undercover as a car salesman to investigate a murder that turns out to be far more complex and dangerous than expected.

tvmaze24_0156_0007_0013.name: Ua ho'i ka 'opua i Awalua (The Clouds Always Return to Awalua)
tvmaze24_0156_0007_0013.summary: As Max prepares to say goodbye to his Five-0 ohana, they must investigate a murder during a police convention on the island.

tvmaze24_0157_0007_0014.name: Ka Laina Ma Ke One (Line in the Sand)
tvmaze24_0157_0007_0014.summary: The team faces a contentious U.S. Marshal after a murder suspect escapes capture and looks for asylum in the sovereign land that belongs to the Nation of Hawaii.

tvmaze24_0158_0007_0015.name: Ka Pa'ani Nui (Big Game)
tvmaze24_0158_0007_0015.summary: When working a murder case involving the illegal practice of shark finning, Five-0 uncovers the possibility that a former Nazi war criminal may be hiding out in an old leprosy colony in Hawaii.

tvmaze24_0159_0007_0016.name: Poniu I Ke Aloha (Crazy in Love)
tvmaze24_0159_0007_0016.summary: While McGarrett and Danno celebrate Valentine's Day with their girlfriends, the rest of Five-0 investigates the murder of a man taking a class on how to land women.

tvmaze24_0160_0007_0017.name: Hahai I Na Pilikua Nui (Hunting Monsters)
tvmaze24_0160_0007_0017.summary: McGarrett and Five-0 once again become entangled in the twisted mind games of serial killer Dr. Madison Gray when she stumbles into HPD covered in blood that matches Alicia Brown's, and claims amnesia.

tvmaze24_0161_0007_0018.name: E Malama Pono (Handle with Care)
tvmaze24_0161_0007_0018.summary: McGarrett and Danny finally track down the missing uranium, which has been used to build a bomb located in the middle of the jungle. Now, they must carefully extract the unstable explosive through treacherous terrain before it detonates.

tvmaze24_0162_0007_0019.name: Puka 'ana (Exodus)
tvmaze24_0162_0007_0019.summary: McGarrett and Kono suspect that an abused young girl may be the victim of a sex trafficking ring on the Island. Also, Chin and Grover investigate a murder at a sober living facility.

tvmaze24_0163_0007_0020.name: Huikau Na Makau A Ka Lawai'a (The Fishhooks of the Fishers Become Entangled)
tvmaze24_0163_0007_0020.summary: Five-0 helps PI Harry Brown work the case of a kidnapped wealthy woman whose husband may have something to hide. Also, Rachel tells Danny that she is getting a divorce from Stan.

tvmaze24_0164_0007_0021.name: Ua Malo'o Ka Wai (The Water Is Dried Up)
tvmaze24_0164_0007_0021.summary: McGarrett and Five-0 are captured and face certain death after tracking a dangerous nemesis to the Island of Lanai. Also, Grover takes his son to Chicago where he testifies against a dirty cop from his past.

tvmaze24_0165_0007_0022.name: Waimaka 'Ele'ele (Black Tears)
tvmaze24_0165_0007_0022.summary: While working the murder case of one of the last survivors of the USS Arizona, McGarrett learns about his grandfather's important role at Pearl Harbor. Also, Adam uncovers bone fragments at his new construction job and asks Jerry to help him discreetly investigate.

tvmaze24_0166_0007_0023.name: Wehe 'ana (Prelude)
tvmaze24_0166_0007_0023.summary: Danny protects a coma patient showing signs of waking who was the key witness from his last HPD case before he met Steve and joined Five-0.

tvmaze24_0167_0007_0024.name: He Ke'u Na Ka 'alae A Hina (A Croaking by Hina's Mudhen)
tvmaze24_0167_0007_0024.summary: When McGarrett gets a tip that someone is plotting a terrorist attack on Oahu, Five-0 searches for those behind it before it's too late. Also, Chin and Abby have a very difficult decision to make.

tvmaze24_0168_0007_0025.name: Ua Mau Ke Ea O Ka Aina I Ka Pono (The Life of the Land is Perpetuated in Righteousness)
tvmaze24_0168_0007_0025.summary: McGarrett risks his life when Five-0 attempts their most dangerous rescue yet of young girls trapped in the sex trafficking ring they have been tracking this year. Also, Kono, deeply affected by the case, makes a life-changing decision.

show_list.name: Deception
show_list.summary: Deception is a crime drama that centers on superstar magician Cameron Black. When his career is ruined by scandal, he has only one place to turn to practice his art of deception, illusion, and influence — the FBI. He'll become the world's first consulting illusionist, helping the government solve crimes that defy explanation, and trap criminals and spies by using deception.

show_list.name: Narcos
show_list.summary: Narcos, the series will chronicle the life and death of drug lord Pablo Escobar the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel and a known terrorist who was also a congressman, a family man and revered by the poor as a new Robin Hood.

first_episode.name: Descenso
first_episode.summary: A Chilean drugsproducer, the chemist Cockroach, brings his product to the Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA-Agent Steve Murphy is fighting drugs in Bogota.

last_episode.name: Al Fin Cayó!
last_episode.summary: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

tvmaze2705_0001_0001_0001.name: Descenso
tvmaze2705_0001_0001_0001.summary: A Chilean drugsproducer, the chemist Cockroach, brings his product to the Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA-Agent Steve Murphy is fighting drugs in Bogota.

tvmaze2705_0002_0001_0002.name: The Sword Of Simón Bolívar
tvmaze2705_0002_0001_0002.summary: The communistic radical group M-19 are counteracting the drug lords and Murphy's new partner Peña teaches him the Colombian way of law enforcement.

tvmaze2705_0003_0001_0003.name: The Men Of Always
tvmaze2705_0003_0001_0003.summary: Murphy is confronted with corruption in the Colombian government once he tries to discolate Escobar's his political ambition together with his partner Peña.

tvmaze2705_0004_0001_0004.name: The Palace In Flames
tvmaze2705_0004_0001_0004.summary: Despite a new extradition treaty, the USA is increasing their budget to fight communism. It will create new challenges for Murphy and Peña to hunt for Pablo Escobar.

tvmaze2705_0005_0001_0005.name: There Will Be A Future
tvmaze2705_0005_0001_0005.summary: Pablo's extreme methods is almost leading to a war between drug lords, Carillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness Elisa.

tvmaze2705_0006_0001_0006.name: Explosivos
tvmaze2705_0006_0001_0006.summary: Gacha was almost caught by Peña and Carillo. Murphy tries to protect candidate Gaviria against assassins with ties to Pablo as she is in favour for extradition.

tvmaze2705_0007_0001_0007.name: You Will Cry Tears Of Blood
tvmaze2705_0007_0001_0007.summary: Pablo went to hiding as political tides are turning against him, but he finds a way to beat back. The CIA is finally offering their help to Peña and Murphy.

tvmaze2705_0008_0001_0008.name: La Gran Mentira
tvmaze2705_0008_0001_0008.summary: A tragic mistake forces the government to change strategies to fight Pablo, but Pablo has bigger issues as there is danger from within his empire.

tvmaze2705_0009_0001_0009.name: La Catedral
tvmaze2705_0009_0001_0009.summary: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over once he signs a deal with the government, but Murphy, Peña and the Calicartel have different thoughts about that.

tvmaze2705_0010_0001_0010.name: Despegue
tvmaze2705_0010_0001_0010.summary: Pablo's activities in prison forces the government to use extreme actions. Murphy and Peña have to deal with a problematic situation.

tvmaze2705_0011_0002_0001.name: Free at Last
tvmaze2705_0011_0002_0001.summary: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.

tvmaze2705_0012_0002_0002.name: Cambalache
tvmaze2705_0012_0002_0002.summary: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.

tvmaze2705_0013_0002_0003.name: Our Man in Madrid
tvmaze2705_0013_0002_0003.summary: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.

tvmaze2705_0014_0002_0004.name: The Good, The Bad, and The Dead
tvmaze2705_0014_0002_0004.summary: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limon proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.

tvmaze2705_0015_0002_0005.name: The Enemies of my Enemy
tvmaze2705_0015_0002_0005.summary: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.

tvmaze2705_0016_0002_0006.name: Los Pepes
tvmaze2705_0016_0002_0006.summary: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.

tvmaze2705_0017_0002_0007.name: Deutschland 93
tvmaze2705_0017_0002_0007.summary: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.

tvmaze2705_0018_0002_0008.name: Exit El Patrón
tvmaze2705_0018_0002_0008.summary: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.

tvmaze2705_0019_0002_0009.name: Nuestra Finca
tvmaze2705_0019_0002_0009.summary: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.

tvmaze2705_0020_0002_0010.name: Al Fin Cayó!
tvmaze2705_0020_0002_0010.summary: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

show_list.name: Shooter
show_list.summary: Based on the best-selling Bob Lee Swagger novel by Stephen Hunter, Point of Impact, and the 2007 Paramount film starring Mark Wahlberg, Shooter is an action series about a highly decorated Marine sniper who is on the run after being falsely accused of trying to kill the President.

first_episode.name: Point of Impact
first_episode.summary: When a plot to assassinate the President of the United States is discovered, highly-decorated veteran Bob Lee Swagger is recruited by his former Commander, Isaac Johnson, to help prevent the attempt. Meanwhile, disgraced FBI agent Nadine Memphis, investigates potential assassins.

previous_episode.name: Primer Contact
previous_episode.summary: With Grigory Krukov as the last remaining leader of the conspiracy and Mary being held at the Russian Embassy, Bob Lee, Julie, Nadine, and Isaac must work together to find a way to save Mary, shut down the conspiracy, and prove Bob Lee innocent once and for all.

tvmaze2745_0001_0001_0001.name: Point of Impact
tvmaze2745_0001_0001_0001.summary: When a plot to assassinate the President of the United States is discovered, highly-decorated veteran Bob Lee Swagger is recruited by his former Commander, Isaac Johnson, to help prevent the attempt. Meanwhile, disgraced FBI agent Nadine Memphis, investigates potential assassins.

tvmaze2745_0002_0001_0002.name: Exfiltration
tvmaze2745_0002_0001_0002.summary: Bob Lee tries to protect his family while incarcerated and Isaac aims to silence him. In other events, Nadine contacts Bob Lee's wife, Julie, who's dealing with the backlash against her family.

tvmaze2745_0003_0001_0003.name: Musa Qala
tvmaze2745_0003_0001_0003.summary: Bob Lee reaches out to Nadine while evading his pursuers; and Isaac juggles his double life while trying to find Bob Lee.

tvmaze2745_0004_0001_0004.name: Overwatch
tvmaze2745_0004_0001_0004.summary: Bob Lee plans his next moves; and Isaac ties up loose ends. In other events, Nadine investigates the Ukrainian connection.

tvmaze2745_0005_0001_0005.name: Recon by Fire
tvmaze2745_0005_0001_0005.summary: Bob Lee locates the bullet from the assassination, which leads him to a radical militia group and Isaac; and Nadine is locked in a deadly game of cat and mouse with Payne.

tvmaze2745_0006_0001_0006.name: Killing Zone
tvmaze2745_0006_0001_0006.summary: Bob Lee tracks down his former instructor, who he hopes will help him find the shooter; Nadine interrogates Payne; Isaac realizes that he's in over his head; and a reporter makes Julie an offer.

tvmaze2745_0007_0001_0007.name: Danger Close
tvmaze2745_0007_0001_0007.summary: Bob Lee travels across the country in order to find the shooter; Julie deals with a family betrayal; Nadine contacts a Ukrainian reporter who can explain the conspiracy; and Isaac questions his allegiance.

tvmaze2745_0008_0001_0008.name: Red on Red
tvmaze2745_0008_0001_0008.summary: Bob Lee and Nadine plot to secure evidence that could expose the conspiracy; Isaac searches for an exit strategy; Payne tries to flee; and Julie and Mary are in danger.

tvmaze2745_0009_0001_0009.name: Ballistic Advantage
tvmaze2745_0009_0001_0009.summary: After Julie and Mary are abducted, Bob Lee must figure out a way to broker an exchange for the recently acquired evidence he lifted from Jack Payne. Nadine, working with Bob Lee, struggles to balance her allegiance to him and the FBI, as Isaac strikes a tenuous deal to assist them as trade for his freedom after it's done.

tvmaze2745_0010_0001_0010.name: Primer Contact
tvmaze2745_0010_0001_0010.summary: With Grigory Krukov as the last remaining leader of the conspiracy and Mary being held at the Russian Embassy, Bob Lee, Julie, Nadine, and Isaac must work together to find a way to save Mary, shut down the conspiracy, and prove Bob Lee innocent once and for all.

show_list.name: America's Got Talent
show_list.summary: With the talent search open to acts of all ages, America's Got Talent has brought the variety format back to the forefront of American culture by showcasing performers from across the country. The series is a true celebration of the American spirit, featuring a colorful array of singers, dancers, comedians, contortionists, impressionists, jugglers, magicians, ventriloquists and hopeful stars, all vying for their chance to win America's hearts and the $1 million prize.

next_episode.name: Auditions, Week 6
next_episode.summary: The auditions continue with creator and executive producer Simon Cowell at the judges table alongside Mel B, Heidi Klum, Howie Mandel and host, Tyra Banks. Variety acts of all types and contestants of all ages audition for the chance to win the $1 million prize. The Golden Buzzer is back and allows five lucky acts the chance to go directly to the live performance rounds at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles to compete for America's vote.

tvmaze289_0011_0001_0011.name: Semi-Final 4
tvmaze289_0011_0001_0011.summary: Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") hosts this hit talent competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented person in America. In this fourth semi-final episode, celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, will pick one contestant to move on to the finals, and America will vote another contestant through. The contestant receiving the most votes from America will be revealed in a live-results show.

tvmaze289_0012_0001_0012.name: Semi-Final 4 - Results
tvmaze289_0012_0001_0012.summary: Host Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") will reveal which act from Wednesday's semi-final episode that America voted through to the finale in this hit talent competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented person in America. Celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, who revealed their choice in Wednesday's semi-final episode, will be on hand to weigh in on America's choice.

tvmaze289_0013_0001_0013.name: Wildcard Show
tvmaze289_0013_0001_0013.summary: Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") hosts this hit talent competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented person in America. In this special Wildcard episode, acts that did not initially make it through the semi-final phase of the competition will compete for a ninth and final spot in the finale episode next week. Celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, will weigh in on the performances, and America will vote on which act will make it through. The contestant receiving the most votes from America will be revealed in a special Wildcard live-results show.

tvmaze289_0014_0001_0014.name: Wildcard Show - Results
tvmaze289_0014_0001_0014.summary: Host Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") will reveal which act from Wednesday's Wildcard episode that America voted through to garner the ninth and final spot in the finale of this hit talent competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented person in America. Celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, will be on hand to weigh in on America's choice. The finale will air next week.

tvmaze289_0015_0001_0015.name: The Final
tvmaze289_0015_0001_0015.summary: Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") hosts this hit talent competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented performer/performers in America. In this episode, the final nine acts will perform, and the show's celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, will be on hand to critique each performance. America will vote on which of the nine acts will win the competition, which will be revealed in the finale results show.

tvmaze289_0016_0001_0016.name: Winner Announced
tvmaze289_0016_0001_0016.summary: Host Regis Philbin ("Live with Regis and Kelly") will reveal which of the nine acts from Wednesday's final performance episode that the television viewing audience voted through as the most talented performer/performers in America. The winning act will be awarded one million dollars. Celebrity judge panel, David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch"), Grammy award-winning singer and actress Brandy ("Moesha") and UK television/media personality Piers Morgan, will be on hand to weigh in on America's choice.

tvmaze289_0059_0004_0011.name: Vegas Verdicts (1)
tvmaze289_0059_0004_0011.summary: Contestants who made it through the first round of auditions descend upon "The Entertainment Capital of the World." As the acts dream of being the next Vegas headliners, the celebrity judges, David Hasselhoff, Piers Morgan and Sharon Osbourne set out to deliberate, debate and determine which of the acts will make it into the elite Top 40. After being unable to reach some decisions, they agree to issue a challenge to some of the contestants in an attempt to break the judging deadlock. Nick Cannon hosts this variety competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million-dollar prize and become the most talented act in America.

tvmaze289_0060_0004_0012.name: Vegas Verdicts (2)
tvmaze289_0060_0004_0012.summary: In the "City of Lights" celebrity judges David Hasselhoff, Piers Morgan and Sharon Osbourne interrogate some of the acts to help them determine who will make it into the Top 40 and onto the live performance shows. It's a revealing look into the deliberations as the judges fight it out to determine the fate of the contestants. For the acts its an emotional day that either ends with heartbreak and anguish or joy and celebration. One contestant faces what he calls one of the "most difficult decisions of his life." Nick Cannon hosts this variety competition series which features a colorful array of hopeful future stars as they compete for a chance to win a one million dollar prize and become the most talented act in America.

show_list.name: The Night Shift
show_list.summary:
Welcome to The Night Shift, where the toughest and craziest cases always seem to come through the door. Every shift is a fight between the heroic efforts of saving lives and the hard truths of running an underfunded hospital.

At San Antonio Memorial, the men and women who work the night shift are an irreverent and special breed, particularly adrenaline junkie TC Callahan. After three grueling tours of duty in Afghanistan, TC is about to learn that his toughest battles will be fought right here at home.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Welcome to the night shift at San Antonio Memorial, where those who work the Night Shift are a special breed. Every night is a balancing act between the heroic efforts to save lives and the hard truths of running a hospital. After a rough night, TC Callahan, a gifted ex-Army doctor, deals with a life-threatening situation on his way into work. TC's current colleague and ex-girlfriend Jordan Alexander angles for the top job to run the night shift but she must convince their new boss Michael Ragosa that she has what it takes to bring order to the chaos. TC and Ragosa clash over hospital business matters - TC would do anything to save a patient while Ragosa has his eye on the bottom line. Later, TC and Topher are called to the scene of a nighttime crash and must deal with a dramatic injury that demands all of TC's expertise. Back at the hospital, ER psychiatrist Dr. Landry De La Cruz consoles the brother of the wounded teen while TC performs an unusual and extremely risky surgery. TC later counsels Drew about a secret he is keeping but unbeknownst to the staff, Ragosa is hiding a secret of his own.

previous_episode.name: Recoil
previous_episode.summary: Jordan and Drew perform a daring rescue by jumping from a chopper; Paul deals with the repercussions of standing up to his father; Shannon indoctrinates Cain; TC must treat his captor to rescue Syd.

next_episode.name: Off The Rails
next_episode.summary: After performing a daring on-site rescue to save a teenage girl, Drew is forced to re-evaluate his priorities as a new father. Back at the hospital, the ER is flooded with mass casualty victims from an amusement park disaster. Hoping to get Paul back on staff, Jordan facilitates a rapprochement between Paul and his father (guest star James McDaniel). Meanwhile, Scott pursues a more active role in the hospital. Kenny tries to put Cain in his place, but Cain's deft handling of an emergency shows Kenny that he may have bit off more than he can chew.

After a rough night, TC Callahan, a gifted ex-Army doctor, deals with a life-threatening situation on his way into work. TC's current colleague and ex-girlfriend Jordan Alexander angles for the top job to run the night shift but she must convince their new boss Michael Ragosa that she has what it takes to bring order to the chaos. TC and Ragosa clash over hospital business matters - TC would do anything to save a patient while Ragosa has his eye on the bottom line. Later, TC and Topher are called to the scene of a nighttime crash and must deal with a dramatic injury that demands all of TC's expertise. Back at the hospital, ER psychiatrist Dr. Landry De La Cruz consoles the brother of the wounded teen while TC performs an unusual and extremely risky surgery. TC later counsels Drew about a secret he is keeping but unbeknownst to the staff, Ragosa is hiding a secret of his own.

tvmaze294_0002_0001_0002.name: Second Chances
tvmaze294_0002_0001_0002.summary: When a Sheriff's Deputy is critically injured, TC Callahan faces a personal challenge and struggles to do everything to save him, even calling in a cardiac specialist over the objections of his boss Michael Ragosa. Topher and Krista assist in the delicate surgery, while Jordan works to keep the peace and keep the ER running. Paul must attend to an elderly woman with a very challenging case. Kenny deals with an injured groom who has been hiding a secret from his bride. Meanwhile, Drew and Landry are faced with a 9-year-old boy who has suspicious injuries. While they initially suspect the mother, the truth is a little more complicated.

tvmaze294_0003_0001_0003.name: Hog Wild
tvmaze294_0003_0001_0003.summary: And Paul are called to the chaotic scene of a nighttime hog-hunting excursion that has gone horribly wrong. One patient has lost a hand to a feral hog and another has been shot with an arrow through the chest. Topher deals with a resourceful 9-year-old girl who has come to the hospital on her own to seek treatment but soon realizes the case is far more complicated. Drew injures his hand during a MMA fight and enlists Krista to help him keep it a secret from Jordan. Ragosa seeks some family counseling from Landry and when Ragosa threatens to close down the staff hangout known as the "Tailgate," Landry helps him understand the benefits of a compromise.

tvmaze294_0004_0001_0004.name: Grace Under Fire
tvmaze294_0004_0001_0004.summary: The emergency room is flooded with patients from an annual Alamo reenactment. TC, Jordan and Kenny deal with a critically wounded patient who is disoriented and suffering from amnesia. The patient is also wearing a bracelet indicating he declines medical treatment, putting Jordan in a professional bind with Ragosa. Meanwhile, Drew must keep a severely wounded soldier alive while being miles away from help. Back at the hospital, Ragosa helps himself to aspirin in Landry's office but soon realizes he has taken something very different. Topher schedules a vasectomy operation and the staff can't resist the temptation to tease him at every turn. Jordan's long-distance boyfriend Scott, surprises her with a visit to the hospital.

tvmaze294_0005_0001_0005.name: Storm Watch
tvmaze294_0005_0001_0005.summary: An epic storm hits San Antonio and the emergency room is awash in patients and must use their battlefield skills to deal with massive power outages. TC and Dr. Scott Clemmens race to the scene of a mudslide disaster to treat a gravely injured mother and her son. Paul rises to the challenge of caring for the boy, whose condition takes an unexpected turn for the worse. Scott considers an offer from Ragosa to join the hospital staff as head trauma surgeon. Jordan isn't sure that's going to work out with the tensions between TC and Scott. Landry is caught by surprise when a family member shows up at the hospital looking for money to cover his debts. She finds some needed moral support from Ragosa. Meanwhile, Topher must head out into the storm to help his wife who is stranded and going into labor with twins.

tvmaze294_0006_0001_0006.name: Coming Home
tvmaze294_0006_0001_0006.summary: Drew is looking forward to the return of his boyfriend Rick from his overseas deployment but things go terribly wrong as a horrific crash sends badly wounded soldiers, including Rick, into the emergency room. Drew struggles to keep his relationship under wraps with TC's help, as they both try to save Rick. TC and Scott argue over who is in charge and Jordan realizes she has to deal with some unresolved feelings for TC. Topher struggles to diagnose a soldiers illness as Krista fends off the flirtations of young soldiers in the emergency room, and Paul must contend with their good-natured teasing because he looks so young. Kenny discovers Ragosa's online dating profile and offers to help fix it up.

tvmaze294_0007_0001_0007.name: Blood Brothers
tvmaze294_0007_0001_0007.summary: When a small plane goes down near San Antonio, TC and Topher chopper out to the scene and retrieve the lone survivor. Back in the ER, they deal with his serious injuries but must fend off Milo, a menacing law enforcement officer with a hidden agenda. Paul is mesmerized by an injured exotic dancer who lands in the emergency room after falling during her performance. When her condition takes a mysterious turn for the worse, Paul, Kenny and Drew are baffled by her life threatening symptoms and must go to an already swamped Jordan for help. Krista tries to help a teenager with a serious eating disorder that her family refuses to recognize. Meanwhile, TC struggles with increasing flashbacks and the traumatic death of his brother in Afghanistan.

tvmaze294_0008_0001_0008.name: Save Me
tvmaze294_0008_0001_0008.summary: Topher is gravely wounded in a shootout with Milo. TC and Scott perform Topher's emergency surgery as TC struggles to keep his increasingly troubling Afghanistan flashbacks under control. After experiencing the hostage situation, Jordan comes to understand the immense pressure that TC has been under since leaving Afghanistan. She struggles to maintain her composure when she must treat Milo, who was responsible for the shooting. Meanwhile, an explosion at a fertilizer factory sends badly burned victims to the ER and threatens to overwhelm the shorthanded staff. Krista must step up to manage a patient who is crashing. Jordan learns a devastating secret about TC.

tvmaze294_0009_0002_0001.name: Recovery
tvmaze294_0009_0002_0001.summary: After a harrowing hostage incident left the night shift team badly shaken, everyone is finally back to business...everyone except TC Callahan, who has been temporarily suspended from the hospital after a PTSD breakdown on the job. After recovering from his near-fatal gunshot wound, Topher Zia has temporarily taken over as chief of the night shift while Jordan Alexander fields scrutiny over her medical mishandling of the man who shot him. TC can't stay away from the action however and joins Jordan out in the field, and with the help of head surgeon Scott Clemmens, they push the limits of medical technology to save a father trapped beneath an elevator. Dr. Joey Chavez brings a new zen vibe to the ER when he steps in as chief surgeon on a freak motorcycle accident case, working to the beat of his own drum. Meanwhile, Ragosa returns to the ER with a surprising new lease on life after surviving cancer.

tvmaze294_0010_0002_0002.name: Back at the Ranch
tvmaze294_0010_0002_0002.summary: When a rancher accidentally shoots his own wife, TC, Kenny and Paul try desperately to save her but it's too late. Before TC can come to terms with the loss of his patient, he's sent out to the scene of a crazy teenage ranch party where he performs a risky surgery in order to save the life of a young football star. Back at the hospital, Jordan and Kenny rush to the aid of a beauty queen who has wandered into the emergency room in severe distress but treating her symptoms only leads to further complications. Topher decides he wants to keep the top job and builds the nerve to approach Jordan about it.

tvmaze294_0011_0002_0003.name: Eyes Look Your Last
tvmaze294_0011_0002_0003.summary: The night shift crew is put to the test when a teenage couple and a young mom land in the emergency room after a serious car crash. Topher, TC, Jordan and Scott tend to the youngsters, who were returning from their secret wedding. As the girl's condition worsens, TC tries in vein to calm her distraught father. Jordan and Gwen tend to the other victim, a young pregnant woman whose fiancé is deployed in Afghanistan. The team hastily arranges a proxy wedding so that she can be married before delivering the baby through an emergency caesarian section. Meanwhile, Paul tends to a wealthy, eccentric hospital benefactor who teaches him it's ok to follow his heart.

tvmaze294_0012_0002_0004.name: Shock to the Heart
tvmaze294_0012_0002_0004.summary: Joey, and Gwen rescue an injured skydiver from the site of a near-fatal crash. Joey and Krista counsel the skydiver's girlfriend after they uncover serious complications in the operating room. TC, Topher, and Ragosa treat an electrocuted janitor whose family gathers around him in the ER. When the patient's wife and children suddenly come down with their own life-threatening symptoms, the night shift team works overtime to save them. Jordan and Paul attend to a college student who comes to the ER with a mild fever. As they uncover the cause of her condition, Jordan teaches Paul a difficult lesson about his limitations as a doctor. Meanwhile, Rick arrives at the hospital with an injury that he hides from his boyfriend.

tvmaze294_0013_0002_0005.name: Ghosts
tvmaze294_0013_0002_0005.summary: Patient's exposure to radiation sends the Night Shift into chaos. Topher implements an immediate quarantine and locks down the ER. Paul cares for the quarantined patient with the help of Ragosa and Kenny. Meanwhile, TC, Drew, and Gwen race to the site of a multi-victim car cash, where they discover an injured police officer at the heart of the accident. Back at the hospital TC and Jordan work desperately to save the officer's life using an unconventional procedure. TC gets an unwelcome surprise when his troubled sister-in-law Annie shows up out of the blue. Still adrift and grieving over the death of her husband, Annie is eager to reminisce with TC about the good old days. Meanwhile, a former patient harasses Jordan, and Drew struggles with his recent breakup. Joey pushes Krista to take her future into her own hands.

tvmaze294_0014_0002_0006.name: Fog of War
tvmaze294_0014_0002_0006.summary: A thick fog rolls into San Antonio, stranding TC, Jordan and Paul far from the hospital. The trio must then try to save victims of a grisly truck crash, and soon discover that their patients are illegal immigrants. Also: Two siblings are treated at the ER in a case that stirs up Topher's war memories.

tvmaze294_0015_0002_0007.name: Need to Know
tvmaze294_0015_0002_0007.summary: TC's sister-in-law lands in the ER after falling down stairs, and complicated truths about the accident emerge. Meanwhile, staffers treat a boy who fell down a well; Ragosa's teen daughter visits the ER; and Drew spirals into a deeper depression.

tvmaze294_0016_0002_0008.name: Best Laid Plans
tvmaze294_0016_0002_0008.summary: It's all hands on deck when a tremendous explosion sends dozens of casualties to San Antonio Memorial Hospital. Topher leads the team while Jordan, Ragosa and Krista treat the traumatized patients and their families. TC, Drew, and Gwen race to the scene of the downtown explosion, where they accept the help of a Good Samaritan and former Army Medic, Bennett.
